《X-COM：UFO Defense》基於 Mythos Games Ltd 最初開發的 1994 年 PC 遊戲。玩家控制 X-COM 特遣部隊，在地球 3D 地圖上建造基地並追踪各種 UFO。一旦發現不明飛行物（以紅十字表示），您必須嘗試攔截它，使其墜毀在乾燥的陸地上。然後，你需要派遣全副武裝的小隊前往現場，在那裡你將從等距視角目睹被擊落的飛船和周圍的地形。
移動你的部隊是通過點擊界面完成的，雙方交替輪流。你的三個目標是（1）與外星人面對面交戰，（2）擊暈或殺死他們，以及（3）取回你發現的任何技術或武器，以便你的科學家可以復制它們。畢竟，你必須以毒攻毒！PlayStation 版本支持鼠標和存儲卡，後者允許您隨時保存遊戲（只要您有五個可用塊）。

Civilization II (USA).name: 刺客信条II
Civilization II (USA).original_desc:
Re-write history with Civilization II as you lead your people to the promised land of peace and harmony with neighbouring cultures. That's one theory anyway, though what usually happens is that the Chinese whisper of international diplomacy means that the message gets distorted in transmission.
You start Civilization II as leader of a puny tribe of people, eking out a subsistence-level existence in a time where log fires are considered hi-tech. Using your leadership and strategy skills, you must explore your world, expand your empire and ensure the survival of your way of life in what can turn out to be a pretty dog-eat-dog world.
As time passes and your success builds you will form new alliances, make new enemies, discover new technologies and systems of government . . .all with the aim of ensuring the persistence of your civilisation. Noble aims which will sometimes mean brinkmanship, double-dealing and back-stabbing, but it's for the greater good, and all that.
Civilization II (USA).desc:
當你帶領你的人民走向與鄰近文化和平與和諧的樂土時，用《文明 II》重寫歷史。無論如何，這只是一種理論，儘管通常發生的情況是，中國在國際外交中的低語意味著信息在傳播過程中被扭曲。
在《文明 II》中，你是一個微不足道的部落的首領，在一個燃木火被認為是高科技的時代勉強維持生計。運用你的領導力和戰略技能，你必須探索你的世界，擴張你的帝國，並確保你的生活方式在這個可能會變成一個競爭激烈的世界中得以生存。
隨著時間的推移和你的成功不斷積累，你將結成新的聯盟，結交新的敵人，發現新技術和政府系統。。.一切都是為了確保你們文明的持久存在。崇高的目標有時意味著邊緣政策、兩面派和背後捅刀子，但這是為了更大的利益，等等。

Jade Cocoon - Story of the Tamamayu (USA.key: Jade Cocoon - Story of the Tamamayu (USA)
Jade Cocoon - Story of the Tamamayu (USA.original_name: Jade Cocoon : Story of the Tamamayu
Jade Cocoon - Story of the Tamamayu (USA.name: 玉繭：玉玉玉的故事
Jade Cocoon - Story of the Tamamayu (USA.original_desc: Jade Cocoon is the story of Levant, a young man who lives in the town of Syrus. You guide the silent protagonist on his quest to follow in his presumably dead father's footsteps to become a cocoon master. To do this, he must marry a Na'gi woman, and is betrothed to a girl named Mahbu (voiced by Michelle Ruff). On the day of a large festival in Syrus, the village is attacked by demons known as the Onibubu, which cause many villagers to fall into a deep slumber. An elderly Nagi woman, Garai, repels the Onibubu using Nagi magic before their curse affects everyone.
Jade Cocoon - Story of the Tamamayu (USA.desc: 《玉繭》講述了住在錫勒斯鎮的年輕人黎凡特的故事。你引導沉默的主角追隨他可能已經去世的父親的腳步，成為一名繭大師。為此，他必須娶一名納吉女子為妻，並與一位名叫馬布（米歇爾·拉夫 Michelle Ruff 配音）的女孩訂婚。在錫勒斯的一個大型節日當天，村莊遭到了被稱為“奧尼布布”的惡魔的襲擊，導致許多村民陷入沉睡。年長的凪婦女加萊在鬼布布的詛咒影響到所有人之前，使用凪魔法擊退了鬼布布。

RayCrisis - Series Termination (USA).name: 射線危機：系列終止
RayCrisis - Series Termination (USA).original_desc: An ambitious and unethical scientist, a secret experiment gone horribly awry, and an artificially intelligent supercomputer gone mad; all the necessary ingredients for the imminent extinction of mankind. You are humanity's last hope, a hotshot pilot given the unenviable task of flying an experimental fighter into the dark heart of the Con-Human Network. Seize the controls of three Wave Rider spacecraft, each equippped with the WR-01 primary weapon array, WR-02 secondary lock-on laser system, and WR-03 single-use weapon for emergency situations. RayCrisis: Series Termination is the final entry in Taito's acclaimed trilogy of shooters, and it bombards your CRT with an abundance of fourth-generation optical stimulation: multilevel scrolling, transparency and lighting effects, and enough polygons to overload your cerebral cortex. Dodge, weave, and blast through two play modes, disintegrating wave after wave of relentless bogeys, to achieve high scores and unlock hidden bonuses. Prepare your senses, reinforce your nerves, and limber your trigger finger - the final assault has begun!
RayCrisis - Series Termination (USA).desc: 一位野心勃勃、不道德的科學家，一項嚴重出錯的秘密實驗，以及一台發瘋的人工智能超級計算機；人類即將滅絕的所有必要因素。你是人類最後的希望，一名出色的飛行員，肩負著駕駛實驗戰鬥機進入人類網絡黑暗中心的艱鉅任務。控制三艘 Wave Rider 太空船，每艘太空船均配備 WR-01 主武器陣列、WR-02 輔助鎖定激光系統和 WR-03 緊急情況下一次性武器。RayCrisis: Series Termination 是 Taito 廣受好評的射擊遊戲三部曲中的最後一款，它用豐富的第四代光學刺激轟炸你的 CRT：多級滾動、透明度和燈光效果，以及足夠多的多邊形，讓你的大腦皮層超載。躲避、迂迴和爆炸兩種遊戲模式，瓦解一波又一波無情的柏忌，以獲得高分並解鎖隱藏的獎金。準備好你的感官，強化你的神經，放鬆你扣扳機的手指——最後的攻擊已經開始了！

Colony Wars - Red Sun (USA).name: 殖民地戰爭3：紅太陽
Colony Wars - Red Sun (USA).original_desc:
Colony Wars: Red Sun (called Colony Wars III: Red Sun in North America) is a space combat simulator video game for the PlayStation developed and released by Psygnosis in 2000. Other two episodes were released beforehand, namely Colony Wars in 1997 and Colony Wars: Vengeance in 1998.

Instead of being a starfighter pilot for the League of Free Worlds or the Colonial Navy, the player now assumes the role of a civilian miner-turned-mercenary.
Colony Wars - Red Sun (USA).desc:
《殖民地戰爭：紅日》（北美地區稱為《殖民地戰爭 III：紅日》）是一款由 Psygnosis 於 2000 年開發並發行的 PlayStation 太空戰鬥模擬遊戲。此前已發行了另外兩集，分別是 1997 年的《殖民地戰爭》和 1998 年的《殖民地戰爭：復仇》。

玩家不再是自由世界聯盟或殖民地海軍的星際戰鬥機飛行員，而是扮演一名由平民礦工轉變為僱傭兵的角色。

Oddworld - Abe's Exoddus (USA).name: 奇異世界：安倍出走
Oddworld - Abe's Exoddus (USA).original_desc:
Those nasty Glukons are at it again, intent on oppressing the loveable Mudokons any way they can. Last time, the meanies were manufacturing Mudokon jerky. Now, they've officially taken genocide too far, by forcing blind Mudokons into slave labor to dig up the bones of their fellow deceased. It so happens, by the way, that Mudokon bones add just the right kick to a favorite Glukon recipe, Soulstorm Brew.
 Who's gonna save the day? Our unlikely hero Abe, of course. You remember Abe: that blue-green, loincloth-wearing, six foot-tall Fraggle with chronic digestive problems? Yep, he would have been content to rest on his laurels after rescuing ninety-nine of his Mudokon buddies from extermination in Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee, but a group of disgruntled ghosts elected good ol' Abe to avenge their deaths.
Oddworld - Abe's Exoddus (USA).desc:
那些可惡的 Glukons 又來了，一心想盡一切辦法壓迫可愛的 Mudokons。上次，那些卑鄙小人正在生產Mudokon肉乾。現在，他們強迫失明的穆多孔人從事奴隸勞動，挖掘死者同胞的骨頭，這已經正式導致種族滅絕了。順便說一句，Mudokon 骨頭恰好為 Glukon 最受歡迎的配方 Soulstorm Brew 增添了恰到好處的風味。
誰來拯救世界？當然，我們不太可能的英雄安倍晉三。你還記得亞伯：那個身著藍綠色、繫著腰帶、六英尺高、患有慢性消化問題的弗拉格嗎？是的，在《奇異世界：亞伯的 Oddysee》中，他將 99 名 Mudokon 夥伴從滅絕中解救出來後，他本來會滿足於安於現狀，但一群心懷不滿的鬼魂選擇了善良的亞伯來為他們的死報仇。

Suikoden (USA) (Rev 1).name: 水古傳
Suikoden (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Loosely based on the classic medieval Chinese novel "Water Margins" (Shuihuzhuan) by Shi Nai'an. The game is a fantasy RPG set in an imaginary universe, its main theme being political struggle. The hero of the game is the young son of Theo McDohl, a general who serves the Scarlet Moon Empire, presently controlling the land of Toran. Through a series of events the hero becomes involved in a rebellion against the Empire, led by an organization known as the Liberation Army. Will the hero find a new home there, will he be able to tear himself away from everything that has been sacred to him, including his own father?

Suikoden is a console-style RPG with several unusual additions. There are three kinds of combat in the game, the most common one being the traditional turn-based party combat (players can have up to six people in their active party). Magic runes can be equipped on the player's characters which allow limited usage of offensive and healing spells. There are also army battles, where the player must control whole units of fighters, archers, magicians, etc., and one-on-one fights.

The game allows the player to build and customize a castle, which serves as their home base and fortress.108 characters can be recruited in the game, a tribute to 108 Stars Of Destiny in "Water Margins". Many of those characters will be available as active party members and participate in battles, while others will act as strategy advisers, or enhance the castle itself in various ways.
Suikoden (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
改編自施耐庵的中國中世紀經典小說《水滸傳》。該遊戲是一款以虛構宇宙為背景的奇幻角色扮演遊戲，其主題是政治鬥爭。遊戲的英雄是西奧·麥克道爾的小兒子，西奧·麥克道爾是一名將軍，服務於赤月帝國，目前控制著托蘭土地。通過一系列事件，英雄捲入了由解放軍組織領導的針對帝國的叛亂。英雄能否在那裡找到新家，能否擺脫對他來說神聖的一切，包括他自己的父親？

《Suikoden》是一款主機風格的角色扮演遊戲，添加了一些不尋常的內容。遊戲中有三種戰斗方式，最常見的一種是傳統的回合製隊伍戰鬥（玩家的活動隊伍中最多可以有六人）。玩家的角色可以裝備魔法符文，從而限制攻擊和治療法術的使用。還有軍隊戰鬥，玩家必須控制戰士、弓箭手、魔法師等整個部隊，以及一對一的戰鬥。

遊戲允許玩家建造和定制一座城堡，作為自己的大本營和要塞。遊戲中可以招募108名角色，致敬《水滸傳》中的108位命運星。其中許多角色將作為活躍的黨員並參與戰鬥，而其他角色將充當戰略顧問，或以各種方式增強城堡本身。

Gundam Battle Assault (USA).name: 高達戰鬥突擊
Gundam Battle Assault (USA).original_desc:
This game is the follow-up to Gundam: The Battle Master. Heero Yuy, the pilot of a Mobile Suit Wing Gundam is on a mission to destroy the remaining enemy Mobile Suits, who are under the command of Treize Khushrenada, in order to stop a war from starting. In the story mode, Heero can pilot any of the available mobile suits to do battle with his enemies. Each suit has its own set of special moves and a super attack. Some of the weapon based special attacks use ammunition which can eventually run out. The super attack can only be used 3 times during each fight. Each suit also has thrusters that can be used to fly in the air a bit. On the defensive side, players can dodge attacks by sidestepping and also can utilize a beam shield which can be used to protect the player from projectile attacks. Mobile suits come with 3 life bars total and fights are decided by trying to deplete all the life bars of an enemy mobile suit.

The game also contains a 2 player versus mode. 

Options allow the player to choose their difficulty level and also let them set the timer during a match to either on or off.
Gundam Battle Assault (USA).desc:
本作是《機動戰士高達：戰斗大師》的續作。機動戰士飛翼高達的駕駛員希羅·尤伊（Heero Yuy）的任務是消滅特雷茲·庫什雷納達（Treize Khushrenada）指揮下剩餘的敵方機動戰士，以阻止戰爭的爆發。在故事模式中，Heero 可以駕駛任何可用的機動戰士與敵人作戰。每個套裝都有自己的一套特殊動作和超級攻擊。一些基於武器的特殊攻擊使用的彈藥最終可能會耗盡。每場戰鬥中超級攻擊只能使用3次。每套套裝還配有推進器，可用於在空中飛行一會兒。在防禦方面，玩家可以通過閃避來躲避攻擊，也可以使用光束盾來保護玩家免受投射物攻擊。機動戰士總共有 3 個生命條，戰鬥是通過嘗試耗盡敵方機動戰士的所有生命條來決定的。

遊戲還包含 2 人對戰模式。

選項允許玩家選擇難度級別，還可以讓他們在比賽期間將計時器設置為打開或關閉。

Xevious 3D-G+ (USA).name: 以前的 3D/G+
Xevious 3D-G+ (USA).original_desc:
In Xevious 3-D/G+, you pilot a sleek Solvalou space fighter blasting and bombing your way through an overwhelming alien invasion force consisting of airborne attackers, ground defenses, and enormous "boss" motherships.
			Based on the premise that aliens who originally settled Earth have returned (and they're not happy about the proliferation of the human race, go figure), Xevious 3-D/G+ is a 3-D remake of the original Namco classic Xevious (licensed to Atari in the early 1980s).
			The new game sticks to the basic concepts of the original Xevious, right down to the familiar overhead view. Power-ups offer new weapons such as constant-fire, electrocution beams and wide-dispersal lasers --- but along with new weapons come new enemies and new bosses who aren't quite so easy to eliminate.
			Included as a bonus are the original Xevious, emulated to perfection (a nice addition since the only other PlayStation version available is on the rather hard-to-find Namco Museum Volume 2), and the only console version available of Xevious Arrangement, a more obscure coin-up conversion designed to vex those who had plowed their way through the original.
Xevious 3D-G+ (USA).desc:
在《Xevious 3-D/G+》中，您駕駛一架時尚的索爾瓦盧太空戰鬥機，在由空降攻擊者、地面防禦和巨大的“頭目”母艦組成的壓倒性外星入侵部隊中一路狂轟濫炸。
基於最初定居地球的外星人已經返回的前提（他們對人類的繁衍並不滿意，想想吧），Xevious 3-D/G+ 是原版 Namco 經典 Xevious（在 1980 年代初授權給 Atari）的 3-D 重製版。
新遊戲堅持了原版 Xevious 的基本概念，包括熟悉的俯視圖。強化道具提供了新武器，例如持續射擊、電擊光束和大範圍激光——但隨著新武器的出現，新的敵人和新的頭目也不是那麼容易消滅的。
作為獎勵，包括完美模擬的原版《Xevious》（這是一個很好的補充，因為唯一可用的其他 PlayStation 版本是在相當難找到的 Namco Museum Volume 2 上），以及《Xevious Arrangement》唯一可用的控制台版本，這是一個更晦澀的硬幣轉換，旨在讓那些已經努力完成原版的人感到煩惱。

Policenauts (Japan) (Translated).name: 警察
Policenauts (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
One day, during a routine patrol on Beyond Coast, something happens to Jonathan's space suit. He is sucked into space and is presumed dead. But twenty-five years later, he is miraculously discovered in his life pod... alive. He still looks like a young man, but in reality he is 55 years old.

Trying to forget his past, Jonathan opens an investigation agency on Earth. His ex-wife (who has re-married during those twenty-five years) visits him and asks him to find her missing husband. When she leaves the office, her car explodes, and she dies. Determined to fulfill her final request, Jonathan prepares to re-visit Beyond Coast...
Policenauts (Japan) (Translated).desc:
有一天，在超越海岸的例行巡邏中，喬納森的宇航服出了問題。他被吸入太空並被認為已經死亡。但二十五年後，他在生命艙中奇蹟般地被發現……還活著。他看上去還很年輕，但實際上已經55歲了。

為了忘記自己的過去，喬納森在地球上開設了一家調查機構。他的前妻（在那二十五年裡再婚了）拜訪他並請求他尋找她失踪的丈夫。當她離開辦公室時，她的車爆炸了，她死了。喬納森決心完成她最後的請求，準備再次訪問超越海岸……

Yutona Eiyuu Senki - TearRingSaga (Japan.name: 撕裂傳奇
Yutona Eiyuu Senki - TearRingSaga (Japan.original_desc:
Tear Ring Saga is a tactical RPG with gameplay very similar to the gameplay found in the Fire Emblem series of video games. The game was created as a spiritual sequel to Fire Emblem by the game's creator, Shouzou Kaga, who no longer had the rights to the Fire Emblem intellectual property upon leaving Intelligent Systems and Nintendo. The game shares the same interface, graphical and music style, and overall gameflow.The game involves the player moving characters in a turn based fashion across a large grid from a top-down perspective. The player is tasked with certain objectives, commonly fighting and defeating an entire opposing faction, or a particular member or leader of a faction.

There are two protagonists in the game, Runan and Holmes, each with their own army to command. Though the two armies travel separately for the majority of the game, they cross paths at several points of the story, allowing the player to switch allocations of fighters and items amongst the two groups. Runan's story follows a strict set of scenarios where he battles against an enemy empire, while Holme's scenario allows for more freedom, allowing the player to ignore the main scenarios in favor of gathering treasure and increase the army's strength.
Yutona Eiyuu Senki - TearRingSaga (Japan.desc:
《Tear Ring Saga》是一款戰術角色扮演遊戲，其遊戲玩法與《火焰之紋章》系列視頻遊戲中的遊戲玩法非常相似。該遊戲是由遊戲創作者加賀翔三（Shouzou Kaga）作為《火焰紋章》的精神續作而創作的，在離開Intelligent Systems和任天堂後，他不再擁有《火焰紋章》的知識產權。該遊戲共享相同的界面、圖形和音樂風格以及整體遊戲流程。該遊戲涉及玩家從自上而下的角度以基於回合的方式在大網格上移動角色。玩家的任務是實現某些目標，通常是戰鬥並擊敗整個敵對派系，或派系的特定成員或領導人。

遊戲中有兩位主角，魯南和福爾摩斯，每個人都有自己的軍隊可供指揮。儘管兩支軍隊在遊戲的大部分時間裡各自行進，但它們在故事的幾個點上有交叉，允許玩家在兩組之間切換戰士和物品的分配。魯南的故事遵循一系列嚴格的場景，他與敵方帝國作戰，而霍姆的場景則提供了更多的自由，允許玩家忽略主要場景，有利於收集寶藏並增強軍隊的實力。

Tomb Raider II - Starring Lara Croft (US.key: Tomb Raider II - Starring Lara Croft (USA) (Rev 3)
Tomb Raider II - Starring Lara Croft (US.original_name: Tomb Raider II : Starring Lara Croft
Tomb Raider II - Starring Lara Croft (US.name: 古墓麗影 II：勞拉·克勞馥主演
Tomb Raider II - Starring Lara Croft (US.original_desc: The story of Tomb Raider II surrounds the mythical Dagger of Xian, a weapon which was used by an Emperor of China to command his army. By plunging the weapon into its owner's heart, the weapon has the power to turn its bearer into a dragon. A flashback reveals that the last battle which was fought with the Dagger ended in defeat when the warrior monks of Tibet succeeded in removing the knife from the Emperor's heart. The Dagger was then returned to its resting place within the Great Wall.
Tomb Raider II - Starring Lara Croft (US.desc: 《古墓麗影 II》的故事圍繞著神秘的西安匕首展開，這是中國皇帝用來指揮軍隊的武器。通過將武器插入其主人的心臟，該武器具有將持有者變成龍的力量。閃回顯示，最後一場與匕首的戰鬥以失敗告終，西藏的武僧成功地將刀從皇帝的心臟上拔了下來。隨後，匕首被送回長城內的安放處。

Tekken (USA).name: 鐵拳
Tekken (USA).original_desc:
Tekken is an arcade fighting game franchise created and developed by Namco. Beginning with the original Tekken arcade game released in 1994, the series has received several sequels, as well as various home conversions and spin-off titles released for consoles. The story in each game in the main series documents the events of the fictional martial arts tournament, The King of Iron Fist Tournament, which is hosted by the Mishima Zaibatsu corporation. The prize is typically control of the company, which then allows the winner to host the following tournament.
The arcade versions of the game have traditionally used PlayStation based hardware to run the games, and subsequently each Tekken installment was eventually made for its respective PlayStation.
Tekken (USA).desc:
《鐵拳》是由 Namco 創建和開發的街機格鬥遊戲系列。從 1994 年發布的原版《鐵拳》街機遊戲開始，該系列已經推出了幾款續集，以及為遊戲機發布的各種家庭改裝遊戲和衍生遊戲。主系列中每款遊戲的故事都記錄了由三島財閥公司主辦的虛構武術錦標賽“鐵拳之王錦標賽”的事件。獎品通常由公司控制，然後獲勝者可以主辦接下來的比賽。
該遊戲的街機版本傳統上使用基於 PlayStation 的硬件來運行遊戲，隨後每個《鐵拳》系列最終都是為其各自的 PlayStation 製作的。

Spider-Man (USA).name: 蜘蛛俠
Spider-Man (USA).original_desc:
Spider-Man is the first 3D game to star the popular web-slinger.  It is loosely based on Spider-Man: The Animated Series and Spider-Man Unlimited and features some of the voice cast from each and similar character designs.

Peter Parker is attending a demonstration of the reformed Dr. Otto Octavius's new invention when an imposter Spider-Man steals the device.  Spider-Man must work to clear his name and uncover the sinister motives behind the device's theft.

This game features appearances not only by most major Spider-Man characters, but cameos by numerous other characters from the Marvel Universe, such as the Human Torch, Punisher, Daredevil and Captain America.

Spider-Man's webs are greatly emphasized.  He can use them both for navigational purposes, like swinging or ziplining, and for offensive and defensive combat, such as tying up a villain, coating his fists with web for extra oomph, or building a protective shield.  His web supply is limited though and he must find new cartridges or risk running out.  The wall-crawling powers are also prominently features.  Spider-Man can cling to any wall or ceiling.  This is used for basic environmental navigation and for stealth as there are many sequences where you crawl over the heads of unsuspecting thugs, or drop down and catch them off-guard.

Combat is based around Spider-Man's ability to jump, kick, punch and web.  By combining these with direction and in various combinations, Spider-Man is able to throw objects such as furniture, hurl web balls, yank enemies into melee range and follow up with a flurry of hits, among other things.  There are a number of boss-battles as well, all of which are puzzle-based.

Missions vary from the fairly common fight-your way-to-the-goal or find-the-key-that-unlocks-the-door types to races to catch some or evade them or just trying to avoid the police.

There are several side goals in addition the main mission including multiple unlockable Spider-Man costumes and numerous hidden comic book covers to find.
Spider-Man (USA).desc:
《蜘蛛俠》是第一款以流行的蜘蛛俠為主角的 3D 遊戲。它大致以《蜘蛛俠：動畫系列》和《蜘蛛俠無限》為基礎，並採用了各自的配音演員和類似的角色設計。

彼得·帕克正在參加改革後的奧托·奧克塔維斯博士的新發明演示，這時冒名頂替的蜘蛛俠偷走了該設備。蜘蛛俠必須努力洗清自己的罪名，並揭開設備盜竊背後的險惡動機。

這款遊戲不僅有大多數主要蜘蛛俠角色的出場，還有漫威宇宙中許多其他角色的客串，例如霹靂火、懲罰者、夜魔俠和美國隊長。

蜘蛛俠的網得到了極大的強調。他可以將它們用於導航目的，例如鞦韆或滑索，也可以用於進攻和防禦戰鬥，例如綁住惡棍，用網覆蓋他的拳頭以增加力量，或建造防護罩。不過，他的網絡供應有限，他必須找到新的墨盒，否則就有耗盡的危險。爬牆能力也是一個顯著特徵。蜘蛛俠可以粘在任何牆壁或天花板上。這用於基本的環境導航和隱身，因為在很多場景中，你會爬過毫無戒心的暴徒的頭頂，或者掉下來讓他們措手不及。

戰鬥以蜘蛛俠的跳躍、踢腿、拳擊和結網能力為基礎。通過將這些與方向和各種組合相結合，蜘蛛俠能夠投擲家具等物體、投擲網球、將敵人拉入近戰範圍並隨後進行一系列攻擊等等。還有許多 Boss 戰，所有這些都是基於謎題的。

任務多種多樣，從相當常見的戰鬥類型（一路戰鬥到目標或找到鑰匙打開門）到競速抓住一些人或躲避他們，或者只是試圖躲避警察。

除了主要任務之外，還有幾個支線目標，包括多套可解鎖的蜘蛛俠服裝和許多隱藏的漫畫書封面可供尋找。

Final Fantasy Tactics (USA).name: 最终幻想XII
Final Fantasy Tactics (USA).original_desc: Final Fantasy Tactics is a tactical role-playing game developed and published by Square (now Square Enix) for the Sony PlayStation video game console. It is the first game of the Final Fantasy Tactics series and was released in Japan in June 1997 and in the United States in January 1998. The game combines thematic elements of the Final Fantasy video game series with a game engine and battle system unlike those previously seen in the franchise. In contrast to other 32-bit era Final Fantasy titles, Final Fantasy Tactics uses a 3D, isometric, rotatable playing field, with bitmap sprite characters.
Final Fantasy Tactics (USA).desc: 《最終幻想戰略版》是一款由史克威爾（現為史克威爾艾尼克斯）為索尼 PlayStation 視頻遊戲機開發和發行的戰術角色扮演遊戲。它是《最終幻想戰略版》系列的第一款遊戲，於 1997 年 6 月在日本發行，並於 1998 年 1 月在美國發行。該遊戲結合了《最終幻想》視頻遊戲系列的主題元素以及不同於該系列之前的遊戲引擎和戰鬥系統。與其他 32 位時代的《最終幻想》遊戲相比，《最終幻想戰略版》使用 3D、等距、可旋轉的遊戲場，並帶有位圖精靈角色。

Final Fantasy VIII (USA).name: 最終幻想VIII
Final Fantasy VIII (USA).original_desc:
A member of an elite military team, Squall is forced into a conflict beyond imagination.  To survive, he must contend with a desperate rival, a powerful sorceress, and his own mysterious dreams.

* Realistic, detailed characters and background graphics enhanced by a breathtaking musical score
* An epic story based on the theme of love, set in a massive new world
* New Junction System allows characters to be customized with powerful magic spells drawn from enemies
* Nearly an hour of stunning motion-captured CG cinemas seamlessly integrated into gameplay
Final Fantasy VIII (USA).desc:
作為精英軍事團隊的一員，斯考爾被迫捲入一場超乎想像的衝突。為了生存，他必須與絕望的對手、強大的女巫以及他自己神秘的夢想作鬥爭。

* 令人驚嘆的樂譜增強了逼真、細緻的角色和背景圖形
* 以愛情為主題的史詩故事，背景設定在一個巨大的新世界
* 新的連接系統允許使用從敵人身上汲取的強大魔法來定制角色
* 近一小時的令人驚嘆的動作捕捉 CG 影院無縫集成到遊戲中

Lunar - Silver Star Story Complete (USA).name: 月球：銀星故事完成
Lunar - Silver Star Story Complete (USA).original_desc: Alex, a young boy from a small humble town, enters a life of adventure and intrigue after being chosen as the heir-apparent to the title of "Dragonmaster", guardian of the forces of the planet. With the help of his expanding band of companions, Alex must pass the trials set by ancient dragons to claim his place in history, and stop a powerful sorcerer and former hero, Ghaleon, from controlling the world.
Lunar - Silver Star Story Complete (USA).desc: 亞歷克斯是一個來自簡陋小鎮的小男孩，在被選為地球力量守護者“龍王”頭銜的繼承人後，開始了充滿冒險和陰謀的生活。在不斷壯大的同伴隊伍的幫助下，亞歷克斯必須通過遠古巨龍所設置的考驗，以在歷史上佔據一席之地，並阻止強大的巫師和前英雄蓋倫控制世界。

Gran Turismo 2 (USA) (Arcade Mode) (Rev.name: GT賽車2
Gran Turismo 2 (USA) (Arcade Mode) (Rev.original_desc: Gran Turismo 2 is fundamentally based on the racing game genre. The player must maneuver an automobile to compete against artificially intelligent drivers on various race tracks. The game uses two different modes: arcade and simulation. In the arcade mode, the player can freely choose the courses and vehicles they wish to use. However, the simulation mode requires the player to earn driver's licenses, pay for vehicles, and earn trophies in order to unlock new courses. Gran Turismo 2 features nearly 650 automobiles and 27 racing tracks.
Gran Turismo 2 (USA) (Arcade Mode) (Rev.desc: Gran Turismo 2 基本上是基於賽車遊戲類型。玩家必須操縱汽車在各種賽道上與人工智能駕駛員競爭。遊戲使用兩種不同的模式：街機和模擬。在街機模式中，玩家可以自由選擇他們想要使用的路線和車輛。然而，模擬模式要求玩家獲得駕駛執照、支付車輛費用並贏得獎杯才能解鎖新課程。Gran Turismo 2 擁有近 650 輛汽車和 27 條賽道。

Silent Hill (USA).name: 沉默之丘：驟雨
Silent Hill (USA).original_desc:
Silent Hill is a 1999 survival horror video game for the PlayStation. The first in a series about a mysterious town of the same name, Silent Hill generated a direct sequel, three indirect sequels, a prequel and a film adaptation. The game was included in Sony's Greatest Hits and Platinum Range of budget titles as a result of strong sales. A reinterpretation of the game was developed for the Wii, PlayStation 2 and PlayStation Portable.
The plot focuses on Harry Mason as he searches for his daughter, Cheryl, who has disappeared following a car accident which left Harry unconscious. He finds Silent Hill to be largely abandoned, shrouded in a thick fog, snowing out of season, filled with monsters and being over taken by a hellish otherworld. As Harry scours the town, he begins learning about the history of Silent Hill and stumbles upon a cult ritual undertaken to bring a god to Earth.
Silent Hill (USA).desc:
《寂靜嶺》是一款 1999 年推出的 PlayStation 生存恐怖視頻遊戲。《寂靜嶺》是關於同名神秘小鎮的系列中的第一部，製作了一部直接續集、三部間接續集、一部前傳和一部改編電影。由於銷量強勁，該遊戲被列入索尼最暢銷遊戲和白金系列預算遊戲中。該遊戲的重新詮釋是針對 Wii、PlayStation 2 和 PlayStation Portable 開發的。
劇情聚焦於哈利·梅森尋找女兒謝麗爾的故事，謝麗爾在一場車禍中失踪，導致哈利失去知覺。他發現寂靜嶺大部分已被遺棄，籠罩在濃霧中，下著反季節的雪，充滿了怪物，並被地獄般的另一個世界所佔領。當哈利搜尋小鎮時，他開始了解寂靜嶺的歷史，並偶然發現了一個將神帶到地球的邪教儀式。

Colony Wars (USA).name: 殖民地戰爭
Colony Wars (USA).original_desc:
Since 3095, the Earth Empire has spread throughout the universe, taking what it wants and destroying the rest - all in the name of sustaining life on Earth.  To the Empire, expansion is of the utmost importance, even above famine, drought and death.

The League of Free Worlds exists to offer resistance and hope to the plundered outlying colonies.  After a key victory, it is shown that the Empire's Navy can be harmed and the ranks of the League begin to swell.

Colony Wars is a combat fighter game set in space.  You, as the player, join as a recruit in the League's fleet.  Missions take place in various fighters, from a 1st person view inside the cockpit, or a 3rd person view from behind your ship. Ships have separate meters for shields and armor, and the player must cycle between weapons designed specifically to damage each. At the most basic, purple lasers must drain a target's shields, followed by switching to red lasers to destroy them.

The game features advanced lighting and particle effects for the Playstation, as well as a basic simulation of Newtonian physics. Thrusters are only active for as long as the accelerate button is held down. The player can burst fire their thrusters and drift, allowing for some advanced maneuvers. The campaign also features multiple endings and branching missions/storylines, based on your performance in the previous operations.
Colony Wars (USA).desc:
自 3095 年以來，地球帝國已經遍布整個宇宙，奪取它想要的東西，摧毀其餘的——這一切都是以維持地球生命的名義。對於帝國來說，擴張是最重要的，甚至高於飢荒、乾旱和死亡。

自由世界聯盟的存在是為了向被掠奪的邊遠殖民地提供抵抗和希望。一場關鍵的勝利之後，表明帝國海軍可能會受到傷害，聯盟的隊伍開始壯大。

《殖民地戰爭》是一款以太空為背景的格鬥遊戲。作為玩家，你作為新兵加入聯盟艦隊。任務發生在各種戰鬥機上，從駕駛艙內的第一人稱視角，或從船後的第三人稱視角。船隻的盾牌和裝甲有單獨的計量表，玩家必須在專門設計用於損壞每種武器的武器之間循環。最基本的是，紫色激光必須耗盡目標的護盾，然後切換到紅色激光來摧毀它們。

該遊戲具有適用於 Playstation 的先進燈光和粒子效果，以及牛頓物理學的基本模擬。僅當按下加速按鈕時推進器才會激活。玩家可以對推進器進行點射並進行漂移，從而進行一些高級機動。該戰役還具有多個結局和分支任務/故事情節，具體取決於您在之前行動中的表現。

Tempest X3 (USA).name: 暴風雨X3
Tempest X3 (USA).original_desc:
In Tempest X3 for the PlayStation, you control a claw that perches and crawls around the outer edge of a series of geometrically shaped, tube-like constructs, shooting down or out into the nebulous void of outer space. From the core of this void, fuseballs, rockets, pulsars, tankers and other hazardous aliens and alien artifacts move toward your ship. Once you clear a screen, you fly into the void and onto the next level. Watch out for spikes as you advance.
 This game features three modes of play: Classic Tempest, which is based on the early 1980s Arcade smash simply titled Tempest; an update of Tempest called Tempest X, which features a jump feature, A.I. Droids that help you fight and enhanced graphics and sound; and Tempest Duel, which pits you against a friend and the Generator, which cranks out an endless source of enemies.
 Features:
 * Blast through 99 colorful levels
 * Features both competitive and cooperative play for two
 * Includes the 1981 original and an enhanced version with new layouts and weapons
Tempest X3 (USA).desc:
在 PlayStation 版 Tempest X3 中，你可以控制一隻爪子，它棲息在一系列幾何形狀的管狀結構的外緣上並爬行，向下或向外射入外太空的模糊虛空。從這個虛空的核心，引信球、火箭、脈衝星、油輪和其他危險的外星人和外星文物向你的飛船移動。一旦你清除了一個屏幕，你就會飛入虛空並進入下一個關卡。當你前進時要小心尖峰。
該遊戲具有三種遊戲模式： 經典暴風雨 (Classic Tempest)，基於 20 世紀 80 年代早期的街機遊戲，簡稱為暴風雨 (Tempest)； Tempest 的更新版 Tempest X，具有跳躍功能、A.I.幫助你戰鬥並增強圖形和聲音的機器人；暴風雨決鬥，讓你與朋友和生成器對抗，生成器會產生無窮無盡的敵人。
特點：
* 闖過 99 個色彩繽紛的關卡
* 具有兩人競爭和合作遊戲功能
* 包括 1981 年原版和帶有新佈局和武器的增強版

Final Fantasy Chronicles - Final Fantasy.key: Final Fantasy Chronicles - Final Fantasy IV (USA) (Rev 1)
Final Fantasy Chronicles - Final Fantasy.original_name: Final Fantasy Chronicles : Final Fantasy IV
Final Fantasy Chronicles - Final Fantasy.name: 最終幻想IV
Final Fantasy Chronicles - Final Fantasy.original_desc: This classic adventure includes 18 towns and castles, dozens of magical spells, and hundreds of monsters, weapons, and items to help players on their quests. The game features the astounding music, challenging adventures, and interesting storyline that are the hallmarks of the Final Fantasy franchise
Final Fantasy Chronicles - Final Fantasy.desc: 這個經典的冒險包括 18 個城鎮和城堡、數十種魔法咒語以及數百種怪物、武器和物品，以幫助玩家完成任務。該遊戲具有令人驚嘆的音樂、富有挑戰性的冒險和有趣的故事情節，這些都是《最終幻想》系列的標誌

Syphon Filter (USA) (Rev 1).name: 虹吸過濾器
Syphon Filter (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Gabriel Logan, one of the government's top covert agents, must neutralize the terrorists that threaten Washington D.C. and destroy a biological weapon that has been built to end the lives of millions of innocent people. 

Syphon Filter is an action game played from the 3rd person. Players take the role of Gabiel Logan as well as other CBDC agents. 
To successfully complete the mission, players must utilize each of the character's skills accordingly. Logan is able to kneel, crouch, walk, roll, climb, jump and run to meet his objectives.

The action unfolds over thirteen missions that are chock full of dangers, hazards and puzzles.
Syphon Filter (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
加布里埃爾·洛根是政府高級秘密特工之一，他必須消滅威脅華盛頓特區的恐怖分子，並銷毀一種旨在結束數百萬無辜人民生命的生物武器。

虹吸過濾器是一款第三人稱動作遊戲。玩家扮演 Gabiel Logan 以及其他 CBDC 特工。
為了成功完成任務，玩家必須相應地利用每個角色的技能。洛根能夠通過跪下、蹲下、行走、翻滾、攀爬、跳躍和奔跑來實現他的目標。

劇情圍繞十三個任務展開，充滿了危險、危險和謎題。

MDK (USA).name: MDK
MDK (USA).original_desc:
MDK is a 3rd person action/shooter game in which the objective is to basically shoot everything that moves in six massive cities, each with their own sublevels. Because the world is being invaded by aliens, it is up to you and your sidekick Bones to stop the invasion and single handedly save Earth. In order to do so, you must make good use of your special suit, which allows you to do all kinds of things.
 The super-suit comes equipped with many features you'll need to utilize in your journey, such as the sniper helmet. This allows you to zoom in on unsuspecting enemies and fire off shots with pinpoint accuracy. There is also a built in parachute (a ribbon-like device) that enables you to glide between different platforms as well as drop down on intruders.
 Your suit comes equipped with a chain gun that has an infinite supply of ammunition. You can also pick up special items, like a miniature nuclear bomb and powerful upgrades for your chaingun. In addition to running around and shooting, there are also special means of transportation including a surfboard-like jet and a bomber plane that is used to call in air strikes.
MDK (USA).desc:
MDK 是一款第三人稱動作/射擊遊戲，其目標基本上是射擊六個大城市中移動的所有物體，每個城市都有自己的子級別。因為世界正在被外星人入侵，所以你和你的伙伴骨頭們有責任阻止入侵並單槍匹馬拯救地球。為了做到這一點，你必須充分利用你的特殊套裝，它可以讓你做各種各樣的事情。
超級套裝配備了您在旅途中需要使用的許多功能，例如狙擊頭盔。這使您可以放大毫無戒心的敵人並精確射擊。還有一個內置的降落傘（一種類似絲帶的裝置），可以讓你在不同的平台之間滑翔，也可以降落在入侵者身上。
你的套裝配備了一把擁有無限彈藥供應的鏈槍。您還可以拾取特殊物品，例如微型核彈和鏈槍的強大升級。除了四處奔跑和射擊之外，還有特殊的交通工具，包括衝浪板般的噴氣式飛機和用於呼叫空襲的轟炸機。

Mega Man Legends (USA).name: 洛克人傳奇
Mega Man Legends (USA).original_desc:
THE BLUE BOMBER BLASTS INTO A WHOLE NEW DIMENSION

Mega Man blasts his way into the third dimension in an amazing new adventure. Mega Man Legends combines the best of classic Mega Man action with enormous bosses, a riveting storyline, and all the depth of the hottest RPG.

Explore vast 3-D worlds in your quest to find the treasure of all treasures, the Mother Lode. You'll love the new 3-D graphics, deadly weapons, and non-stop action... unless of course, you're a boss.
Mega Man Legends (USA).desc:
藍色轟炸機進入全新維度

《洛克人》在一場令人驚嘆的新冒險中闖入三維世界。《洛克人傳奇》將經典洛克人動作的精華與巨大的 Boss、引人入勝的故事情節以及最熱門角色扮演遊戲的所有深度結合在一起。

探索廣闊的 3D 世界，尋找寶藏中的寶藏——母礦脈。您一定會喜歡新的 3D 圖形、致命武器和不間斷的動作……當然，除非您是老闆。

Tenchu 2 - Birth of the Stealth Assassin.key: Tenchu 2 - Birth of the Stealth Assassins (USA)
Tenchu 2 - Birth of the Stealth Assassin.original_name: Tenchu 2 : Birth of the Stealth Assassins
Tenchu 2 - Birth of the Stealth Assassin.name: 天誅2：隱形刺客的誕生
Tenchu 2 - Birth of the Stealth Assassin.original_desc: Before the events of Tenchu, the House of Gohda is rocked by betrayal. As shadow warriors Rikimaru, Ayame and Tatsumaru, you are called on to restore pride to the name of your master. For you have been born to a life of honor... a life of stealth. Discover even more ways to slay your foes with 21 new stealth kill techniques. Take on the role of three ninja assassins, each with their own story and fighting techniques. Strike from the shadows in 29 new day and night stealth missions. Utilize a variety of new ninja weapons and items, like flaming arrows and invisibility.
Tenchu 2 - Birth of the Stealth Assassin.desc: 在天誅事件發生之前，戈達家族因背叛而震動。作為影子戰士 Rikimaru、Ayame 和 Tatsumaru，你們被要求恢復主人的榮耀。因為你生來就過著榮耀的生活……隱秘的生活。通過 21 種新的潛行殺戮技巧，發現更多殺死敵人的方法。扮演三個忍者刺客的角色，每個人都有自己的故事和戰鬥技巧。執行 29 項新的晝夜潛行任務，從暗處發起攻擊。使用各種新的忍者武器和物品，例如火焰箭和隱形術。

Tekken 2 (USA) (Rev 1).name: 铁拳2
Tekken 2 (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
MORE THAN A SEQUEL. THE UNDISPUTED #1 FIGHTING GAME ON THE PLANET.

23 OF THE GREATEST FIGHTERS ON EARTH.
Includes new characters, new bosses, each with new ways to inflict multiple ten-hit combos.

23 NEW STAGES.
Mind blowing backgrounds with phenomenal light-sourcing. Jam to 23 new music tracks as you jam an opponents face in the ground.

BRAND NEW 3D ANIMATIONS.
Cinematics at their finest. All-new intro sequence plus animations for each character not found in the arcade version.

THREE NEW FIGHTING MODES.
Not available in the original: Survival Mode, Battle Mode & Practice Mode.

MORE MOVES AND MULTIPLE COMBOS.
New attack and throw reversals plus new bone-snapping techniques.
Tekken 2 (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
不僅僅是續集。全球無可爭議的排名第一的格鬥遊戲。

地球上最偉大的 23 名戰士。
包括新角色、新老闆，每個角色都有新的方式來造成多個十連擊組合。

23 個新階段。
令人興奮的背景與驚人的光源。當你將對手的臉按在地上時，你可以隨著 23 首新音樂曲目即興演奏。

全新 3D 動畫。
最好的電影。街機版本中沒有的每個角色的全新介紹序列和動畫。

三種新的戰鬥模式。
原版中不提供：生存模式、戰鬥模式和練習模式。

更多動作和多種組合。
新的攻擊和投擲逆轉以及新的折骨技術。

Parasite Eve (USA).name: 寄生前夜
Parasite Eve (USA).original_desc:
An ordinary day in New York for rookie police officer Aya Brea. Christmas Eve is the present day, and you've decided to visit the opera theater. Now this is where the fireworks begin. Suddenly audience members are set on fire, toasted completely, and it appears that the lead vocal is the source of this burning terror. Yet you appear to be immune, and as a police officer you're always on duty, so you must confront the danger.

There has to be some connection between the two of you, as that seems the only rational explanation. What if mitochondria are a species on its own, more advanced then humankind, and using them only to create environments and civilization for themselves? What if humankind are just hosts? What if mitochondria are the natural enemy of humankind? That would make Aya their natural enemy, so the battle for survival and uncovering the truth has already started.

The game is played over six days, each day bringing its own quest. Environments range from Central Park and the American Museum of Natural History to a police office and hospital, all of them modeled like realistic places and most of them crawling with bloodthirsty mutant animals. Combat is different from traditional RPGs, as while you still take turns attacking and/or using parasite powers, you'll be able to run across the battlefield and dodge enemy fire or even strike from a better angle or behind. As Aya levels up she will gain access to parasite powers, such as healing or supercharging a bullet with energy. These powers will deplete a recharging energy bar, although the bar will recharge slower the longer combat drags on. Aya will find many guns of various types throughout the game, and every gun can be modified with extra stats, either with special items, or by breaking down another gun to move over its bonus stats or special effects. The same is true for armor Aya finds.
Parasite Eve (USA).desc:
對於新秀警官阿亞·布雷亞來說，這是紐約平凡的一天。今天是平安夜，您決定去參觀歌劇院。現在這就是煙花開始的地方。突然間，觀眾們被點燃了，完全被乾杯了，而主唱似乎就是這種燃燒的恐怖的根源。然而你似乎免疫，作為一名警察，你總是在值班，所以你必鬚麵對危險。

你們兩個之間一定有某種聯繫，因為這似乎是唯一合理的解釋。如果線粒體是一個獨立的物種，比人類更先進，並且僅利用它們為自己創造環境和文明，該怎麼辦？如果人類只是宿主怎麼辦？如果線粒體是人類的天敵怎麼辦？這將使阿雅成為他們的天敵，因此生存和揭露真相的戰鬥已經開始。

遊戲持續六天，每天都有自己的任務。環境範圍從中央公園和美國自然歷史博物館到警察局和醫院，所有這些都模仿現實的地方，並且其中大多數爬滿了嗜血的突變動物。戰鬥與傳統角色扮演遊戲不同，雖然你仍然輪流攻擊和/或使用寄生力量，但你將能夠穿過戰場並躲避敵人的火力，甚至從更好的角度或後面進行攻擊。隨著艾雅升級，她將獲得寄生力量，例如治療或為子彈增壓。這些力量會耗盡正在充電的能量條，儘管戰鬥拖得越久，能量條的充電速度就越慢。阿雅在整個遊戲中會發現許多不同類型的槍，每把槍都可以用額外的統計數據進行修改，可以使用特殊物品，也可以通過分解另一把槍來移動其獎勵統計數據或特殊效果。阿雅發現的盔甲也是如此。

Jumping Flash! (USA).name: 跳躍閃光！
Jumping Flash! (USA).original_desc:
What would the video game industry be without mad, evil scientists such as Baron Aloha that want to take over the world? We'd have fewer games, that's for sure! Anyway, if this guy carries out his plans, the whole universe will suffer under his menacing wrath. Fortunately, help is on the way. Yes, a giant mechanical rabbit, aptly named Robbit, is here to save the day. And of course, you are Robbit and must go around the world of Jumping Flash! collecting the missing "jetpods" and stop Baron Aloha.
 Jumping Flash! is a first person shooter set in a graphically stunning 3D universe. To stop Aloha, you must tackle and hop (well, you ARE a big mechanical bunny) your way through 6 worlds divided into 18 different levels, pick up various special weapons, blast little critters that try to get in your way and find the missing jetpods.
Jumping Flash! (USA).desc:
如果沒有像阿羅哈男爵這樣想要統治世界的瘋狂、邪惡的科學家，電子遊戲行業會是什麼樣子？我們的比賽會更少，這是肯定的！無論如何，如果這個傢伙執行他的計劃，整個宇宙都會遭受他的憤怒。幸運的是，幫助正在路上。是的，一隻巨大的機械兔子，恰如其分地命名為羅比特，來拯救世界。當然，你是羅比特，必須環遊跳躍閃光的世界！收集失踪的“噴射艙”並阻止阿羅哈男爵。
跳躍閃光！是一款以圖形精美的 3D 宇宙為背景的第一人稱射擊遊戲。為了阻止 Aloha，你必須擒抱和跳躍（嗯，你是一隻大機械兔子）穿過 6 個世界，分為 18 個不同的關卡，拿起各種特殊武器，炸毀試圖擋道的小動物，並找到丟失的噴氣吊艙。

Legend of Dragoon, The (USA).name: 龍騎傳說
Legend of Dragoon, The (USA).original_desc:
Ten thousand years ago the Legend was born. The Divine Tree's mystical powers were said to have given birth to all life. The 105th race born of the Tree was the mighty Dragons. The 106th was the human race and the 107th was the Winglies. Peace and tranquility reigned throughout the land, but suddenly a violent uprising occurred, led by the Winglies, who enslaved humanity. To counter this, the humans acquired the Dragons' spiritual forces and defeated their nemeses, which led to eventual harmony between all. However, the prophecy has only begun as the past and future are about to collide...
 In Sony's role-playing game, The Legend of Dragoon for the PlayStation, you'll travel across the land searching for clues and discovering new enemies as well as friends you can add to your party. Up to three members per party can fight at once, in an interface that Final Fantasy fans may find familiar, the difference being that you can become a Dragoon with supernatural powers taken from the souls of Dragons. Animals will attack you from nowhere while other creatures and even human opponents will specifically seek and destroy.
 Each warrior has his or her own weapons and magic, with the ability to retreat a fight based on chance. Experience points will add up and each member of the party will gain a level as their hit points increase. The combat technique known as Dragoon Additions -- shown as SP (Spirit Power) -- measures a Dragoon's ability to fight. When your character approaches an enemy upon initiating an attack, a rectangular grid targets the enemy before your weapon is swung. If you press it in time for the outer rectangle to close in, matching the center rectangle, you'll be able to hit your target and continue to get in several more hits depending on how fast and accurate you are executing the button sequence.
 Magical attacks draw their power from the Elements such as water, fire, wind, earth, darkness and light, thunder, and non-elemental. Using the opposite of an enemy's element will inflict the most damage. The game also consists of another unique fighting technique that is more commonly used: the Multi-Attack. It allows one to inflict more damage than normal. When it is used, the X button appears onscreen and you must rapidly tap the X button to increase the power of the attack to over 100 percent. If you do nothing, you will only inflict a small amount of damage. There is also the interactive counterattack which, if not properly done, will cut off the rest of your combos and damage your fighter as a result.
 Arm yourself with a variety of weapons such as swords, spears, bows and arrows, axes and hammers. Protect yourself with body armor, helmets and boots. Other items like bracelets, amulets or stones carry with them magical powers to enhance attacks or deflect the damage of an attack. Although your journey begins with only basic weapons, others can be purchased from merchants or found in chests. Changing and upgrading weapons for the entire party can be done via the in-game menu, however some weapons are specialized for particular warriors. There are also items that can heal or wage war and they too are won in battle, found in chests, or purchased from merchants.
 Although you start out as Dart, a brave and loyal warrior swordsman sworn to avenge his parents' death by the Black Monster, other party members you'll run into have their own unique story to tell. Saving the game is done wherever you find Save Points; the only requirement is that you must have at least two blocks of memory available on a memory card. This one-player game is also analog and vibration compatible and comes on four CDs.
Legend of Dragoon, The (USA).desc:
一萬年前，傳奇誕生。據說神樹的神秘力量孕育了一切生命。神樹誕生的第 105 個種族是強大的龍族。第106個是人類，第107個是翼族。和平與安寧籠罩著整個大地，但突然發生了一場由翼利人領導的暴力起義，他們奴役了人類。為了應對這一點，人類獲得了龍的精神力量並擊敗了他們的敵人，這導致了所有人之間的最終和諧。然而，預言才剛剛開始，過去與未來即將碰撞……
在索尼的 PlayStation 角色扮演遊戲《龍騎兵傳奇》中，您將穿越大地尋找線索，發現新的敵人以及可以添加到隊伍中的朋友。每個隊伍最多可以同時戰斗三名成員，界面可能是《最終幻想》粉絲所熟悉的，不同之處在於你可以成為擁有從龍的靈魂中獲得的超自然力量的龍騎兵。動物會不知從何而來攻擊你，而其他生物甚至人類對手會專門尋找和摧毀。
每個戰士都有自己的武器和魔法，能夠根據機會撤退戰鬥。經驗值會累加，隊伍中的每個成員都會隨著生命值的增加而獲得等級。被稱為“龍騎士附加”的戰鬥技術——顯示為 SP（精神力量）——衡量龍騎士的戰鬥能力。當你的角色在發起攻擊時接近敵人時，在你揮動武器之前，會出現一個矩形網格來瞄準敵人。如果您及時按下它以使外部矩形接近，與中心矩形匹配，您將能夠擊中目標，並根據執行按鈕序列的速度和準確度繼續獲得更多擊中。
魔法攻擊從水、火、風、土、暗、光、雷、非元素等元素中汲取力量。使用與敵人元素相反的元素會造成最大的傷害。遊戲還包含另一種更常用的獨特戰鬥技術：多重攻擊。它可以使人造成比平常更多的傷害。使用時，屏幕上會出現X按鈕，你必須快速點擊X按鈕才能將攻擊威力增加到100%以上。如果你什麼都不做，你只會造成少量的傷害。還有互動反擊，如果做得不好，將切斷你的其餘連擊並因此損壞你的戰鬥機。
用劍、矛、弓箭、斧頭和錘子等各種武器武裝自己。使用防彈衣、頭盔和靴子保護自己。其他物品，如手鐲、護身符或石頭，都帶有神奇的力量，可以增強攻擊或轉移攻擊的傷害。雖然你的旅程一開始只有基本武器，但其他武器可以從商人那裡購買或在箱子中找到。可以通過遊戲內菜單更改和升級整個隊伍的武器，但有些武器是專門為特定戰士設計的。還有一些物品可以治療或發動戰爭，它們也是在戰鬥中贏得的、在箱子中發現的或從商人那裡購買的。
雖然你一開始扮演的是勇敢而忠誠的武士劍客達特，發誓要為被黑色怪物殺死的父母報仇，但你會遇到的其他黨員都有自己獨特的故事要講。無論您在哪裡找到保存點，都可以保存遊戲；唯一的要求是存儲卡上必須至少有兩個可用內存塊。這款單人遊戲還兼容模擬和振動，並配有四張 CD。

Zanac x Zanac (Japan).name: 賽納克×賽納克
Zanac x Zanac (Japan).original_desc:
Zanac X Zanac was released to celebrate the Compile's 15th anniversary of the release of its classic NES game, Zanac.
Zanac is an arcade-style who players fly a lone starfighter, dubbed the AFX-6502 Zanac, through twelve levels; their goal is to destroy the System?a part-organic, part-mechanical entity bent on destroying Mankind.
Zanac differs from other vertical shooters in its ability to adapt to your strengths and to adjust the game to attack your weaknesses. Your performance during the game and your choice of subweapon will partially determine what and how much Zanac will send at you.
Zanac x Zanac (Japan).desc:
Zanac X Zanac 的發布是為了慶祝 Compile 經典 NES 遊戲 Zanac 發布 15 週年。
Zanac 是一款街機風格遊戲，玩家駕駛一架名為 AFX-6502 Zanac 的孤獨星際戰鬥機通過 12 個關卡；他們的目標是摧毀這個系統——一個半有機、半機械的實體，一心要毀滅人類。
Zanac 與其他垂直射擊遊戲的不同之處在於它能夠適應你的優勢並調整遊戲來攻擊你的弱點。你在遊戲中的表現和你對副武器的選擇將部分決定扎納克將向你發送的內容和數量。

Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.key: Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (USA)
Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.original_name: Alone in the Dark : The New Nightmare
Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.name: 獨自在黑暗中:新噩夢
Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.original_desc: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare is the fourth entry in the Alone in the Dark series, continuing the story set up by the previous installments. Charles Fisk has gone missing on Shadow Island and is presumed dead. His good friend, private investigator Edward Carnby, has chartered a plane to Shadow Island to investigate the disappearance of his friend and discover what the island's owner, Obed Morton, is planning. Ailene Cedrac, an ethnology Professor at Boston University, also has an interest in the island -- she believes that her long lost father is located there. Driven by intrigue as well as a desire for closure, both Cedrac and Carnby fly to the island on Halloween night.
Alone in the Dark - The New Nightmare (U.desc: 獨自在黑暗中：新噩夢是《獨自在黑暗中》系列的第四部作品，延續了前幾部的故事。查爾斯·菲斯克在暗影島失踪，推測已死亡。他的好朋友私家偵探愛德華·卡恩比包租了一架飛機前往影子島調查他朋友的失踪事件，並查明島主奧貝德·莫頓的計劃。波士頓大學的人類學教授艾琳·塞德拉克 (Ailene Cedrac) 也對這座島嶼很感興趣——她相信她失散多年的父親就在那裡。在陰謀和結束慾望的驅使下，塞德拉克和康比在萬聖節之夜飛往該島。

Rakugaki Showtime (Japan).name: 塗鴉 Tokoro w 血淋淋的眼睛
Rakugaki Showtime (Japan).original_desc: Rakugaki Showtime you play as a rakugaki (scribble) character, who must fight against other rakugaki characters in a square 3D arena. The fights mainly consist of throwing items at the opposition. However, throwing is not as simple as "pick up, aim & throw". In Rakugaki Showtime different "drives" can be placed on the thrown items by holding different directions whilst throwing. Holding the direction towards the target will cause a "Forward Drive Throw", which is like a faster normal throw, albeit weaker. Holding the direction away from the target will cause you to do a "Backward Drive Throw", which will cause your character to throw the item slower and in an arc, but it will cause far more damage.
Rakugaki Showtime (Japan).desc: 在 Rakugaki Showtime 中，您扮演一個 rakugaki（塗鴉）角色，必須在方形 3D 競技場中與其他 rakugaki 角色戰鬥。打鬥主要是向對方投擲物品。然而，投擲並不像“撿起、瞄準、投擲”那麼簡單。在 Rakugaki Showtime 中，通過在投擲時保持不同的方向，可以將不同的“驅動器”放置在投擲的物品上。保持朝向目標的方向將導致“向前驅動投擲”，這就像更快的普通投擲，儘管較弱。保持遠離目標的方向將導致你進行“向後驅動投擲”，這將使你的角色以弧線的速度更慢地投擲物品，但會造成更大的傷害。

Final Fantasy IX (USA) (Rev 1).name: 最終幻想9
Final Fantasy IX (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Corruption -- the root of all evil. Alexandria's Queen Brahne was once presented as a noble and caring ruler, who would throw lavish festivals to show appreciation for her supporters. Recently, she became involved in secretive deals with mysterious people. Matters took a turn for the worse when a renegade troupe kidnapped her daughter and changed the fate of a once peaceful world.
 As young Zidane Tribal and his party interrupted a renowned play and kidnapped Princess Garnet Til Alexandros, things began to fall apart. The queen fired cannons and decimated her kingdom in an attempt to prevent the terrorist organization, but her attacks failed and the troupe escaped with their lives intact.
 Princess Garnet wished someone would take her away from her oppressing mother and life; the only world she knew was that of Alexandria and its large metropolitan areas. Zidane Tribal and his troupe had come at the perfect time. An innocent black mage known as Vivi Orunitia and a Pluto Knight named Adelbert Steiner, who was sworn to protect the princess at all costs, were also part of the crusade.
 Although Adelbert Steiner had objections, the characters formed a pact to overthrow Queen Brahne and prevent her harmful attack in the surrounding areas of Alexandria. After the princess was abducted, Brahne hired assailants to create destructive black mage warriors. With a few of her knights and the mages, the queen unleashed a series of unmitigated attacks on neighboring towns -- she would do anything to recapture Princess Garnet.
 But what are the queen's true intentions?
Final Fantasy IX (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
腐敗——萬惡之源。亞歷山大的布拉尼女王曾經被描繪成一位高貴而富有愛心的統治者，她會舉辦奢華的節日來表達對她的支持者的感激之情。最近，她捲入了與神秘人物的秘密交易中。當一個叛徒劇團綁架了她的女兒並改變了曾經和平世界的命運時，事情變得更糟。
當年輕的齊達內·特里巴爾和他的同伴打斷了一場著名的戲劇並綁架了加內特·蒂爾·亞歷山德羅斯公主時，事情開始分崩離析。女王發射大砲並摧毀了她的王國，試圖阻止恐怖組織，但她的攻擊失敗了，劇團毫髮無傷地逃脫了。
加內特公主希望有人能帶她離開壓迫她的母親和生活。她唯一知道的世界是亞歷山大及其大都市區。齊達內·部落和他的劇團來得正是時候。無辜的黑魔法師維維·奧魯尼蒂亞（Vivi Orunitia）和冥王騎士阿德爾伯特·施泰納（Adelbert Steiner）也加入了這場遠征，後者發誓不惜一切代價保護公主。
儘管阿德爾伯特·施泰納表示反對，但角色們還是達成了一項協議，推翻布拉尼女王並阻止她對亞歷山大周邊地區的有害攻擊。公主被綁架後，布拉尼僱傭了襲擊者來創造具有破壞性的黑魔法戰士。女王帶著她的一些騎士和法師，對鄰近的城鎮發動了一系列徹底的攻擊——她願意不惜一切代價奪回加內特公主。
但女王的真實意圖是什麼？

Incredible Crisis (USA).name: 難以置信的危機
Incredible Crisis (USA).original_desc:
Incredible Crisis follows the stories of four members of a Japanese family on their grandmother's birthday. As each family member goes through a seemingly normal day, things start to go wrong -- very wrong. Players will be able to live out this family's hair-raising experiences by playing a series of mini-games.
 At its core, Incredible Crisis is a collection of mini-games strung together in order to advance the plot. Games range from a beatmania-style of timed gameplay (where certain buttons are pressed during certain beats) to shooting down airplanes, attacking UFOs, and even a certain "massage" level that is so analogous to a sexual experience that if gamers only heard the instructions and game mechanics, they would swear they were playing a game rated A for adult.
Incredible Crisis (USA).desc:
《難以置信的危機》講述了一個日本家庭四名成員在祖母生日那天發生的故事。當每個家庭成員都經歷看似正常的一天時，事情開始變得不對勁——非常不對勁。玩家將能夠通過玩一系列迷你游戲來體驗這個家庭令人毛骨悚然的經歷。
從本質上講，《難以置信的危機》是一系列小遊戲的集合，旨在推動情節發展。遊戲範圍從節拍狂風格的定時遊戲（在特定節拍期間按下特定按鈕）到擊落飛機、攻擊不明飛行物，甚至還有類似於性體驗的特定“按摩”級別，如果玩家只聽到說明和遊戲機制，他們會發誓自己正在玩一款成人 A 級遊戲。

Jet Moto 3 (USA).name: 噴氣摩托3
Jet Moto 3 (USA).original_desc:
The third entry in the Jet Moto series once again places you in the driving seat of a futuristic hoverbike, racing at breakneck speed in a truly extreme sport. While a Jet Moto hoverbike might look like a jet ski, it is capable of far more: it travels across land as well as water and can use a magnetic grapple to make extremely tight turns. During a race, drivers must skillfully time jumps, dodge obstacles, and contend with some feisty opponents who won't hesitate to bump you into a tree or maybe even knock you off a cliff.

Jet Moto 3 offers ten different riders and 19 tracks across the wide open ocean, over mountainous terrain, and through cityscapes. As with the earlier games, two people can still race in a split-screen mode.
Jet Moto 3 (USA).desc:
Jet Moto 系列的第三款作品再次讓您坐在未來氣墊自行車的駕駛座上，以極快的速度進行真正的極限運動。雖然 Jet Moto 氣墊自行車可能看起來像摩托艇，但它的功能遠不止於此：它可以在陸地和水中行駛，並且可以使用磁性抓斗進行極其急轉彎。在比賽中，車手必須熟練地控制跳躍、躲避障礙物，並與一些兇猛的對手抗衡，他們會毫不猶豫地把你撞到樹上，甚至可能把你從懸崖上撞下來。

Jet Moto 3 提供 10 種不同的騎手和 19 條賽道，橫跨廣闊的海洋、山區和城市景觀。與早期的遊戲一樣，兩個人仍然可以在分屏模式下比賽。

Vanark (USA).name: 瓦納克
Vanark (USA).original_desc: Vanark is, at its core, a shooter. Sure, it's a 3D shooter "on rails" in the grand tradition of Star Fox or the Saturn's Panzer Dragoon series, but the difference here, is that it's the PlayStation's first great example of one. It's a tried-and-true method of laying on the action, and while there were plenty of opportunities for Asmik to screw up the formula, but luckily, they never really dropped the ball, at least not when it came to the shooter parts.
Vanark (USA).desc: Vanark 的核心是射擊遊戲。當然，它是一款“軌道上”的 3D 射擊遊戲，繼承了《星際火狐》或《土星》的裝甲龍騎兵系列的偉大傳統，但不同之處在於，它是 PlayStation 上第一個出色的射擊遊戲。這是一種久經考驗的動作方法，雖然阿斯米克有很多機會搞砸這個公式，但幸運的是，他們從未真正失敗過，至少在射手部件方面沒有。

Trap Gunner (USA).name: 陷阱槍手
Trap Gunner (USA).original_desc:
In Trap Gunner two opponents battle in small arenas, and while each has a relatively weak ranged and melee attack, the favored means of damaging an opponent is through hidden traps. Each combatant has at his or her disposal a range of explosives, pits, throwing panels, and gas bombs. An enemy is significantly damaged by a single trap, but one may create a sequence of traps for a devastating amount of damage.

With one of six different special agents, each a specialist in assassination and demolitions, a player may progress through a story mode consisting of several missions, a sub-boss, and a final boss. These characters are also available for custom battles against a human or the computer.
Trap Gunner (USA).desc:
在《陷阱槍手》中，兩個對手在小競技場中戰鬥，雖然每個對手的遠程和近戰攻擊都相對較弱，但傷害對手的首選方式是通過隱藏的陷阱。每個戰鬥人員都可以使用一系列炸藥、坑、投擲板和毒氣彈。一個敵人會因為一個陷阱而受到嚴重傷害，但也可能會製造一系列陷阱來造成毀滅性的傷害。

玩家可以選擇六名不同的特工之一（每名特工都是暗殺和爆破方面的專家），在由多個任務、一個副首領和一個最終首領組成的故事模式中前進。這些角色也可用於與人類或計算機進行自定義戰鬥。

Speed Punks (USA).name: 速度朋克
Speed Punks (USA).original_desc:
Speed Freaks is a fast go-cart game in a cartoony setting, featuring six different characters and twelve different tracks.

The game can be played in four different single-player modes or in multi-player mode with up to four people.

Several different pick-ups and power-ups can be found and used to defeat the rivals on the track, including homing missiles, remote bombs and stealth mode.
Speed Punks (USA).desc:
Speed Freaks 是一款卡通背景的快速卡丁車遊戲，具有六個不同的角色和十二個不同的軌道。

該遊戲可以四種不同的單人遊戲模式或最多四人的多人遊戲模式進行。

可以找到並使用幾種不同的拾取器和電源來擊敗賽道上的對手，包括尋的導彈、遠程炸彈和隱形模式。

Koudelka (USA).name: 考德爾卡
Koudelka (USA).original_desc:
The premise behind Koudelka takes place in Aberyswyth, Wales at a monastery known as Nementon Abbey. Found in a remote location, the abbey was built as a place of worship, learning and teaching; it was a place where scholars found peace.
 As time went by, Nementon Abbey was turned into a prison and it's inhabitants were confined to suffer and die. This practice continued for many years until the facility was purchased by Patrick Heyworth, a wealthy criminal who turned the once peaceful monastery into a refuge for vagrants and law-breakers. After Heyworth took control over the building, rumors of horror and great riches echoed throughout the world; the rumors lured many thieves, none of which returned to their homes.
 Forward to Halloween 1898 -- present day.
Koudelka (USA).desc:
《Koudelka》的故事背景發生在威爾士阿伯里斯威斯的一座名為 Nementon Abbey 的修道院。修道院位於偏遠地區，最初是作為禮拜、學習和教學的場所而建造的。這是學者們找到平靜的地方。
隨著時間的推移，內門頓修道院變成了一座監獄，裡面的居民被囚禁在痛苦和死亡之中。這種做法持續了很多年，直到該設施被富有的罪犯帕特里克·海沃斯（Patrick Heyworth）購買，他將曾經寧靜的修道院變成了流浪者和違法者的避難所。海沃斯接管這座建築後，恐怖和巨額財富的謠言在全世界迴響。謠言引來了許多小偷，但他們都沒有回家。
時間回到 1898 年的萬聖節——今天。

Fighting Force (USA) (Rev 2).name: 漫威神威戰隊
Fighting Force (USA) (Rev 2).original_desc:
Fighting Force is a fighting "beat-em-up" which takes place in an interactive city where you can pick up several objects (like trash cans and car tires) and throw them at your enemies which appear on scripted moments. 

Though the game advertised very interactive places, they all ended up in rectangular arenas because of an invisible wall which surrounded them. There was no way to walk around freely.
Fighting Force (USA) (Rev 2).desc:
《Fighting Force》是一款格鬥“格鬥遊戲”，故事發生在一個互動城市中，您可以撿起一些物體（如垃圾桶和汽車輪胎）並將它們扔向在腳本時刻出現的敵人。

儘管遊戲宣傳的互動場所非常多，但由於周圍有一堵看不見的牆，它們最終都出現在矩形競技場中。沒有辦法自由走動。

Einhaender (USA).name: 單手
Einhaender (USA).original_desc:
In 2192, a new city, Selene, is built on the moon. Over the years, Selene grows larger, more powerful, and more independent of the Earth - to the point that the moon and Earth battle in a war that winds down without a definite victory for either side. In 2242, war breaks out again - the Earth slowly begins to win... except for the efforts of an experimental Selene technology known as Einhänders: flying machines with a "hand" that allows them to change weaponry mid-battle.

On December 12, 2245, Selene sends down 3 Einhänders in a last attempt to turn the tide of the war. You get to choose the craft to pilot, and it's up to you to battle your way through the Earth's monstrous defenses and win the battle.

The game is a traditional side-scrolling shooter, with rendered 3D backgrounds and enemies. The atmosphere of the game is very "industrial", down to the German industrial music playing in the background (think Einsturzende Neubauten mixed with Lords of Acid). The weapon-switching and claiming is an integral part of the game, as weapons have limited shots. This forces a bit more strategy than the usual button-mashing shooters inspire.
Einhaender (USA).desc:
2192年，月球上建立了一座新城市塞勒涅。多年來，塞勒涅變得越來越大、越來越強大，也越來越獨立於地球——以至於月球和地球在一場戰爭中交戰，雙方都沒有取得明確的勝利。2242 年，戰爭再次爆發——地球慢慢開始獲勝……除了被稱為 Einhänders 的實驗性塞勒涅技術的努力：帶有“手”的飛行器，可以在戰鬥中改變武器。

2245 年 12 月 12 日，塞勒涅派出 3 架艾因漢德飛機，最後一次嘗試扭轉戰爭局勢。你可以選擇駕駛的飛船，並由你來通過地球的可怕防禦並贏得戰鬥。

該遊戲是一款傳統的橫向捲軸射擊遊戲，具有渲染的 3D 背景和敵人。遊戲的氛圍非常“工業”，背景音樂是德國工業音樂（想想《Einsturzende Neubauten》和《Lords of Acid》的混合）。武器切換和聲稱是遊戲不可或缺的一部分，因為武器的射擊次數有限。這比通常的按鍵射擊遊戲所激發的策略要多一些。

Darkstalkers 3 (USA).name: 黑暗行者3
Darkstalkers 3 (USA).original_desc:
This is the 3rd in the Darkstalkers series (the 2nd, Night Warriors: Darkstalkers' Revenge, was published only for the Sega Saturn in the US.)  It plays much the same as the first, but features better animation, more playable characters, and a deeper storyline.

Jedah, the "Lord of Vampire", has summoned all of the Night Warriors to his realm to be assimilated into his being.  Of course, this serves as a great excuse to have more one-on-one fights...

Play as Jedah, B. B. Hood, Q-Bee, Lilith, Demitri, Morrigan, Anakaris, Victor, L. Raptor, Hsien-Ko, J. Talbain, Felicia, Rikuo, Sasquatch, Bishamon, Donovan, Pyron or Huitzil, and conquer the enemy.
Darkstalkers 3 (USA).desc:
這是《黑暗行者》系列的第三部（第二部《暗夜戰士：黑暗行者的複仇》僅在美國的世嘉土星上發布。）它的玩法與第一部大致相同，但具有更好的動畫、更多可玩的角色和更深層次的故事情節。

吉達，“吸血鬼之王”，召喚了所有的暗夜戰士到他的領域，並被同化到他的存在中。當然，這是進行更多一對一戰鬥的絕佳藉口......

扮演 Jedah、B. B. Hood、Q-Bee、Lilith、Demitri、Morrigan、Anakaris、Victor、L. Raptor、Hsien-Ko、J. Talbain、Felicia、Rikuo、Sasquatch、Bishamon、Donovan、Pyron 或 Huitzil，並征服敵人。

Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix.key: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix (USA)
Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix.original_name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX : Maximum Remix
Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix.name: 戴夫·米拉 (Dave Mirra) 自由式 BMX：最大混音
Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix.original_desc:
The ultimate BMX gaming experience is here! Maximum Remix includes the entire best-selling Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX game plus more of what you asked for--more levels, more modes, more riders--it's more BMX than you can handle with 10-Time World Champion Dave Mirra.

Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX is the only BMX game to feature Dave Mirra, 10-time World Champion and 11-time X Games medallist. Aspiring pros can play as Dave himself or 9 other superstar riders including: Ryan Nyquist, Kenan Harkin, Chad Kagy, Leigh Ramsdell, Troy McMurray, Mike Laird, Joey Garcia, Shaun Butler and Tim Mirra. Maximum Remix also includes two new special characters giving you a total of four wild characters to choose from.
Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX - Maximum Remix.desc:
終極BMX遊戲體驗就在這裡！Maximum Remix 包括整個最暢銷的 Dave Mirra 自由式 BMX 遊戲，以及您所要求的更多內容——更多關卡、更多模式、更多騎手——它的 BMX 功能超出您與 10 屆世界冠軍 Dave Mirra 的能力。

Dave Mirra 自由式 BMX 是唯一一款以 10 屆世界冠軍和 11 屆 X Games 獎牌獲得者 Dave Mirra 為主角的 BMX 遊戲。有抱負的職業選手可以扮演戴夫本人或其他 9 名超級明星騎手，包括：瑞安·奈奎斯特、凱南·哈金、查德·卡吉、利·拉姆斯德爾、特洛伊·麥克默里、邁克·萊爾德、喬伊·加西亞、肖恩·巴特勒和蒂姆·米拉。Maximum Remix 還包括兩個新的特殊角色，總共有四個狂野角色可供選擇。

Twisted Metal (USA).name: 扭曲金屬
Twisted Metal (USA).original_desc: The original classic!  Choose from 12 different vehicles ranging from a rig to a bike and try to win the Twisted Metal contest.  TM features plenty of weapons, including fire missiles, homing missiles, mines, and of course, each car has their own special weapon that delivers huge damage with cool effects. All battles are waged in 3D combat arenas, with plenty of power-ups and secret areas to find, which adds depth - which is important because TM in not really a single player game.  Though it has a single player mode, the real meat is in the two-player battles.
Twisted Metal (USA).desc: 原創經典！從裝備到自行車等 12 種不同的車輛中進行選擇，並嘗試贏得 Twisted Metal 競賽。TM擁有豐富的武器，包括火焰導彈、尋的導彈、地雷，當然，每輛車都有自己的特殊武器，可以造成巨大的傷害和炫酷的效果。所有戰鬥都在 3D 戰鬥競技場中進行，有大量的道具和秘密區域可供尋找，這增加了深度 - 這很重要，因為 TM 並不是真正的單人遊戲。雖然它有單人模式，但真正的亮點在於兩人對戰。

Tenchu - Stealth Assassins (USA) (Rev 1).name: 天誅 : 隱形刺客
Tenchu - Stealth Assassins (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
After firing your grappling hook to the rooftop of a small house, you pull yourself up and notice a guard pacing back and forth on the ground. He doesn't see you as you begin to crawl and sneak around on the roof. If he detects your presence, you will be in a world of hurt; you will blow your mission and risk death. Patiently, you wait for the right time to jump down -- and end his life while his back is turned.
 Set in 16th century Japan, Tenchu: Stealth Assassins is a simulation of the ways of the stealthy ninja. You'll chose between two characters, Rikimaru and Ayame, with a main objective of remaining unseen throughout ten non-linear missions. You will move through the shadows, make your way across rooftops, dash through trees -- anything to cloak yourself from enemy sight. While completing the missions, you are judged on three levels that measure your success in the fields of elusiveness and effectiveness.
 Each mission is different in its design and goal. Your mentor will have you run secret errands to informants, kill evil merchants and thieves, and rescue captive ninjas. Along the way, the enemy resistance has set up traps and assigned guards to keep a watchful eye for any interference (that would be you). Because Tenchu is a simulation of sorts, running up and engaging an enemy combat is not advised -- that's not the way of the ninja. 
 A ninja is cunning and in order to uphold his duty, he must remain unseen. If you brazenly walk up to a group of enemies and try to kill them all, you may get through a couple, but you will ultimately fail and dishonor your people. As far as weaponry goes, make use of throwing stars and actual ninja assassin swords. For the truly cunning players, poisoned rice and smoke bombs are included as special items. If a guard will not go away, try putting some rice down for him to eat - he'll get sick and collapse.
Tenchu - Stealth Assassins (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
將抓鉤射向一座小房子的屋頂後，你站起來，發現一名警衛在地上來回踱步。當你開始在屋頂上爬行和偷偷摸摸時，他沒有看到你。如果他發現你的存在，你就會陷入痛苦的境地；你將會毀掉你的使命並冒著死亡的危險。你耐心地等待合適的時機跳下去，然後在他轉身的時候結束他的生命。
《天誅：隱形刺客》以 16 世紀的日本為背景，模擬隱身忍者的方式。你將在力丸和綾女這兩個角色之間進行選擇，其主要目標是在十個非線性任務中保持隱身狀態。你將穿過陰影、穿過屋頂、衝過樹林——任何可以隱藏自己不被敵人發現的事情。在完成任務時，我們會從三個層面對你進行評判，衡量你在難以捉摸和有效性方面的成功。
每個任務的設計和目標都不同。你的導師會讓你向線人執行秘密任務，殺死邪惡的商人和小偷，並營救被俘的忍者。一路上，敵方抵抗組織設置了陷阱，並指派警衛監視任何干擾（那就是你）。因為《天誅》是一種模擬遊戲，所以不建議跑起來與敵人戰鬥——這不是忍者的方式。
忍者是狡猾的，為了履行自己的職責，他必須保持不被發現。如果你厚顏無恥地走向一群敵人並試圖將他們全部殺死，你可能會打敗幾個，但你最終會失敗並羞辱你的人民。就武器而言，請使用飛鏢和真正的忍者刺客劍。對於真正狡猾的玩家來說，毒米和煙霧彈是特殊物品。如果一名警衛不肯走開，試著放一些米給他吃——他會生病並崩潰。

Driver - You Are the Wheelman (USA) (Rev.name: 司機：你是舵手
Driver - You Are the Wheelman (USA) (Rev.original_desc:
As Tanner, you're going undercover to be the wheelman for a crime syndicate in order to break open a big case. On the way, you'll eliminate competition, drive getaway cars, scare some people silly, evade plenty of police, dodge bad guys, smash through a few windows, save your love interest, and much more through four cities (Miami, San Francisco, Los Angeles, and New York).

Perform authentic manuevers like donuts, 180 spin, 360 spin, reverse 180 spin, and more as you cut through alley ways, across sidewalks and parks, smash park benches and and drive over traffic cones. Many different cars to try (most you'll recognize). Will you save the day?
Driver - You Are the Wheelman (USA) (Rev.desc:
作為坦納，你將臥底成為一個犯罪集團的舵手，以破獲一個大案。在路上，你將消除競爭、駕駛逃亡汽車、嚇傻一些人、躲避大量警察、躲避壞人、砸碎幾扇窗戶、拯救你的愛人等等，穿越四個城市（邁阿密、舊金山、洛杉磯和紐約）。

當您穿過小巷、穿過人行道和公園、撞碎公園長椅以及駛過交通錐時，可以進行真實的動作，如甜甜圈、180 度旋轉、360 度旋轉、反向 180 度旋轉等。許多不同的汽車可供嘗試（大多數您都會認識）。你會拯救這一天嗎？

Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.key: Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy VI (USA) (Rev 1)
Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.original_name: Final Fantasy Anthology : Final Fantasy VI
Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.name: 最終幻想VI
Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.original_desc: Set in a fantasy world with a technology level equivalent to that of the Second Industrial Revolution, the game's story focuses on a group of rebels as they seek to overthrow an imperial dictatorship. The game features fourteen permanent playable characters, the most of any game in the main series. Final Fantasy VI was the first game in the series to be directed by someone other than producer and series creator Hironobu Sakaguchi; the role was filled instead by Yoshinori Kitase and Hiroyuki Ito. Yoshitaka Amano, a long-time contributor to the Final Fantasy series, returned as the image and character designer, while regular composer Nobuo Uematsu wrote the game's score, which has been released on several soundtrack albums.
Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.desc: 遊戲設定在一個科技水平相當於第二次工業革命的奇幻世界，故事圍繞一群叛軍尋求推翻帝國獨裁統治的故事。該遊戲擁有 14 個永久可玩角色，是主系列遊戲中最多的。《最終幻想 VI》是該系列中第一款由製作人兼系列創作者坂口博信以外的人執導的遊戲；該角色由北瀨佳典和伊藤博之擔任。《最終幻想》系列的長期貢獻者天野喜孝回歸擔任圖像和角色設計師，而常規作曲家植松伸夫則為遊戲創作了配樂，該配樂已在多張原聲專輯中發行。

Persona (USA).name: 人格面具
Persona (USA).original_desc:
In the near future, mankind has conquered dimensional travel but the door we have opened swings both ways. The peaceful city you have grown up in has become a haven for dark creatures from another world-Demons! Now it's up to you and your friends to harness the hidden power within you by entering the fantasy game known as Persona.

You awaken with incredible abilities that you will need to defeat the scores of Demon invaders and cleanse the land of their forces. Converse with them before doing battle to determine your best course of action. Fight them or enlist their aid in your mission. Either way, you are set for the fantasy adventure of a lifetime!
Persona (USA).desc:
在不久的將來，人類已經征服了維度旅行，但我們打開的大門是雙向的。你成長的和平城市，卻成為了來自異世界的黑暗生物——惡魔的避風港！現在，你和你的朋友們可以進入名為“女神異聞錄”的奇幻遊戲，利用你們體內隱藏的力量。

你醒來時擁有令人難以置信的能力，你將需要這些能力來擊敗數十名惡魔入侵者並清除他們的力量。在戰鬥之前與他們交談以確定你的最佳行動方案。與他們戰鬥或在你的任務中尋求他們的幫助。無論哪種方式，您都將踏上一生難忘的奇幻冒險之旅！

Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX (USA).name: 馬特·霍夫曼的專業小輪車
Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX (USA).original_desc:
Following in the tradition of the Tony Hawk Pro Skater series comes Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX. Choose from eight different professional BMX players and go from course to course accomplishing goals and trick points.
 Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX uses the same game engine seen in Tony Hawk Pro Skater, and has many of the gameplay elements have been retained. The dynamic camera always tracks your BMX rider from behind and switches to an aerial view when performing high jumps on half pipes. Collect magazine covers in each varied level (varying from city parks to warehouses) in order to unlock new levels. Players will have to execute high jumps and perform crazy tricks in the air and by railing metal bars and buildings in order to gain trick points. Enough trick points will allow you to unlock new levels.
 The soundtrack on Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX is also sure to appeal to almost any gamer, as a wide variety of song types have been covered, from rock to hip hop. Groups on the soundtrack include Outkast, Jurassic 5, Dead Prez, Deltron 3030 and Static-X.
Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX (USA).desc:
繼承 Tony Hawk Pro Skater 系列的傳統，Mat Hoffman 的 Pro BMX 登場。從八位不同的專業 BMX 選手中進行選擇，並從一個球場到另一個球場，實現目標和技巧點。
Mat Hoffman 的 Pro BMX 使用與 Tony Hawk Pro Skater 相同的遊戲引擎，並且保留了許多遊戲元素。動態攝像頭始終從後面跟踪您的 BMX 騎手，並在半管跳高時切換到鳥瞰圖。收集各個不同級別（從城市公園到倉庫）的雜誌封面，以解鎖新級別。玩家必須執行跳高，並在空中、欄杆和建築物上表演瘋狂的特技，以獲得特技分數。足夠的技巧點可以讓你解鎖新的關卡。
Mat Hoffman 的 Pro BMX 的配樂也肯定會吸引幾乎所有遊戲玩家，因為涵蓋了從搖滾到嘻哈等多種歌曲類型。配樂團體包括 Outkast、Jurassic 5、Dead Prez、Deltron 3030 和 Static-X。

Um Jammer Lammy (USA).name: 嗯干擾器拉米
Um Jammer Lammy (USA).original_desc:
Introducing Lammy, a totally rockin' guitarist.  In day-to-day life, she's quite timid, shy, and wimpy - but put a guitar in her hands, and she'll blow you away!  Help Lammy get to her latest gig on time, and face obstacles such as flaming buildings, out-of-control airplanes, and even getting trapped in Hell.

In this sequel to PaRappa The Rapper you play as Lammy, a guitarist for MilkCan - the coolest, hippest band ever!  While PaRappa focused on lyrics, with each button controlling a different word; Lammy is a guitar player, so naturally, each button controls a different note on the guitar.  Lammy will encounter seven different teachers on her travels to the big gig, so either follow their lessons accurately, or do even better - improvise and blow them all away with your axe.  The teacher will then step away for you to go it solo for an even better performance.

Lammy improves over PaRappa in a multitude of ways.  Rather than just being a single player experience, you can now play the game with a friend.  Any stages that you unlock can be played either co-operatively or competitively.  If you don't have a friend to play co-operatively with, you can also get the computer to take on the role of your partner.  After finishing the initial game, PaRappa also makes a return, allowing you to play through the game again with raps instead of Lammy's guitar.
Um Jammer Lammy (USA).desc:
隆重介紹 Lammy，一位完全搖滾的吉他手。在日常生活中，她相當膽怯、害羞、懦弱——但只要把一把吉他放在她手裡，她就會讓你大吃一驚！幫助拉米準時到達她的最新演出，並面對各種障礙，例如著火的建築物、失控的飛機，甚至被困在地獄中。

在《PaRappa The Rapper》的這部續集中，您將扮演 Lammy，MilkCan（史上最酷、最時髦的樂隊）的吉他手！而PaRappa則專注於歌詞，每個按鈕控制不同的單詞； Lammy 是一名吉他手，所以自然地，每個按鈕控制吉他上的不同音符。拉米在參加大型演出的旅途中會遇到七位不同的老師，所以要么準確地遵循他們的課程，要么做得更好——即興發揮，用你的斧頭把他們全部炸飛。然後老師會離開讓你單獨表演，以獲得更好的表演。

Lammy 在很多方面都比 PaRappa 有所改進。您現在可以與朋友一起玩遊戲，而不僅僅是單人遊戲。您解鎖的任何階段都可以合作或競爭地進行。如果你沒有朋友可以一起玩，你也可以讓電腦來扮演你的伙伴的角色。完成最初的遊戲後，PaRappa 也會回歸，讓你可以用說唱而不是 Lammy 的吉他再次玩遊戲。

Alundra (USA) (Rev 1).name: 阿倫德拉
Alundra (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Alundra is a boy who can step into other people's dreams. His own dreams tell him to go to the village Inoa. The ship on which Alundra is coming to the village goes down, but Alundra himself is washed up on a beach near the village. There, a blacksmith Jess takes care of him and treats him like his own son. But Alundra, stepping into the dreams of the village people, understands there's a danger somewhere. The people have horrible nightmares, and only Alundra can find out what they mean...

Alundra is an action role playing game (RPG) somewhat similar to the famous Zelda games. It uses real-time combat and has a lot of physical and environmental puzzles. A big part of the game is spent in dungeons, where the player has to solve puzzles in order to proceed.
Alundra (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
阿倫德拉是一個能夠走進別人夢想的男孩。他自己的夢告訴他要去伊諾亞村。阿倫德拉前往村莊的船沉沒了，而阿倫德拉本人則被沖到了村莊附近的海灘上。在那裡，鐵匠傑西照顧他並像對待自己的兒子一樣對待他。但阿倫德拉走進村民的夢中，意識到某處存在危險。人們做了可怕的噩夢，只有阿倫德拉才能明白其中的含義……

Alundra 是一款動作角色扮演遊戲（RPG），有點類似於著名的塞爾達遊戲。它採用實時戰鬥，並有很多物理和環境謎題。遊戲的很大一部分時間都在地牢中度過，玩家必須解決謎題才能繼續前進。

Kartia - The Word of Fate (USA).name: 卡提亞：命運之語
Kartia - The Word of Fate (USA).original_desc: A turn-based, strategy RPG, Kartia presents players with two disparate, yet intersecting storylines: one as the shrine warrior, Lacryma Christi; the other as Toxa Classico, an arrogant knight. Having selected a character, players embark on a journey spanning 18 chapters, each of which is preceded by pertinent dialogue and FMV scenes, the former accompanied by character portraits from Yoshitaka Amano (best known for his work on the Final Fantasy series). The titular Kartia represents the lifeblood of the world of Rebus, as it is from this that almost anything can be created. Prior to and during each skirmish, Kartia can be used to fashion spells, equipment, and phantoms by assembling the various elements each entity requires.
Kartia - The Word of Fate (USA).desc: 《Kartia》是一款回合製策略角色扮演遊戲，為玩家呈現了兩條截然不同但又相互交叉的故事情節：一條是神社武士 Lacryma Christi，另一條是神社戰士 Lacryma Christi。另一個是Toxa Classico，一位傲慢的騎士。選擇角色後，玩家將踏上跨越 18 個章節的旅程，每個章節之前都有相關的對話和 FMV 場景，前者配有天野喜孝（以《最終幻想》系列作品而聞名）的角色肖像。卡提亞 (Kartia) 代表了雷布斯 (Rebus) 世界的命脈，因為幾乎任何東西都可以從這裡創造出來。在每次小衝突之前和期間，卡蒂亞可以通過組裝每個實體所需的各種元素來製作咒語、裝備和幻影。

Medal of Honor (USA).name: 榮譽勳章
Medal of Honor (USA).original_desc:
FIGHT WWII FOR THE FIRST TIME

Tomorrow is D-Day. Tonight you land behind enemy lines. The tide of the war is in your hands. Your are an elite Special Forces agent sent to execute covert operations, search and rescue missions, and commando raids. Fight to win the Medal of Honor in the only game that lets you take on Nazis in WWII.
Medal of Honor (USA).desc:
第一次參加二戰

明天是諾曼底登陸日。今晚你降落在敵後。戰爭的潮流掌握在你的手中。你是一名精英特種部隊特工，被派去執行秘密行動、搜索和救援任務以及突擊隊突襲。在唯一一款讓您在二戰中對抗納粹的遊戲中奮力爭取榮譽勳章。

Metal Gear Solid (USA) (Rev 1).name: Metal Gear (虛構武器)
Metal Gear Solid (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Renegade special forces unit FOXHOUND has taken over Shadow Moses Island in Alaska's Fox Archipelago - publicly a nuclear weapons disposal facility but in truth a top secret weapons development site and home to Metal Gear REX.

With the help of the genetically engineered Next Generation Special Forces, Liquid Snake has seized the facility, taken hostages and hijacked REX, demanding the US Government give them One Billion Dollars and the remains of legendary soldier Big Boss.

Returning from retirement, former FOXHOUND operative Solid Snake has been tasked with infiltrating the island on a solo mission to free the hostages and stop his former unit before they can launch a nuclear attack.
Metal Gear Solid (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
變節的特種部隊獵狐犬已經佔領了阿拉斯加福克斯群島的影子摩西島——表面上是一個核武器處置設施，但實際上是一個絕密的武器開發基地，也是合金裝備雷克斯的所在地。

在基因工程下一代特種部隊的幫助下，液體蛇佔領了設施，劫持了人質並劫持了雷克斯，要求美國政府給他們十億美元和傳奇士兵Big Boss的遺骸。

退役歸來的前獵狐犬特工索利德·斯內克受命潛入該島，執行一項單獨任務，解救人質並在他們發動核攻擊之前阻止他的前部隊。

Syphon Filter 3 (USA).name: 虹吸過濾器3
Syphon Filter 3 (USA).original_desc:
Gabe and Lian are back -- however, this time, "The Agency" has put Lian and Gabe on trial for crimes they did not commit while they secretly plot to distribute Syphon Filter, a deadly virus, throughout the population.  And with Gabe and Lian on trial, there would be no one to stop them...

The game now includes mini-missions that allow you to sharpen your skills.  The basic mini-mission simply takes a map, drops you in, tosses in some enemies and weapons and lets you do the rest.  There is also an improved multiplayer element and tons of new weapons, including an X-Ray sniper rifle and an explosive shotgun.
Syphon Filter 3 (USA).desc:
加布和利安回來了——然而，這一次，“特工局”對利安和加布進行了審判，罪名是他們在秘密密謀向民眾傳播虹吸過濾器（一種致命病毒）時並未犯下的罪行。隨著加布和利安接受審判，沒有人可以阻止他們......

遊戲現在包含迷你任務，可讓您提高技能。基本的迷你任務只需拿一張地圖，讓你進去，扔一些敵人和武器，然後讓你做剩下的事情。還有改進的多人遊戲元素和大量新武器，包括 X 射線狙擊步槍和爆炸霰彈槍。

Dino Crisis (USA) (Rev 1).name: 恐龍危機
Dino Crisis (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
An abandoned research complex on a remote jungle island, a team of special forces operatives, a horde of vicious velociraptors, and one big, mean Tyrannosaurus rex constitute the setting and cast of Dino Crisis, the latest masterpiece from the makers of Resident Evil.
 Dr. Edward Kirk is supposed to be dead. Three years ago while working to establish a new type of energy technology code-named Third Energy, an experiment went awry and terminated the brilliant scientist's life -- or so it was thought. It was recently learned, however, that Dr. Kirk is very much alive and continuing his work at a Borginia Republic research facility on Ibis Island.
 In order to investigate the situation, an elite special forces team including agents Regina, Gail and Rick was sent. The three expected another routine mission, but what they got was an all-out fight for their lives against an enemy they surely had never been trained to face -- dinosaurs!
 Luckily, Regina isn't restricted to limited firepower, as she'll come across shotguns, dart guns, and other weapons throughout the island. To gain access to the keys, code disks, and ID cards necessary for continued exploration, Regina must solve a variety of puzzles.
 Dino Crisis has three possible endings with a great deal of secrets becoming available after each has been viewed. These include new weapons, new costumes, and a "Wipe Out" mode in which you must defeat a certain number of dinosaurs within a designated time period.
Dino Crisis (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
《生化危機》製作者的最新傑作《恐龍危機》的背景和演員陣容包括一座偏遠叢林島嶼上的廢棄研究中心、一隊特種部隊特工、一群凶猛的迅猛龍和一隻兇惡的霸王龍。
愛德華·柯克博士應該已經死了。三年前，當我們致力於建立一種代號為“第三能源”的新型能源技術時，一次實驗出了差錯，結束了這位傑出科學家的生命——至少人們是這麼認為的。然而，最近獲悉，柯克博士仍然健在，並繼續在宜必思島上的博吉尼亞共和國研究機構工作。
為了調查這一情況，一支由特工雷吉娜、蓋爾和瑞克組成的精銳特種部隊被派出。三人期待著另一次例行任務，但他們得到的卻是與他們從未接受過面對的敵人——恐龍的全力戰鬥！
幸運的是，雷吉娜並不局限於有限的火力，因為她會在島上各處遇到霰彈槍、飛鏢槍和其他武器。為了獲得繼續探索所需的鑰匙、代碼盤和身份證，雷吉娜必須解決各種謎題。
恐龍危機有三種可能的結局，每個結局結束後都會發現大量秘密。其中包括新武器、新服裝和“消滅”模式，在該模式中，你必須在指定時間內擊敗一定數量的恐龍。

Mobile Suit Gundam - Char's Counterattac.name: 機動武鬥傳G GUNDAM
Mobile Suit Gundam - Char's Counterattac.original_desc:
The year is 0092. Advances in human technology have transformed the world. Mankind has built colonies in which they reside. But with peace comes-Doubt, disbelief, and eventually war. A group of colonies (similar to Axis) Have named them Zion. Fearing Zion, they have built " Mobile Suits", giant
Robots capable of destroying anything in their path. Fortunately, they were used for good.
Mobile Suit Gundam - Char's Counterattac.desc:
0092 年，人類科技的進步改變了世界。人類已經建立了他們居住的殖民地。但和平隨之而來——懷疑、懷疑，最終導致戰爭。一群殖民地（類似於軸心國）將它們命名為錫安。懼怕錫安，他們打造“機動戰士”，巨人
機器人能夠摧毀其路徑上的任何東西。幸運的是，它們被永遠利用了。

Bloody Roar II (USA).name: 血腥咆哮II
Bloody Roar II (USA).original_desc:
Bloody Roar is back with this sequel. Among the new and improved features are seven new characters (along with four original fighters) complete with new moves and looks. Like the original, each character has an inner-beast; Yugo morphs into a ravenous wolf and the vampire-like Jenny turns into a bat. There are nine initially selectable characters with two more waiting to be found.
			The Arcade mode offers a no-frills competition against the computerized AI. If players get bored with the Arcade mode, a second player can join in the action or select the Versus option -- a two-player brawl. Survival mode tests to see how many opponents a player can beat without getting knocked out. In the Story mode, the real draw of Bloody Roar II, each character comes with his or her own unique scenario. By winning rounds, the story unfurls and resolves after the final conflict.
Bloody Roar II (USA).desc:
血腥咆哮帶著續集回歸。新的和改進的功能包括七個具有新動作和外觀的新角色（以及四個原始戰士）。和原作一樣，每個角色都有一個內心的野獸；尤戈變成了一隻飢餓的狼，而吸血鬼般的珍妮則變成了一隻蝙蝠。最初有九個可選擇的角色，還有兩個等待被發現。
街機模式提供了與計算機人工智能的簡單競爭。如果玩家對街機模式感到厭倦，第二個玩家可以加入行動或選擇對戰選項——兩人鬥毆。生存模式測試玩家可以擊敗多少個對手而不被擊倒。在《血色咆哮 II》真正吸引人的故事模式中，每個角色都有自己獨特的場景。通過贏得回合，故事在最終衝突後展開並解決。

Heart of Darkness (USA).name: 黑暗之心
Heart of Darkness (USA).original_desc:
The eternally delayed Heart of Darkness has finally made its way to the PlayStation gaming console! One day, as Andy was in the park with his dog Whiskey, strange things started to happen. Almost in an instant, a vortex to some undiscovered realm opened up and sucked the poor doggie in. Determined to get his pooch back, Andy hopped in a homemade flying contraption and set off on a journey; where he was going, he did not know.
 On his way to this unknown world, Andy was met with some resistance and crash-landed into a wall of pure granite. Upon meeting up with a creepy monster, it was easy to see things were not kosher; this Land of Darkness has been overrun by horrific shadow monsters working in service of the Master of Darkness. It is the player's objective to ultimately destroy this evil nemesis, save Whiskey, and return home with both lives in tact.
Heart of Darkness (USA).desc:
永遠延遲的《黑暗之心》終於登陸 PlayStation 遊戲機了！有一天，當安迪和他的狗威士忌在公園裡時，奇怪的事情開始發生。幾乎在一瞬間，一個通往某個未被發現的領域的漩渦打開了，把可憐的小狗吸了進去。安迪決心要帶回他的狗，他跳上一個自製的飛行裝置，開始了一段旅程。他不知道他要去哪裡。
在前往這個未知世界的途中，安迪遇到了一些阻力，墜落到了一堵純花崗岩的牆上。當遇到一個令人毛骨悚然的怪物時，很容易看出事情不合時宜。這片黑暗之地已經被為黑暗之主服務的可怕暗影怪物佔領了。玩家的目標是最終消滅這個邪惡的宿敵，拯救威士忌，並安然無恙地回家。

Grandia (USA).name: 偉大的
Grandia (USA).original_desc:
Grandia is a Japanese-style console RPG, with big-eyed anime style characters, that was first released on the Sega Saturn in 1997.  It centers around the story of a young hero named Justin who possesses a mysterious artifact known as the 'Spirit Stone'.  The story takes Justin and friends (who range from a bratty eight year-old to a noble knight and a thief with a short fuse) through distant towns and abandoned ruins of a forgotten civilization (and even the occasional military base) in a search for adventure and secrets long hidden from the world. Grandia makes use of FMV cut-scenes to advance the story.

The characters are represented by 2D sprites which are moved around over 3D backgrounds in towns and dungeons.  Combat is initiated by coming into contact with enemies on the screen, rather than through random battles.  Combat itself occurs in pseudo-real-time, using an 'IP Gauge' to determine when a character takes action. Striking at the right time or with the right ability can even delay or cancel an enemy's turn.

The characters in the game gradually advance in level as they gain experience points for killing monsters. Characters also gain experience based on the weapon (e.g. sword, mace, whip, etc.) or magic (e.g. fire, water, etc.) that they use, powering up their spells and learning new ones from continuous usage.  There are a large number of spells, weapons, and other items to use throughout the game.
Grandia (USA).desc:
《Grandia》是一款日式主機角色扮演遊戲，擁有大眼睛的動漫風格角色，於 1997 年首次在世嘉土星上發布。它圍繞一位名叫賈斯汀的年輕英雄的故事，他擁有一件被稱為“靈魂之石”的神秘神器。故事講述賈斯汀和他的朋友們（從一個頑皮的八歲孩子到一個高貴的騎士和一個脾氣暴躁的小偷）穿越遙遠的城鎮和被遺忘的文明的廢棄廢墟（偶爾甚至是軍事基地），尋找冒險和長期隱藏在世界之外的秘密。Grandia 利用 FMV 過場動畫來推進故事情節。
