角色由 2D 精靈表示，這些精靈在城鎮和地牢的 3D 背景上移動。戰鬥是通過與屏幕上的敵人接觸來開始的，而不是通過隨機戰鬥。戰鬥本身以偽實時方式進行，使用“IP 計量表”來確定角色何時採取行動。在正確的時間或使用正確的能力進行攻擊甚至可以延遲或取消敵人的回合。

遊戲中的角色隨著擊殺怪物獲得經驗值而逐漸提升等級。角色還根據他們使用的武器（例如劍、狼牙棒、鞭子等）或魔法（例如火、水等）獲得經驗，增強他們的法術並通過持續使用學習新的法術。整個遊戲中有大量的咒語、武器和其他物品可供使用。

Silent Bomber (USA).name: 無聲轟炸機
Silent Bomber (USA).original_desc: Silent Bomber is an old school style game which takes place in the future.  You play as a character named Jutah Fate, a genetically engineered man created by the government.  You're an expert at using bombs.  You start out being able to set only a few bombs at a time, but eventually you can increase the number by collecting E-Chips.   It's a fast paced game of blowing things up before they blow you up.
Silent Bomber (USA).desc: 《無聲轟炸機》是一款發生在未來的老式風格遊戲。你扮演一個名叫 Jutah Fate 的角色，一個由政府創造的基因工程人。你是使用炸彈的專家。一開始你一次只能放置幾個炸彈，但最終你可以通過收集電子芯片來增加炸彈的數量。這是一款快節奏的遊戲，在東西炸毀你之前先把它們炸毀。

Spyro 2 - Ripto's Rage! (USA).name: 小龍斯派羅 2：里普託之怒！
Spyro 2 - Ripto's Rage! (USA).original_desc: Ripto's Rage is the second game in the Spyro the Dragon series, which started with Spyro the Dragon in 1998. The protagonist of the series, Spyro, is placed in the land of Avalar, rather than the Dragon Worlds, where the previous installment was set. A dinosaur-riding sorcerer, known as Ripto, has invaded the world of Avalar, and is wreaking havoc on its citizens with his magic. The player, as Spyro, must travel through the world of Avalar and undo the damage done by Ripto.
Spyro 2 - Ripto's Rage! (USA).desc: 《Ripto's Rage》是《小龍斯派羅》系列的第二款遊戲，該系列始於 1998 年的《小龍斯派羅》。該系列的主角小龍斯派羅的故事發生在阿瓦拉大陸，而不是前一作的龍世界。一位騎著恐龍的巫師，被稱為 Ripto，入侵了阿瓦拉世界，並用他的魔法對其公民造成了嚴重破壞。玩家扮演小龍斯派羅，必須穿越阿瓦拉世界並消除瑞普托造成的傷害。

Tomba! 2 - The Evil Swine Return (USA).name: 通巴！2 : 邪豬歸來
Tomba! 2 - The Evil Swine Return (USA).original_desc: Explore an all new 3D world. Use your trusty fire hammer, ice boomerang or or blackjack to turn the evil pigs into bacon. Throw on super-duds like a flying squirrel suit or high speed turbo pants. There's no limit to the stuff you can do.
Tomba! 2 - The Evil Swine Return (USA).desc: 探索全新的 3D 世界。使用你值得信賴的火錘、冰迴旋鏢或二十一點將邪惡的豬變成培根。穿上飛鼠服或高速渦輪褲等超級破爛的衣服。您可以做的事情沒有限制。

Harmful Park (Japan) (Translated).name: 有害公園
Harmful Park (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: Harmful Park was only released on the Playstation in Japan by a small company named Sky Think Systems. It's your standard 2D side-scrolling shooter, except set in a bizarre amusement park. As the (relatively lengthy) introduction tells you, an evil scientist has taken over Heartful Park and is using it for nefarious purposes. One of his colleagues aims to stop him, but she's old to do it herself. So, she commands her two slacker daughters to save the day, equipping them with some kind of flying motorcycle armed to the teeth with strange weapons.
Harmful Park (Japan) (Translated).desc: 《Harmful Park》僅由一家名為 Sky Think Systems 的小公司在日本的 Playstation 上發行。這是標準的 2D 橫向捲軸射擊遊戲，只不過背景設定在一個奇異的遊樂園中。正如（相對較長的）介紹所告訴您的那樣，一位邪惡的科學家已經接管了 Heartful Park 並將其用於邪惡的目的。他的一位同事想要阻止他，但她自己已經老了。因此，她命令她的兩個懶惰的女兒拯救世界，為她們配備了某種飛行摩托車，並配備了奇怪的武器。

Skullmonkeys (USA).name: 骷髏猴
Skullmonkeys (USA).original_desc:
Skullmonkeys is the successor title to The Neverhood, which came out only on PC (and, in Japan, as "Klaymen Klaymen" on PSX). The game is an old-school jump and run type of game, with a large number of FMVs. The entire game is molded in clay.

The player takes control of Klaymen throughout the game in an attempt to put a stop to the main opponent, being Klogg, who wants to destroy Klaymen's homeworld, The Neverhood, via a huge robot called "Evil Engine No. 9". He uses an army of extremely dumb skullmonkeys to stop Klaymen in his quest; With the exception of several strange, clay birds, each and every enemy in the game is a monkey. The game features music with lyrics by Terry Scott Taylor.
Skullmonkeys (USA).desc:
Skullmonkeys 是 The Neverhood 的後續作品，僅在 PC 上推出（在日本，PSX 上名為“Klaymen Klaymen”）。該遊戲是一款老派的跳躍和奔跑類型的遊戲，有大量的FMV。整個遊戲都是用粘土模製而成的。

玩家在整個遊戲中控制克萊曼，試圖阻止主要對手克洛格，後者想通過一個名為“9號邪惡引擎”的巨大機器人摧毀克萊曼的家鄉“永無世界”。他用一群極其愚蠢的骷髏猴來阻止克萊曼的任務；除了幾種奇怪的粘土鳥之外，遊戲中的每個敵人都是猴子。該遊戲的音樂由特里·斯科特·泰勒 (Terry Scott Taylor) 作詞。

Omega Boost (USA).name: 歐米茄增強
Omega Boost (USA).original_desc:
AlphaCore, the world's first sentient cyber-organism, has begun to mistrust its human masters. Slowly, it begins to spread, expanding its capabilities into neighboring systems. By the time the horrified human population discovers its size, AlphaCore controls virtually the entire network. As it defends itself, the humans try to regain control but events suddenly escalate.



 Eventually, AlphaCore declares war on the human population, attacking it with its own unmanned weapons and defense systems. As a result, desperate human scientists construct a time machine -- AlphaCore must be stopped before it achieves sentience! Discovering their plan, the renegade organism steals the time machine and utilizes it to return to the days of the first computer, ENIAC. By integrating its consciousness into ENIAC, AlphaCore hopes to become even more powerful.
Omega Boost (USA).desc:
AlphaCore，世界上第一個有知覺的網絡有機體，已經開始不信任它的人類主人。慢慢地，它開始傳播，將其功能擴展到鄰近的系統。當人們驚恐地發現其規模時，AlphaCore 幾乎控制了整個網絡。當它自衛時，人類試圖重新獲得控制權，但事態突然升級。



最終，AlphaCore 向人類宣戰，用自己的無人武器和防禦系統攻擊人類。結果，絕望的人類科學家建造了一台時間機器——必須在 AlphaCore 獲得知覺之前阻止它！發現他們的計劃後，叛逆的生物偷走了時間機器，並利用它回到了第一台計算機 ENIAC 的時代。通過將自己的意識融入ENIAC，AlphaCore希望變得更加強大。

Bushido Blade (USA).name: 武士道刀片
Bushido Blade (USA).original_desc:
The Bushido code of honor governs the actions of the Samurai and sets a code of ethics for use in fighting. Sometime in the 20th century, a group of Narukagami ninja, each proficient in a different style, find themselves in a battle to regain their honor in the fighting ring.
			 Bushido Blade is a unique fighting game, in that Square did away with health bars, special meters, and other traditional gimmicks and allowed for battles to be won with a single hit. This realism made the game a fan favorite among certain groups.
			 Players select from among six ninja, each of a different fighting style and attributes. Players also choose equipment from among eight weapons, including Japanese swords, European blades, naginata and a sledgehammer.
Bushido Blade (USA).desc:
武士道荣譽準則規範著武士的行為，並製定了戰鬥中使用的道德準則。在 20 世紀的某個時候，一群鳴神忍者，各自精通不同的風格，發現自己陷入了一場爭奪鬥技場榮耀的戰鬥中。
《武士道之刃》是一款獨特的格鬥遊戲，Square 取消了生命條、特殊儀表和其他傳統的噱頭，只需要一擊即可贏得戰鬥。這種真實感使該遊戲成為某些群體粉絲的最愛。
玩家從六名忍者中進行選擇，每個忍者都有不同的戰鬥風格和屬性。玩家還可以從八種武器中選擇裝備，包括日本刀、歐洲刀、薙刀和大錘。

iS - Internal Section (Japan) (Translate.name: iS : 內部部分
iS - Internal Section (Japan) (Translate.original_desc: INTERNAL SECTION is best described as a "sound reactive" shooting game. It is set up very similar to the classic arcade game TEMPEST or more recently, the PSX game N2O. All three of these are shooters where the player controls a ship "looking down" and long tunnel or tube and the player can move around inside the cylinder, shooting enemies that it runs to while moving. I will make most of my comparisons to N20 because it is apparent that the two games have a lot of similarities.
iS - Internal Section (Japan) (Translate.desc: 《INTERNAL SECTION》最貼切的描述是“聲音反應”射擊遊戲。它的設置與經典街機遊戲 TEMPEST 或最近的 PSX 遊戲 N2O 非常相似。這三款遊戲都是射擊遊戲，玩家控制一艘船“俯視”和長長的隧道或管道，玩家可以在圓柱體內移動，射擊移動時跑向的敵人。我將大部分與 N20 進行比較，因為很明顯這兩款遊戲有很多相似之處。

Brave Fencer Musashi (USA).name: 勇敢的劍士武藏
Brave Fencer Musashi (USA).original_desc:
Brave Fencer Musashi is an action role-playing video game developed and published by Square in 1998 for the PlayStation home console. The game involves real-time sword-based combat in a 3D environment; it also features segments of voiced over dialogue and role-playing game elements such as a day-night cycle and resting to restore energy.

The story follows Musashi, a young swordsman who is summoned to a parallel world to defend Allucanet Kingdom from the Thirstquencher Empire. He searches for the Five Scrolls, which can enhance the powers of his sword, while interacting with people from Allucanet and a nearby village.
Brave Fencer Musashi (USA).desc:
Brave Fencer Musashi 是 Square 於 1998 年為 PlayStation 家用遊戲機開發和發行的一款動作角色扮演視頻遊戲。遊戲涉及3D環境中的實時劍戰；它還具有配音對話片段和角色扮演遊戲元素，例如晝夜循環和休息以恢復能量。

故事講述年輕劍客武藏被召喚到平行世界，保衛阿盧卡內特王國免受飢渴帝國的侵害。他一邊與來自阿盧卡內特和附近村莊的人們互動，一邊尋找可以增強他的劍威力的五捲軸。

Front Mission 2 (Japan) (Translated).name: 前線任務2
Front Mission 2 (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The player assumes the role of an OCU Wanzer squad in 22nd century Aroldesh. One night while on routine patrol, the OCU base is infiltrated and attacked. Civil war is now loosed upon the nation of Aroldesh as a coup d'etat is staged.  

Front Mission 2 is the first 3D title in the strategy/RPG series and the first to hit the Playstation. An isometric view is used to navigate your Wanzers (mech) on the battlefield.  When the player engages an enemy the view switches to a 3rd-person perspective which shows the results of the battle. Between missions you can upgrade your Wanzer and talk with NPCs who will move the story forward. The game features over 30 missions and dozens of skills and weapons to outfit your crew with.
Front Mission 2 (Japan) (Translated).desc:
玩家扮演 22 世紀阿羅德什 OCU Wanzer 小隊的角色。一天晚上，在例行巡邏時，OCU 基地遭到滲透和襲擊。隨著政變的上演，阿羅德什國家陷入了內戰。

《前線任務 2》是策略/角色扮演系列中的第一款 3D 遊戲，也是第一款登陸 Playstation 的遊戲。等距視圖用於在戰場上導航您的機體（機甲）。當玩家與敵人交戰時，視圖會切換到第三人稱視角，顯示戰鬥結果。在任務之間，你可以升級你的機體並與 NPC 交談，他們將推動故事的發展。該遊戲擁有超過 30 個任務以及數十種技能和武器來裝備您的船員。

Final Fantasy Chronicles - Chrono Trigge.name: 最終幻想編年史：時空之輪
Final Fantasy Chronicles - Chrono Trigge.original_desc:
What begins as a carefree day at the Millennial Fair for a young man named Crono turns into a huge adventure. He will be thrusted into the ultimate trip through time and space, encountering new friends, defeating the forces of evil, and encountering the one who would destroy the flow of time.
Chrono Trigger is a role-playing game, with the usual game mechanics fare. As the characters grow in power, not only their ability scores increase, but they also learn new "Techs".
The game utilizes the ATB (active time battle) combat system from Final Fantasy game. Apart from normal Techs, it is possible to use Double and Triple Techniques.There are no random battles in the game, as all the enemies are visible on screen, and it's even possible to just pass by them entirely.
The game allows you to face your ultimate adversary at different points of time, which leads to several different endings.
Final Fantasy Chronicles - Chrono Trigge.desc:
對於一個名叫克羅諾的年輕人來說，在千禧年博覽會上度過的無憂無慮的一天變成了一場巨大的冒險。他將被推入一場穿越時空的終極之旅，結識新朋友，擊敗邪惡勢力，並遇到破壞時間流動的人。
《時空之輪》是一款角色扮演遊戲，具有常見的遊戲機制。隨著角色力量的增強，他們不僅能力得分會增加，而且還會學習新的“技術”。
該遊戲採用了《最終幻想》遊戲中的ATB（主動時間戰鬥）戰鬥系統。除了普通科技外，還可以使用雙重和三重技術。遊戲中沒有隨機戰鬥，因為所有敵人都在屏幕上可見，甚至可以完全繞過他們。
遊戲讓你在不同的時間點面對你的終極對手，這會導致幾個不同的結局。

Chou Jikuu Yousai Macross - Ai Oboete Im.key: Chou Jikuu Yousai Macross - Ai Oboete Imasu ka (Japan)
Chou Jikuu Yousai Macross - Ai Oboete Im.original_name: Chou Jikuu Yousai Macross : Ai Oboete Imasu ka
Chou Jikuu Yousai Macross - Ai Oboete Im.name: 宏：你還記得我嗎？
Chou Jikuu Yousai Macross - Ai Oboete Im.original_desc:
Macross was a very popular mecha show made in the 1980s. It is better known in the states as Robotech. Macross, do you remember love is based on the movie version of the show. It is a compressed version made in the 1990.
 The game had a solid mix of 2D and 3D action and special effects that added depth to its gameplay, and lastly it was released on 2 CDs as it contained footage and sounds of the movie. The footage contained new scenes that showed Hikaru Ichijyo and his fellow pilots still on Earth flying on their way to the SDF-1 Macross which made a space fold jump just in time before the Zentradi's massive attack reached them. There are also several completely re-animated scenes, and some scenes that have been done completely with computer animation, such as the transformation of the SDF-1.
Chou Jikuu Yousai Macross - Ai Oboete Im.desc:
《超時空要塞》是 20 世紀 80 年代製作的一部非常受歡迎的機甲節目。它在美國更廣為人知的是“太空堡壘”。超時空要塞，你還記得《愛情》是根據電影版改編的嗎？它是 1990 年製作的壓縮版本。
該遊戲將 2D 和 3D 動作以及特效完美結合，增加了遊戲玩法的深度，最後它以 2 張 CD 的形式發行，因為它包含了電影的鏡頭和聲音。這段鏡頭包含新的場景，顯示一條光和他仍在地球上的飛行員同伴正在飛往 SDF-1 超時空要塞的途中，在 Zentradi 的大規模攻擊到達他們之前，該超時空跳躍進行了一次空間折疊跳躍。還有幾個完全重新製作動畫的場景，以及一些完全用計算機動畫完成的場景，例如 SDF-1 的變形。

Persona 2 - Eternal Punishment (USA).name: 女神異聞錄2：永恆的懲罰
Persona 2 - Eternal Punishment (USA).original_desc:
The follow-up to 1996's Revelations Series: Persona, Persona 2 is a role-playing game pitting high-school teenagers against demons. While investigating the rumor of a curse at the Seven Sister's High School, magazine editor Mary Amano comes face-to-face with a murderer. A mysterious man by the name of Tatsuya Suou saves her, but from this moment on her life is irrevocably changed.
 As with many RPGs, players can gather a party of characters with distinct personalities and attacks. When a random battle begins, the player must first decide upon specific attacks and character turn-order before the fighting begins. Battles will continue until one side is eliminated, although there is also an option to partake in more traditional turn-based battles. Personas, the characters' powerful alter egos, can be used in battle to perform some of the more devastating attacks in the game. That said, not all encounters in the game need to be solved through fisticuffs.
 By using the game's Contact system, players can negotiate with demons and ask them questions. Each character in the party has a different way of negotiating and using the correct negotiator can mean the difference between a successful or failed negotiation. Success will sometimes result in the player receiving money, information, or Tarot Cards -- powerful items that can be used to summon new Personas.
Persona 2 - Eternal Punishment (USA).desc:
《女神異聞錄 2》是 1996 年《啟示錄系列：女神異聞錄》的後續作品，是一款角色扮演遊戲，讓高中青少年對抗惡魔。在調查七姐妹高中的詛咒謠言時，雜誌編輯天野瑪麗與一名殺人犯面對面。一位名叫須王達也的神秘男子救了她，但從這一刻起，她的生活發生了不可挽回的改變。
與許多角色扮演遊戲一樣，玩家可以聚集一群具有獨特個性和攻擊方式的角色。當隨機戰鬥開始時，玩家必須在戰鬥開始之前首先決定具體的攻擊和角色回合順序。戰鬥將持續到一方被消滅為止，不過也可以選擇參加更傳統的回合製戰鬥。人物角色是角色強大的另一個自我，可以在戰鬥中使用來執行遊戲中一些更具破壞性的攻擊。也就是說，並非遊戲中的所有遭遇都需要通過打鬥來解決。
通過使用遊戲的接觸系統，玩家可以與惡魔談判並向他們提問。隊伍中的每個角色都有不同的談判方式，使用正確的談判者可能意味著談判成功或失敗。成功有時會導致玩家收到金錢、信息或塔羅牌——可以用來召喚新角色的強大物品。

Ehrgeiz - God Bless the Ring (USA).name: 埃赫蓋茲：上帝保佑戒指
Ehrgeiz - God Bless the Ring (USA).original_desc:
An ancient weapon of unknown origin was found in a German castle some fifty years ago. Since it was obviously something of value, it was decided that it would be awarded to the best fighter in the world. After all, who would appreciate a weapon more than an experienced fighter? Eleven of the world's finest combatants (including Cloud Strife, Tifa Lockhart and Vincent Valentine) have set out to claim this prize.
 The mysterious artifact came to be known as Ehrgeiz, and the tournament that was built around it took on the very same name. Now rumors suggest that the door to a long-forgotten land can be unlocked with this weapon; a land that could reveal the secret of immortality. The tournament has taken on a whole new meaning!
Ehrgeiz - God Bless the Ring (USA).desc:
大約五十年前，在一座德國城堡中發現了一件來歷不明的古代武器。由於它顯然很有價值，因此決定將其授予世界上最好的戰鬥機。畢竟，誰會比經驗豐富的戰士更欣賞武器呢？十一位世界上最優秀的戰士（包括克勞德·斯特萊夫、蒂法·洛克哈特和文森特·瓦倫丁）已開始爭奪這一獎項。
這件神秘的神器後來被稱為“Ehrgeiz”，圍繞它舉辦的錦標賽也採用了同樣的名字。現在有傳言稱，可以用這種武器打開通往長期被遺忘的土地的大門；一片可以揭示不朽秘密的土地。本屆賽事有了全新的意義！

Rapid Reload (Europe).name: 快速裝彈
Rapid Reload (Europe).original_desc:
The object of interest in this game is the mysterious Valkiry Stone. Two treasure hunters, Axel and Ruka, set out to find the stone, but the evil gang known as the Pumpkin Heads wants to find the stone first.

As either Axel or Ruka, blast your way through six side-scrolling levels against hordes of enemies, facing off against several bosses in each level. You can select from four different weapon effects (normal, bouncing, homing and flamethrower), use smartbombs and a grappling hook.
Rapid Reload (Europe).desc:
這款遊戲的關注對像是神秘的瓦爾基里石。兩名寶藏獵人阿克塞爾和魯卡出發尋找這塊石頭，但被稱為“南瓜頭”的邪惡幫派卻想先找到這塊石頭。

扮演 Axel 或 Ruka，在六個橫向捲軸關卡中殺出一條血路，對抗成群結隊的敵人，並在每個關卡中對抗多個 Boss。你可以選擇四種不同的武器效果（普通、彈跳、自導和火焰噴射器），使用智能炸彈和抓鉤。

Rayman 2 - The Great Escape (USA) (En,Fr.name: 雷曼2：大逃殺
Rayman 2 - The Great Escape (USA) (En,Fr.original_desc:
Rayman 2: The Great Escape is an action-adventure video game developed by Ubi Soft Montpellier.

Rayman 2 takes place in a world called the Glade of Dreams, and revolves around its invasion and occupation by an armada of interstellar Robo-Pirates, led by Admiral Razorbeard. Prior to the invasion, the Robo-Pirates destroyed over one hundred planets in the galaxy, with the intention of enslaving their inhabitants. Upon the invasion of the Glade of Dreams, the Robo-Pirates were battled against by Rayman, Globox, and other allies. After some battles, Rayman's capture occurs after the explosion of the Primordial Core. Ly the Fairy telepathically communicates with Rayman explaining the consequences of the damage, with the core's shattering into 1000 Yellow Lums, and the capture of many fighters. Rayman's powers are also lost due to this, and he finds himself captured by the Robo-Pirates at the beginning of the game.
Rayman 2 - The Great Escape (USA) (En,Fr.desc:
《雷曼2：大逃亡》是一款由 Ubi Soft Montpellier 開發的動作冒險視頻遊戲。

《雷曼 2》的故事發生在一個名為“夢境林地”的世界，圍繞由剃須鬍子海軍上將領導的星際機器人海盜艦隊的入侵和占領展開。在入侵之前，機器人海盜摧毀了銀河系中的一百多個行星，目的是奴役其居民。在夢境林地入侵後，機器人海盜遭到雷曼、格洛克斯和其他盟友的戰鬥。經過一番戰鬥，雷曼在原始核心爆炸後被捕。仙女 Ly 通過心靈感應與雷曼交流，解釋了損壞的後果，核心破碎成 1000 個黃色 Lums，並俘獲了許多戰士。雷曼的力量也因此喪失，他發現自己在遊戲開始時被機器人海盜俘虜了。

Kitchen Panic (Japan).name: 廚房恐慌
Kitchen Panic (Japan).original_desc:
Incredibly cute platformer in which you play a little brown thing, hopping along through giant kitchen levels filled with gushing tap water, stacks of dishes, vicious serrated knives and tin cans, valuable vegetables, dangerous soap bubbles and so forth.
 The gameplay gimmick here is spin: during a jump you can press up or down to start your character to spinning forward or back. Then when next you press Jump, he'll either launch himself way straight up (backspin) or a long way forward (front spin).
 And of course there's plenty of call to use the spin jumps
Kitchen Panic (Japan).desc:
令人難以置信的可愛平台遊戲，你扮演一個棕色的小東西，在巨大的廚房裡跳躍，裡面充滿了湧出的自來水、成堆的盤子、兇惡的鋸齒刀和錫罐、珍貴的蔬菜、危險的肥皂泡等等。
這裡的遊戲技巧是旋轉：在跳躍過程中，您可以向上或向下按以使角色向前或向後旋轉。然後，當您下次按下“跳躍”時，他會直接向上（後旋）或向前很遠（前旋）發射。
當然，還有很多人要求使用旋轉跳躍

Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2 (USA).name: 托尼·霍克的職業溜冰者 2
Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2 (USA).original_desc: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2 features the series' trademark open-ended gameplay, in which the player (playing as a professional skateboarder) completes a number of tasks which result in cash rewards. With money gained, the player can then purchase skill improvements and better skateboards. THPS2 was also the first game in the series to introduce the manual, a skateboarding trick where the performer balances on two wheels. This enables players to string together trick combos. The game also introduced the Noseslide, Tailslide, Bluntslide, Nosebluntside, Feeble, and Overcrook grinds. It was also the first of the Pro Skater games to feature Create-a-Skater and Park Editor features, now staples in the series.
Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2 (USA).desc: Tony Hawk 的 Pro Skater 2 具有該系列標誌性的開放式遊戲玩法，其中玩家（扮演專業滑板手）完成一系列任務，從而獲得現金獎勵。通過獲得金錢，玩家可以購買技能改進和更好的滑板。THPS2 也是該系列中第一款引入手冊的遊戲，這是一種表演者在兩個輪子上保持平衡的滑板技巧。這使得玩家能夠將技巧組合串在一起。遊戲還引入了 Noseslide、Tailslide、Bluntslide、Nosebluntside、Feeble 和 Overcrook 研磨。這也是第一款具有“創建溜冰者”和“公園編輯器”功能的職業溜冰者遊戲，這些功能現已成為該系列的主要內容。

MediEvil (USA).name: 醫療邪惡
MediEvil (USA).original_desc: The Evil Wizard Zarok has returned from the dead to wreak havoc on a peaceful land, and it is up to the centuries-dead hero, Sir Daniel Fortesque, to rise from his grave and defeat the very nemesis that put him in that grave.  Wander the land, destroying Zarok's undead minions; collect chalices to grant him more powerful weapons; solve puzzles in order to defeat the evil wizard and restore peace to the land -- so Daniel can go back to his eternal slumber.
MediEvil (USA).desc: 邪惡巫師扎羅克死而復生，對和平的土地造成了嚴重破壞，死去數百年的英雄丹尼爾·福特斯克爵士有責任從墳墓中復活，擊敗將他送入墳墓的宿敵。漫步這片土地，消滅扎羅克的不死爪牙；收集聖杯以賦予他更強大的武器；解決謎題以擊敗邪惡的巫師並恢復大地的和平——這樣丹尼爾就可以回到他永恆的沉睡之中。

Breath of Fire III (USA).name: 火之呼吸 III
Breath of Fire III (USA).original_desc:
Set free by the the workers of Dauna Mine, Ryu of the Brood learns to both understand his power, and to understand the history of his extinct kind. By both utilizing Ryu's unique power and the abilities of those whom assist him, players will uncover the history of the Brood, learn more about the characters, and the very reason why the Brood were wiped out.

Players control Ryu and his allies on their journey, each of Ryu's friends have abilities only they can use, and they will have to work together to make their way through the obstacles and enemies that they encounter; creativity is key to your success in this game!

Ryu eventually is able to utilize his power of the Brood, allowing him to ascend into various dragon-like forms. This is done using a gene-splicing system that dictates what sort of form Ryu will take.
Breath of Fire III (USA).desc:
被多納礦的工人釋放後，龍族的龍學會了了解自己的力量，並了解其滅絕種族的歷史。通過利用 Ryu 的獨特力量和協助他的人的能力，玩家將揭開母巢的歷史，了解更多關於角色的信息，以及母巢被消滅的真正原因。

玩家控制Ryu和他的盟友踏上旅程，Ryu的每個朋友都擁有隻有他們才能使用的能力，他們必須齊心協力，克服遇到的障礙和敵人；創造力是您在這款遊戲中取得成功的關鍵！

龍最終能夠利用他的母巢之力，讓他提升為各種龍類形態。這是通過基因剪接系統完成的，該系統決定了 Ryu 將採取什麼樣的形式。

Wild Arms (USA).name: 狂野武器
Wild Arms (USA).original_desc:
Wild Arms is a classic style RPG with some wild west aspects such as guns (called ARMS) thrown in.  The main map view is done with graphics similar in style to those found on SNES RPGs but to a higher quality.  Combat is a typical turn based mode in 3D mode where you designate each characters actions at the start of each round.

During the game you control three characters: Rudy, a wanderer who uses ARMS, Jack, a treasure hunter, and Cecilia, an aprentice wizard.  During the game you encounter the usual hordes of monsters and discover a series of giant robot like cretures refered to as golems which play an important role in the plot.
Wild Arms (USA).desc:
Wild Arms 是一款經典風格的 RPG，其中加入了一些狂野西部元素，例如槍支（稱為 ARMS）。主地圖視圖的圖形風格與 SNES RPG 中的圖形相似，但質量更高。戰鬥是 3D 模式中典型的回合製模式，您可以在每輪開始時指定每個角色的動作。

在遊戲中，你控制三個角色：魯迪，一個使用武器的流浪者，傑克，一個寶藏獵人，和塞西莉亞，一個學徒巫師。在遊戲過程中，你會遇到常見的成群怪物，並發現一系列巨型機器人般的生物，稱為傀儡，它們在情節中發揮著重要作用。

Gradius Gaiden (Japan) (Rev 1).name: 梯度外傳
Gradius Gaiden (Japan) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Evil lurks out there in the universe and only you, aboard your trusty Vic Viper starfighter, can put an end to it. Gradius Gaiden is yet another shooter in the Gradius series.

Gameplay consists of moving your fighter across side-scrolling stages shooting everything in sight and avoiding enemy fire, with your objective being to reach the end and defeat the stage boss to move on. You can collect power-ups which fills your power-up bards and which can then be triggered at any time for a specific effect depending on what bar is active at the moment. 

The game uses 2D graphics with some polygonal elements and features 2-player co-op gameplay as well as the option to select from four starfighters to take into battle.
Gradius Gaiden (Japan) (Rev 1).desc:
邪惡潛伏在宇宙中，只有你駕駛值得信賴的維克·毒蛇星際戰鬥機才能消滅它。《Gradius Gaiden》是《Gradius》系列中的另一款射擊遊戲。

遊戲玩法包括讓你的戰鬥機穿過橫向捲軸關卡，射擊視野中的一切並躲避敵人的火力，你的目標是到達終點並擊敗關卡老闆繼續前進。您可以收集能量提升，填充您的能量提升吟遊詩人，然後可以隨時觸發這些能量提升以獲得特定效果，具體取決於當前激活的能量條。

該遊戲採用帶有一些多邊形元素的 2D 圖形，具有 2 人合作遊戲玩法，以及從四名星際戰鬥機中進行選擇以參加戰鬥的選項。

Crash Bandicoot (USA).name: 古惑狼
Crash Bandicoot (USA).original_desc: Crash Bandicoot, a heroic, agile and mutated marsupial who must save his girlfriend Tawna. The main antagonist is Doctor Neo Cortex, a mad scientist who was often ridiculed by the scientific community for his outlandish (but nearly workable) theories and is now motivated to prove his tormentors wrong by creating a mutated army of beasts to conquer the world. Cortex's henchman is Doctor Nitrus Brio, the insecure creator of the Evolvo-Ray. Crash's love interest is Tawna, a female bandicoot about to undergo experimentation by the Doctors. Helping Crash in his journey is an ancient witch doctor spirit named Aku Aku, who has scattered masks of himself throughout the islands to grant Crash special powers. The boss characters of the game include Papu Papu, the obese and short-tempered chief of the native village; Ripper Roo, a demented kangaroo with razor-sharp toenails; Koala Kong, a muscular but unintelligent koala; and Pinstripe Potoroo, the tommy gun-wielding bodyguard of Doctor Cortex.
Crash Bandicoot (USA).desc: 古惑狼是一隻英雄、敏捷、變異的有袋動物，他必須拯救他的女朋友塔娜。主要對手是尼奧·皮克斯博士，他是一位瘋狂的科學家，經常因其古怪（但幾乎可行）的理論而受到科學界的嘲笑，現在他有動力通過創造一支變異的野獸軍隊來征服世界來證明折磨他的人是錯誤的。Cortex 的追隨者是 Nitrus Brio 博士，他是 Evolvo-Ray 的不安全感創造者。克拉什的愛人是塔娜，一隻即將接受博士實驗的雌性強盜。在旅途中幫助克拉什的是一位名叫阿庫阿庫的古代巫醫靈魂，他將自己的面具散佈在整個島嶼上，以賦予克拉什特殊的力量。遊戲的頭目角色包括肥胖且脾氣暴躁的原住民村長帕普帕普（Papu Papu）； Ripper Roo，一隻瘋狂的袋鼠，有著鋒利的腳趾甲； Koala Kong，一隻肌肉發達但不聰明的考拉；還有細條紋波托魯（Pinstripe Potoroo），他是皮質博士的持湯米槍的保鏢。

Breath of Fire IV (USA).name: 火之呼吸 IV
Breath of Fire IV (USA).original_desc:
Nina, the princess of Wyndia, and Cray, chieftain of the cat-like Woren tribe, are searching for Cray's relatives who disappeared under mysterious circumstances during a diplomatic mission. Flying through the sky on their sandflier, Nina and Cray are attacked by a worm shaped dragon. With their vehicle damaged, Nina returns to the city to find parts, bumping into a naked young boy named Ryu along the way, who is unsure of where he is. At the very same time, Nina is again attacked by a dragon. Confused by the strange events taking place, Nina agrees to help the young boy. Meanwhile, the ancient Emperor Fou Lu awakens from his slumber in his tomb. His plan is to return to the world of human, conquer it anew, and impose his iron rule on it...
This fourth installment of the Breath of Fire series is a fairly traditional Japanese-style RPG, with turn-based combat, party management, linear story progression, and other characteristic elements of the genre.
Breath of Fire IV (USA).desc:
溫迪亞公主妮娜和像貓一樣的沃倫部落酋長克雷正在尋找在一次外交任務中神秘失踪的克雷親戚。尼娜和克雷乘坐沙蠅飛過天空，遭到一條蟲形龍的攻擊。車輛受損後，尼娜返回城裡尋找零件，途中撞見了一個名叫 Ryu 的裸體小男孩，他不確定自己在哪裡。與此同時，妮娜再次遭到巨龍的攻擊。尼娜對發生的奇怪事件感到困惑，她同意幫助這個小男孩。與此同時，遠古皇帝傅祿從墳墓中的沉睡中醒來。他的計劃是重返人類世界，重新征服它，並對其實行鐵腕統治……
《火焰之息》系列的第四部是一款相當傳統的日式角色扮演遊戲，具有回合製戰鬥、隊伍管理、線性故事進程以及該類型的其他特色元素。

Klonoa - Door to Phantomile (USA).name: Clonoia : Phantomile 帶門
Klonoa - Door to Phantomile (USA).original_desc: Klonoa: Door to Phantomile is a side-scrolling platform game viewed from a "2.5D" perspective. The player moves the protagonist, Klonoa, along a path in a two-dimensional fashion, but the game is rendered in three dimensions. This allows the path followed to curve and for the player to interact with objects outside of the path. The game is divided into levels called "Visions", where the player progresses by following a path with defeatable computer-controlled enemies and puzzles that must be solved. At the end of some levels, the player must defeat a boss - a powerful enemy.
Klonoa - Door to Phantomile (USA).desc: Klonoa: Door to Phantomile 是一款從“2.5D”視角觀看的橫向捲軸平台遊戲。玩家以二維方式沿著一條路徑移動主角 Klonoa，但遊戲是以三維方式呈現的。這允許所遵循的路徑彎曲並允許玩家與路徑之外的對象交互。遊戲分為多個稱為“願景”的關卡，玩家通過沿著可擊敗的計算機控制的敵人和必須解決的謎題的路徑前進。在某些關卡結束時，玩家必須擊敗頭目——一個強大的敵人。

Devil Dice (USA).name: 惡魔骰子
Devil Dice (USA).original_desc:
Using Devils to wipe out rows of dice, play one-to-one challenges or take on four friends in a frenetic battle for survival in this devilishly fiendish multi-player puzzle game.

Choice of 4 different game modes: race against the clock, attempt increasingly challenging puzzles, team up with a friend or battle to be the sole survivor.
Devil Dice (USA).desc:
在這款惡魔般的多人益智遊戲中，使用惡魔消滅一排骰子，進行一對一的挑戰，或者與四個朋友展開激烈的生存之戰。

4 種不同的遊戲模式可供選擇：與時間賽跑、嘗試越來越具有挑戰性的謎題、與朋友組隊或戰鬥成為唯一的倖存者。

Legend of Legaia (USA).name: 雷蓋亞傳奇
Legend of Legaia (USA).original_desc:
After creating a massive world with vast oceans, landscapes and an infinite universe, God instituted human beings to keep his creation in order. Upon realization that man was mortally flawed with weaknesses and feelings, he created a mysterious force known as the Seru; these stone objects would aid humans in decisions and day to day functions. Worn as an apparel item, they granted the wearer many strengths and abilities ranging from the movement of heavy objects to flying capabilities. Thus, human life was made easier -- the Seru would forever obey their masters.
 And then the Mist arrived.
 Filled with destructive means and hatred, the Mist covered the human's cultivated lands and destroyed a seemingly eternal bond with the Seru. Instead of loyally helping their masters, the mysterious stones turned against the humans; they became maniacal tools of evil, controlling minds and ruining innocent lives. The human existence was reduced tremendously with few survivors fleeing to uncharted territories. Perhaps the Mist wouldn't find them wherever they ran.
Legend of Legaia (USA).desc:
在創造了一個擁有廣闊海洋、風景和無限宇宙的巨大世界後，上帝創造了人類來維持他的創造秩序。當他意識到人類在弱點和感情方面存在致命缺陷後，他創造了一種神秘的力量，稱為塞魯（Seru）；這些石製品將幫助人類做出決定和日常工作。作為服裝穿戴時，它們賦予穿戴者許多力量和能力，從移動重物到飛行能力。因此，人類的生活變得更加容易——塞魯人將永遠服從他們的主人。
然後迷霧來了。
迷霧充滿了破壞性的手段和仇恨，覆蓋了人類的耕地，摧毀了與塞魯人看似永恆的聯繫。這些神秘的石頭並沒有忠誠地幫助它們的主人，而是轉而反對人類。他們成為邪惡的瘋狂工具，控制思想並毀掉無辜的生命。人類的生存大大減少，很少有倖存者逃到未知的領域。也許無論他們跑到哪裡，迷霧都找不到他們。

Wipeout XL (USA).name: 消除 XL
Wipeout XL (USA).original_desc:
WipEout XL is set in the year 2097, around four decades after its predecessor. Instead of the F3600 anti-gravity racing competition, the game features an even faster and more dangerous tournament: the F5000 AG league. The gameplay system is similar to that of the previous game: players race against each other or computer in high-speed futuristic environments, liberally picking up weapons scattered around the stages and using them against the opponents to finish the race in the highest position.

Each vehicle is provided with a shield; once this shield is breached (by weapons or other kinds of damage), the craft explodes. As in the first game, the vehicles move at very high speeds. The game's four difficulty levels are used to crank the speed up and down, with the highest setting corresponding to the highest speed. In addition to the main championship mode, there are also challenge modes, winning in which rewards the player with faster game settings, new tracks, and new vehicles.
Wipeout XL (USA).desc:
《WipEout XL》的背景設定在 2097 年，距其前作大約四十年。遊戲中沒有 F3600 反重力賽車比賽，而是更快、更危險的錦標賽：F5000 AG 聯賽。遊戲系統與前作類似：玩家在高速的未來環境中與彼此或電腦競賽，隨意拾取散佈在舞台上的武器，並用它們對抗對手，以最高的位置完成比賽。

每輛車都配有防護罩；一旦這個護盾被破壞（被武器或其他類型的傷害），飛船就會爆炸。與第一款遊戲一樣，車輛以非常高的速度移動。遊戲的四個難度級別用於調節速度，最高設置對應最高速度。除了主要的錦標賽模式外，還有挑戰模式，獲勝後會獎勵玩家更快的遊戲設置、新賽道和新車輛。

Spyro - Year of the Dragon (USA) (Rev 1).name: 小龍斯派羅：龍年
Spyro - Year of the Dragon (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: Thieves have kidnapped a brood of dragon eggs, while, elsewhere in the Dragon Lands, a gateway to the Forgotten World has been uncovered. Sent to recapture the eggs, Spyro the Dragon, and his best friend Sparx, face a journey into uncharted territory against his most fearsome enemy yet - the Sorceress! All new playable characters, frantic challenges and new exciting worlds to explore - the Year of the Dragon begins here!
Spyro - Year of the Dragon (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 盜賊綁架了一群龍蛋，而在巨龍之地的其他地方，通往被遺忘世界的大門也被發現了。龍斯派羅和他最好的朋友斯帕克斯被派去奪迴龍蛋，他們將踏上未知領域的旅程，對抗他迄今為止最可怕的敵人——女巫！所有新的可玩角色、瘋狂的挑戰和令人興奮的新世界可供探索 - 龍年從這裡開始！

Tiny Tank (USA).name: 小坦克
Tiny Tank (USA).original_desc:
In a future world, an army of steel robots are out to destroy the human race. Our only hope is a little yellow tank armed with some mighty big guns. The sentient Tiny Tank was originally created to appease a public that feared the mindless violence waged by larger war-robots, but he was soon destroyed by one of those jealous automatons at the beginning of the robot revolution 100 years ago. Almost destroyed, at least.
 Thanks to nano-technology, hundreds of microscopic "Fix-It Crabs" went to work and Tiny Tank was slowly rebuilt. Now he alone stands against the threat of the cruel MuTank and his deadly robot minions, who have all but erased human civilization from the planet's surface. The spunky little tank will need luck, strategy, and all the futuristic firepower he can get his treads on to save the human race.
 STORY:
 Sometime before 2094 A.D., all of Earth's armed forces were disintegrated into one large corporation, SenTrax. SenTrax vowed to create a robot army to fight humanity's wars, so mankind itself would not have to. However, they needed the peoples' vote to set this plan into motion, and thus developed the titular "Tiny Tank" - a small yellow tank with an occasionally unfriendly attitude. The creation of this cute killing machine made SenTrax's popularity skyrocket, and won them the vote. As thanks, the corporation set up an exhibition showing their yellow mascot fighting off the entire SenTrax army on July 4, 2094, broadcast live over the Internet. However, once the event began, one of the SenTrax robots had been accidentally fitted with live ammunition and destroyed Tiny with one shot. As a result, Tiny's "positronic brain" (his artificial intelligence system) shattered, and its shards gave "life" to the entire robot army. The robot that had fired the shot, now self-aware and calling himself Mutank, took control of the rampant robots and began to eliminate humanity so that machines could thrive. Humanity was forced to evacuate into underground asteroid shelters as the mechanical army conquered the surface.
 On July 4, 2194 A.D., exactly 100 years later, Tiny Tank was finally rebuilt thanks to automated SenTrax Fix-It Crabs, which were minuscule robots made to repair broken machinery. A female artificial intelligence on board an orbital satellite reawakened Tiny, and sent him to fight Mutank's robot army and save mankind.
 GAMEPLAY:
 Tiny Tank is a relatively straightforward third person shooter. The player controls Tiny as he traverses many levels, eliminating SenTrax forces as he goes. There are two bars at the top of the screen that show Tiny's health and the amount of nanometal acquired. Nanometal is essential for the on-board Fix-It Crabs to repair Tiny. If the nanometal meter runs out, health cannot be regenerated. There is also a map on the upper right hand corner identifying the surroundings, enemies, and mission objectives.Tiny canalso pick up fallen parts from destroyed enemie.
 Features:
 Free-roaming warfare across 3D battlefields
 Command "Teeny Weeny" tanks to scout ahead or retrieve weapons
 Analog Control and Vibration Function compatible
 Two-player Death Match mode
Tiny Tank (USA).desc:
在未來的世界中，一支鋼鐵機器人軍隊正準備毀滅人類。我們唯一的希望是一輛配備一些強大的大砲的黃色小坦克。有感知能力的小坦克最初是為了安撫公眾而創建的，他們擔心大型戰爭機器人會發動無意識的暴力，但在 100 年前機器人革命開始時，他很快就被其中一個嫉妒的機器人摧毀了。至少幾乎被摧毀了。
借助納米技術，數百隻微型“修復螃蟹”開始工作，小坦克慢慢被重建。現在，他獨自一人對抗殘酷的 MuTank 和他致命的機器人爪牙的威脅，他們幾乎將人類文明從地球表面抹去了。這輛充滿活力的小坦克需要運氣、策略和所有未來的火力才能拯救人類。
故事：
公元 2094 年之前的某個時間，地球上的所有武裝部隊都被解散為一家大公司，SenTrax。SenTrax 發誓要創建一支機器人軍隊來打人類的戰爭，這樣人類就不必這樣做了。然而，他們需要人民的投票來實施這一計劃，因此開發了名義上的“小坦克”——一種偶爾態度不友好的黃色小坦克。這個可愛的殺人機器的創造讓SenTrax的人氣飆升，並為他們贏得了選票。為了表示感謝，該公司於 2094 年 7 月 4 日舉辦了一場展覽，展示他們的黃色吉祥物與整個 SenTrax 軍隊的戰鬥，並通過互聯網進行現場直播。然而，活動開始後，其中一台 SenTrax 機器人意外裝上了實彈，一槍摧毀了 Tiny。結果，蒂尼的“正電子大腦”（他的人工智能係統）碎裂了，它的碎片給了整個機器人大軍“生命”。開槍的機器人現在有了自我意識，自稱變異坦克，控制了猖獗的機器人，開始消滅人類，以便機器能夠蓬勃發展。當機械軍隊征服地表時，人類被迫撤離到地下小行星避難所。
公元 2194 年 7 月 4 日，整整 100 年後，小坦克終於在自動化的 SenTrax Fix-It Crabs 的幫助下得到了重建，這是一種用於修復損壞機器的微型機器人。軌道衛星上的女性人工智能喚醒了小小，並派他去對抗 Mutank 的機器人軍隊並拯救人類。
遊戲玩法：
《小坦克》是一款相對簡單的第三人稱射擊遊戲。玩家控制 Tiny 穿越多個關卡，並在其前進過程中消滅 SenTrax 部隊。屏幕頂部有兩個欄，顯示小小的健康狀況和獲得的納米金屬數量。納米金屬對於船上的 Fix-It Crabs 修復 Tiny 至關重要。如果納米金屬計耗盡，健康將無法恢復。右上角還有一張地圖，標明周圍環境、敵人和任務目標。小小還可以撿起被摧毀的敵人掉落的零件。
特點：
跨 3D 戰場的自由漫遊戰爭
命令“Teeny Weeny”坦克偵察前方或收回武器
兼容模擬控制和振動功能
兩人死亡競賽模式

Oddworld - Abe's Oddysee (USA) (Rev 2).name: 奇異世界：安倍的奧德賽
Oddworld - Abe's Oddysee (USA) (Rev 2).original_desc:
Abe's Oddysee begins with the eponymous protagonist as a prisoner in RuptureFarms, from which he narrates his story. He and many other Mudokons are slaves to Molluck the Glukkon, the owner of RuptureFarms: "the biggest meat-processing plant on Oddworld". Abe is a contented floor-waxer First Class and currently Employee of the Year.

At the time of the story, the ingredients of the corporation's three major "Tasty Treats" (Scrab Cakes, Paramite Pies, and Meech Munchies) are quickly running out, with the Meeches already extinct. While working late, Abe overhears Molluck's plan to use the Mudokon slaves as meat products called "Mudokon Pops!", which frightens Abe into escaping from the factory.
Oddworld - Abe's Oddysee (USA) (Rev 2).desc:
安倍的《奧德賽》以同名主人公作為破裂農場的囚犯開始，講述了他的故事。他和許多其他穆多孔人都是莫魯克·格魯孔的奴隸，莫魯克是“奇異世界上最大的肉類加工廠”的所有者——破裂農場。Abe 是一位心滿意足的一流地板打蠟工，目前是年度最佳員工。

在故事發生時，公司的三大“美味佳餚”（Scrab Cakes、Paramite Pies 和 Meech Munchies）的原料很快就用完了，而 Meeches 已經滅絕了。在工作到很晚的時候，安倍無意中聽到莫勒克計劃利用無道空奴隸作為名為“無道空波普斯！”的肉製品，這嚇得安倍逃離了工廠。

CyberSled (USA).name: 網絡雪橇
CyberSled (USA).original_desc:
The year is 2067, and the world, though prosperous and populated by huge cities, is in a state of decay. In this dark future, one-on-one Tank Duels (to the death) are the spectator sport of choice, and you are a contestant. You can choose between six different tanks, each of them varying in speed, shield strength, weapon power, and maneuverability.
			 Once you have chosen your tank, you must drive it around an obstacle-ridden, flat-surfaced arena, hiding behind barriers, and shooting your machine guns and heat-seeking missiles at an opposing tank. You can play against the computer or challenge a friend in head-to-head split-screen action. In the one-player mode, if you destroy the enemy tank, you win the round and advance to the next stage. If your tank loses all of its shield strength, the computer wins and the game is over. If you're playing with the timer on, the tank with the highest level of shield strength when the time runs out wins the battle.
CyberSled (USA).desc:
故事發生在 2067 年，世界雖然繁榮且人口眾多，但卻正處於衰落的狀態。在這個黑暗的未來，一對一的坦克決鬥（至死）是觀賞性運動的首選，而你是一名參賽者。您可以在六種不同的坦克之間進行選擇，每種坦克的速度、護盾強度、武器威力和機動性各不相同。
一旦你選擇了你的坦克，你必須駕駛它繞過一個充滿障礙的平坦競技場，隱藏在障礙物後面，並用機槍和熱追踪導彈向對方坦克射擊。您可以與電腦對戰，也可以在分屏遊戲中與朋友對戰。在單人模式中，如果你摧毀了敵方坦克，你就贏得了這一輪並進入下一階段。如果你的坦克失去了所有護盾強度，則計算機獲勝並且遊戲結束。如果您在計時器打開的情況下玩遊戲，則在時間耗盡時具有最高護盾強度的坦克將贏得戰鬥。

Steel Harbinger (USA).name: 鋼鐵先驅者
Steel Harbinger (USA).original_desc: In Steel Harbinger, a darkly futuristic running, jumping, 3-D shoot-'em-up, you must guide Miranda through certain areas of Kansas, Las Vegas, San Francisco, Houston, Cape Canaveral, Washington, the Antarctic, an alien planetoid, and the Moon. In each level you'll have specific missions to accomplish such as killing aliens, finding special weapons, saving humans, opening secret rooms, activating defense facilities, and destroying key enemy sites. You can teleport between locations by finding teleport cards and telepads. Access to specific buildings and other restricted areas can be gained with pass cards that you will find hidden throughout the levels. In addition to the standard action, you can also commandeer trucks, hovercraft, floating discs, and tanks.
Steel Harbinger (USA).desc: 在《鋼鐵先鋒》這款黑暗未來跑跳 3D 射擊遊戲中，您必須引導米蘭達穿過堪薩斯州、拉斯維加斯、舊金山、休斯頓、卡納維拉爾角、華盛頓、南極洲、外星小行星和月球的某些區域。在每個關卡中，你都需要完成特定的任務，例如殺死外星人、尋找特殊武器、拯救人類、打開秘密房間、激活防禦設施以及摧毀關鍵的敵人地點。您可以通過尋找傳送卡和傳送板在不同地點之間進行傳送。可以使用隱藏在各個關卡中的通行卡來進入特定建築物和其他限制區域。除了標準動作之外，你還可以徵用卡車、氣墊船、浮盤和坦克。

SaGa Frontier (USA).name: 佐賀邊境
SaGa Frontier (USA).original_desc: Saga Frontier is a fantasy / sci-fi anime style RPG. It's set in a huge world (30 zones). You choose one of seven characters to defeat the game and the game stores the data from the chosen character which affect what happens once you play the game with one of the other six characters. The game features a LOT of side quests.
SaGa Frontier (USA).desc: Saga Frontier 是一款奇幻/科幻動漫風格的角色扮演遊戲。它的背景是一個巨大的世界（30 個區域）。您選擇七個角色之一來擊敗遊戲，遊戲會存儲所選角色的數據，這些數據會影響您與其他六個角色之一玩遊戲時發生的情況。該遊戲有很多支線任務。

Final Fantasy Origins (USA) (Rev 1).original_name: Final Fantasy Origins : FF I & FF II
Final Fantasy Origins (USA) (Rev 1).name: 最終幻想II
Final Fantasy Origins (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Final Fantasy Origins is a re-release of Final Fantasy and Final Fantasy II. Both games have added CGI cut scenes, updated graphics, and added content. It also includes art galleries of Yoshitaka Amano's illustrations. Final Fantasy II was never released in the USA.

Final Fantasy is an RPG/adventure came where you choose four characters (from six different character classes). It features turn based combat, kill monsters for gold / experience to advance levels and equipment. 

Final Fantasy II is also similar but has several different aspects. There is no experience system is not based off of killing monsters. The more you use a weapon/armor the more proficient you get at it. It also features a keyword system. During a conversion some words can be memorized then you can ask NPCs keywords to further the plot, get more information, etc.
Final Fantasy Origins (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
《Final Fantasy VII》（日語：ファイナルファンタジーVII，英語：Final Fantasy VII，香港和台灣舊譯「太空戰士」，由於媒體雜誌都用此名報導，因此亦有玩家通稱此作為「太七」）是史克威爾（現史克威爾艾尼克斯）於1997年在索尼PlayStation平台發行的電子角色扮演遊戲，為Final Fantasy系列第七部本傳，本作亦有多個平台的移植版本。遊戲是系列首款使用3D運算的作品，其使用即時運算角色和預先渲染的背景。主人公克勞德·史特萊夫最初以僱傭兵身份加入生態恐怖主義組織「雪崩」，企圖以武力阻止持有能源專利的特大企業「神羅」為汲取資源而耗盡星球生命。隨著情節推進，克勞德和夥伴被捲入另一場更加具威脅性的衝突，起而對抗世上著名的英雄——賽菲羅斯。
《Final Fantasy VII》在1994年展開製作。最初計劃發行於超級任天堂平台，後改至任天堂64。但任天堂64的卡匣媒介未能提供作品3D化所需之儲存容量，故史克威爾決定轉戰使用CD-ROM的PlayStation平台發行本作。《Final Fantasy VII》由北瀨佳范擔任總監，野島一成和北瀨佳范編劇，坂口博信為製作人，音樂由長期為系列譜曲的植松伸夫創作。而因應作品3D化的需要，天野喜孝的畫風相對較難執行，故天野長期擔任的角色設計一職由野村哲也接任。史克威爾對本作的製作費用則達到4000萬美金，另有4000萬美金行銷費用。
《Final Fantasy VII》在商業上獲得巨大成功，於首發的PlayStation平台上全球累計銷量就突破1000萬套，是《Final Fantasy系列》中最暢銷的作品，在全球玩家間具高知名度。PS版推出後1998年在Microsoft Windows上發行PC版，2009年在PlayStation Network上發行，2012年通過官方網站下載、2013年通過Steam發行支援當前系統的新PC版，由該PC版移植而來的PlayStation 4版與iOS版則於2015年發行，Android版本在2016年發行，任天堂Switch、Xbox One版本於2019年發行。
一般認為，本作對日式角色扮演遊戲（JRPG）在日本境外的普及頗有貢獻，為同類型遊戲在歐美市場拓展了大量受眾。因作品受到歡迎，史克威爾艾尼克斯以「Final Fantasy VII補完計劃」為題，在不同平台製作了一系列前後傳，其中包含一部後傳電影《Final Fantasy VII 降臨神子》，由野村哲也導演、野島一成編劇、北瀨佳范製作，其中片段於2004年在第61屆威尼斯電影節首映。
2015年E3索尼展前發布會上史克威爾艾尼克斯發表將開發本作的重製版，預計在PlayStation 4平台發行。2020年4月10日，《Final Fantasy VII 重製版》首作在PlayStation 4平台發售，內容為原版遊戲中魔晄都市米德加的部分，並以此為基礎做了大量擴充。整個重製計劃將分拆為數部作品進行發售。重製版遊戲的總監、製作人、編劇、音樂等均為原班人馬。

R-C Stunt Copter (USA).name: 遙控特技直升機
R-C Stunt Copter (USA).original_desc:
R/C Stunt Copter is a highly realistic simulation of flying a miniature R/C Helicopter that, due to being developed by Shiny Entertainment (the mad men behind MDK and Earthworm Jim),  has a much bigger sense of humor than is necessary for a game of it's genre...

The following text  is quoted directly from this game's actual manual!

"Let me make something perfectly clear: You will NEVER beat this game. I think that's important enough for repeating: You will NEVER beat this game.
I will wait a second while the ramifications of that sink in.
Now, I know you're sayiong one of these things right now:
a) I can beat any game.
b) Why the heck would I play a game I can never win?
c) Whatchu talkin' 'bout Willis?"

That text alone should give you a taste of what you're in for...
R-C Stunt Copter (USA).desc:
R/C Stunt Copter 是一款高度逼真的微型 R/C 直升機模擬遊戲，由 Shiny Entertainment（MDK 和 Earthworm Jim 背後的瘋子）開發，具有比同類游戲所需的更大的幽默感......

以下文字直接引用自本遊戲實際手冊！

“讓我說得非常清楚：你永遠不會打敗這個遊戲。我認為這已經足夠重要了，可以重複一遍：你永遠不會打敗這個遊戲。
我會等一下，等我們了解其後果。
現在，我知道你現在正在說以下其中一件事：
a) 我可以擊敗任何比賽。
b) 為什麼我要玩一場我永遠贏不了的遊戲？
c) 談論威利斯做什麼？”

僅此文字就應該讓您嚐嚐您的處境......

Jet Moto (USA).name: 噴氣摩托
Jet Moto (USA).original_desc:
Developed by SingleTrac, Jet Moto blends futuristic motocross racing with hazard ridden tracks. Rather than using traditional cars or motorcycles, these vehicles are a cross between jet skis and hovercrafts. With turbo-charged engines, these bikes can tread water, perform dangerous aerial flips and catch serious air. There are 20 vehicles/characters in all, each with varying acceleration times, weight, suspension (lift) and handling capabilities.
 While there's only a handful of tracks readily available, there are nine in all -- the latter courses will be unlocked by doing well in tournaments. Spanning the globe, tracks are set throughout snowy mountains and ice, massive cliffs, murky swamps and vibrant beaches. Located throughout each course are magnetic pillars in which you can grapple and handle turns in a more sufficient manner.
Jet Moto (USA).desc:
Jet Moto 由 SingleTrac 開發，將未來的越野摩托車比賽與危險的賽道融為一體。這些車輛不是使用傳統的汽車或摩托車，而是摩托艇和氣墊船的混合體。借助渦輪增壓發動機，這些自行車可以踩水、進行危險的空中翻轉並捕捉嚴重的空氣。共有 20 輛車輛/角色，每輛都有不同的加速時間、重量、懸掛（舉升）和操控能力。
雖然只有少數可用的賽道，但總共有九個——後面的賽道將通過在錦標賽中表現出色來解鎖。賽道遍布全球，遍布雪山和冰原、巨大的懸崖、陰暗的沼澤和生機勃勃的海灘。每個球場上都設有磁性柱，您可以在其中以更充分的方式抓握和處理轉彎。

G-Police (USA).name: G-警察
G-Police (USA).original_desc:
After a violent interstellar resource war, mega-corporations seize power from the remnants of Earth's governments and lead humanity's way into the colonization of space. The last vestige of central authority is in the form of the G-Police (Government Police); an independent agency tasked with keeping order in the colonies. You play as rookie Jeff Slater - a former military pilot going undercover at the G-Police squadron on Callisto, in the hopes of finding the truth behind your sister's sudden death.

G-Police is an arcade-style helicopter shooter set inside the colony domes on Callisto. You pilot a futuristic close-air-support gunship, and are tasked with engaging ground and air enemies as you uncover a sinister corporate plot. Your ship can hover and turn in a VTOL mode, fire weapons outfitted before each mission, and lock on to objects in the world to both track enemies and scan suspicious cargo. Missions require you to navigate through the skyscrapers and billboards of the various city districts, and complete a number of objectives updated through radio contact with headquarters.
G-Police (USA).desc:
在一場激烈的星際資源戰爭之後，大型企業從地球政府的殘餘勢力手中奪取了權力，並帶領人類踏上了太空殖民之路。中央權威的最後遺跡是 G-Police（政府警察）；一個獨立機構，負責維持殖民地的秩序。你扮演新秀傑夫·斯萊特 - 一名前軍事飛行員，在卡利斯託的 G-Police 中隊臥底，希望找到你妹妹突然死亡背後的真相。

G-Police 是一款街機風格的直升機射擊遊戲，背景設置在卡利斯託的殖民地圓頂內。你駕駛一架未來派的近距離空中支援武裝直升機，並肩負著與地面和空中敵人交戰的任務，同時揭露一個邪惡的公司陰謀。您的飛船可以在垂直起降模式下懸停和轉向，在每次任務之前發射配備的武器，並鎖定世界上的物體以跟踪敵人並掃描可疑貨物。任務要求您瀏覽各個城區的摩天大樓和廣告牌，並完成通過與總部的無線電聯繫更新的許多目標。

Spyro the Dragon (USA).name: 小龍斯派羅
Spyro the Dragon (USA).original_desc: Spyro the Dragon is a platform game developed by Insomniac Games for the PlayStation. It stars the title character, a young purple dragon named Spyro and his dragonfly friend, Sparx, and is the first game in the Spyro the Dragon series. The first game was massively popular at its initial release and Spyro would later become one of the most recognizable, popular and respected gaming icons for the PlayStation gaming console. Spyro's best friend, Sparx the dragonfly, acts like the player's health meter and assists in gathering gems. The various dragons Spyro unfreezes along the way are also key characters in Spyro's progression through the game. Gnasty Gnorc is the main antagonist, who froze all the dragons of the land in crystal.
Spyro the Dragon (USA).desc: 《小龍斯派羅》是 Insomniac Games 為 PlayStation 開發的一款平台遊戲。它的主角是一條名叫斯派羅 (Spyro) 的年輕紫龍和他的蜻蜓朋友斯帕克斯 (Sparx)，這是《小龍斯派羅》系列的第一款遊戲。第一款遊戲在最初發佈時就大受歡迎，後來《小龍斯派羅》成為 PlayStation 遊戲機最知名、最受歡迎和最受尊敬的遊戲圖標之一。斯派羅最好的朋友，蜻蜓斯帕克斯，充當玩家的健康表並協助收集寶石。小龍斯派羅沿途解凍的各種龍也是小龍斯派羅在遊戲中前進的關鍵角色。Gnasty Gnorc 是主要對手，他將這片土地上的所有龍都凍結在水晶中。

Dragon Warrior VII (USA).name: 《最終幻想VII》系列的音樂
Dragon Warrior VII (USA).original_desc:
In "Dragon Warrior VII", you are a 16 year old son of a fisherman living on a small island called Estard. There is nothing else on the planet beside this island and the vast ocean surrounding it. One day, you and two friends make a discovery and realize the the world was once much more than Estard Island. So what caused it to disappear? In order to find that out, you travel to the past, where you hope to solve the mystery and to restore the present world the way it was before.

"Dragon Warrior VII" shares with its  predecessor the job system: you can assign character classes ("jobs") to your party members, and learn many different abilities, depending on the job you have chosen. The game maintains the traditional style of the series, including strictly medieval setting and first-person turn-based combat.
Dragon Warrior VII (USA).desc:
在《勇者鬥惡龍7》中，你是一個16歲的漁夫兒子，住在一個名叫埃斯塔德的小島上。除了這座島嶼和周圍的廣闊海洋之外，地球上沒有其他任何東西。有一天，您和兩個朋友有了一個發現，並意識到世界曾經不僅僅是埃斯塔德島。那麼是什麼原因導致它消失呢？為了找到答案，你回到過去，希望解開這個謎團，讓現在的世界恢復原來的樣子。

《龍戰士VII》與其前作共享職業系統：你可以為你的隊伍成員分配角色類別（“職業”），並根據你選擇的職業學習許多不同的能力。遊戲保持了該系列的傳統風格，包括嚴格的中世紀設定和第一人稱回合製戰鬥。

No One Can Stop Mr.original_name: No One Can Stop Mr. Domino
No One Can Stop Mr.name: 無人能阻止多米諾先生
No One Can Stop Mr.original_desc: No one can stop Mr. Domino! Get ready for some seriously addictive action in this wild style 3D-strategy puzzle game. Move out fast to keep those dominoes toppling! If you don't, the Dreaded Domino Effect will take hold and you will never want to stop! So go ahead. Try and stop Mr. Domino.
No One Can Stop Mr.desc: 沒有人能阻止多米諾先生！準備好在這款狂野風格的 3D 策略益智遊戲中體驗一些令人上癮的動作吧。快點出去，防止多米諾骨牌倒塌！如果你不這樣做，可怕的多米諾骨牌效應就會發生，你將永遠不想停下來！所以繼續吧。嘗試阻止多米諾先生。

Legacy of Kain - Soul Reaver (USA).name: 凱恩的遺產：靈魂掠奪者
Legacy of Kain - Soul Reaver (USA).original_desc:
1500 years after Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain, the vampire Kain's decision at the end of that game has finally defeated the human kingdoms and brought the world of Nosgoth under his control. Ruling from a castle built on the Pillars of Nosgoth, Kain has established an empire of six vampire clans, each ruled by a lieutenant, the sons of Kain. Raziel was one such lieutenant, but lost his position through the "insolence" of receiving a new evolutionary "dark gift", the growth of feathery wings, before his master had acquired it. Fearing that Raziel might one day surpass him, Kain tears off Raziel's wings in a fit of range and banishes him into the Abyss.  There, Raziel is lost in time, died and his body consumed. The Elder God recovers Raziel's soul and rebuilds the broken body, not as a living vampire, but as a strange new creature of the underworld. Swearing revenge on Kain, Raziel now phases seamlessly between Nosgoth and it's underworld, using his new powers to become a terrible reaver of souls...

Soul Reaver is a 3rd person action-adventure title that follows Raziel on his quest to purge the land of vampires and take revenge on Kain and his brothers, leaders of the six clans. The player controls the game from behind Raziel's shoulder, moving him in any direction, climbing, attacking, jumping and using specific abilities. Raziel's can grip onto the edge of ledges and his torn wings allow him to glide gently downwards. Raziel can shift through the "material" world into the "spectral" realm at will... but must find specific locations in order to shift back. The two realms mirror one another, with distortions which give access to new areas and platforms. Existing in the material world drains Raziel's life energy at a constant rate.  Throughout the game, energy is recovered by consuming the souls of defeated enemies. If Raziel is able to defeat one of his brothers, he will additionally gain a new ability ("dark gift") upon drinking it's soul. Examples include: the ability to swim, file telekinetic projectiles or the ability to phase through locked gates. Raziel can arm himself with a variety of weapons including spears, daggers, swords, axes, as well as attacking enemies barehanded. Eventually, Raziel will also come across Kain's personal sword (named the Soul Reaver), and will use it to create a powerful energy blade weapon.

The world is left open to Raziel, he can return to areas previously completed and explore the world of Nosgoth at will. Access to certain areas however sometimes  requires the use of gained specific abilities. Many of the puzzles the player will need to solve in this quest are "block puzzles", requiring the placement of certain large structures (usually square blocks), either to activate switches or to build access to out-of-reach areas.
Legacy of Kain - Soul Reaver (USA).desc:
《血兆：凱恩的遺產》1500 年後，吸血鬼凱恩在遊戲最後的決定最終擊敗了人類王國，並將諾斯哥特世界置於他的控制之下。凱恩在諾斯哥特之柱上建造的一座城堡中進行統治，建立了一個由六個吸血鬼氏族組成的帝國，每個氏族都由凱恩的兒子中尉統治。拉齊爾就是這樣的一位中尉，但在他的主人獲得一項新的進化“黑暗禮物”——羽毛翅膀的生長之前，他因“無禮”而失去了他的職位。由於擔心拉齊爾有一天會超越他，凱恩在一段距離內撕下了拉齊爾的翅膀，並將他放逐到深淵。在那裡，拉齊爾迷失了時間，死亡，身體被消耗。老神恢復了拉齊爾的靈魂，並重建了破碎的身體，不再是一個活生生的吸血鬼，而是一個來自地下世界的奇怪的新生物。拉齊爾發誓要向凱恩報仇，現在他在諾斯哥特和地下世界之間無縫切換，利用他的新力量成為可怕的靈魂掠奪者……

《Soul Reaver》是一款第三人稱動作冒險遊戲，講述了拉齊爾清除吸血鬼土地並向凱恩和他的兄弟（六個部落的首領）復仇的故事。玩家從拉齊爾的肩膀後面控制遊戲，讓他向任何方向移動、攀爬、攻擊、跳躍和使用特定的能力。拉齊爾可以抓住壁架的邊緣，而他撕裂的翅膀可以讓他輕輕地向下滑翔。拉齊爾可以隨意從“物質”世界轉移到“光譜”領域……但必須找到特定的位置才能轉移回來。這兩個領域彼此鏡像，但扭曲卻允許進入新的領域和平台。存在於物質世界會以恆定的速度消耗拉齊爾的生命能量。在整個遊戲中，能量是通過消耗被擊敗的敵人的靈魂來恢復的。如果拉齊爾能夠擊敗他的一個兄弟，他在喝下其靈魂後還將額外獲得一項新能力（“黑暗禮物”）。例子包括：游泳的能力、發射遙控彈丸的能力或逐步穿過上鎖的門的能力。拉齊爾可以用各種武器武裝自己，包括長矛、匕首、劍、斧頭，也可以徒手攻擊敵人。最終，拉齊爾還將遇到凱恩的私人劍（名為靈魂掠奪者），並將用它來製造強大的能量刀片武器。

世界對拉齊爾開放，他可以返回之前完成的區域並隨意探索諾斯哥特的世界。然而，進入某些區域有時需要使用獲得的特定能力。玩家在此任務中需要解決的許多謎題都是“方塊謎題”，需要放置某些大型結構（通常是方形方塊），以激活開關或建立通往無法到達的區域的通道。

Wild Arms 2 (USA).name: 狂野武裝2
Wild Arms 2 (USA).original_desc:
"Wild Arms 2" isn't really a sequel to Sony's original title. Your hero, a young soldier Ashley, is transformed to a demon. Ashley is determined to purge the evil from his body. He meets Brad, a criminal and a war-hero, and Lilka, a female magician. Together, they start a journey in order to discover the unknown foes which have corrupted Ashley, but soon they find out that a much greater conspiracy has taken place...

The combat system in "Wild Arms" is very similar to the one in Final Fantasy games: turned-based attacks, and a menu choice of physical attacks, spells, and even Guardians, which are more or less the same like the Guardian Forces in "Final Fantasy VIII". The "Arms" are special abilities which the party members learn while progressing in the game. 

"Wild Arms 2" also has many adventure elements, which links it to Nintendo's Zelda games. The dungeons (which can - and must - be viewed rotating the camera) contain many puzzles to solve.
Wild Arms 2 (USA).desc:
《狂野武器 2》實際上並不是索尼原作的續集。你的英雄，年輕的士兵阿什利，變成了惡魔。阿什利決心清除體內的邪惡。他遇到了罪犯兼戰爭英雄布拉德和女魔法師莉爾卡。他們一起踏上旅程，尋找腐蝕阿什莉的未知敵人，但很快他們發現更大的陰謀已經發生……

《狂野武器》的戰鬥系統與《最終幻想》遊戲中的戰鬥系統非常相似：回合製攻擊，以及物理攻擊、法術甚至守護者的菜單選擇，這與《最終幻想VIII》中的守護者部隊或多或少相同。“武器”是隊員在遊戲過程中學習的特殊能力。

《Wild Arms 2》也有很多冒險元素，這與任天堂的塞爾達遊戲聯繫在一起。地牢（可以並且必須通過旋轉相機來觀看）包含許多需要解決的謎題。

Alundra 2 - A New Legend Begins (USA).name: 阿倫德拉2：新的傳奇開始
Alundra 2 - A New Legend Begins (USA).original_desc: In the distant lands of the Vanilla Kingdom; a mysterious being has appeared in the Doru region, who is able to change the evolution of the animal kingdom at will, forcing a magical evolution. The consequences of this are terrible: it transforms living beings into evil mechanical beings. In this situation, Flint appears; a young boy, orphaned due to the death of his parents at the hands of the pirates, whom he persues without rest; although he will have to abandon this obsession when he is forced to confront the mysterious being, Mephisto.
Alundra 2 - A New Legend Begins (USA).desc: 在香草王國的遙遠土地上；多魯地區出現了神秘生物，能夠隨意改變動物界的進化，迫使動物進行魔法進化。這樣做的後果是可怕的：它將生物轉化為邪惡的機械生物。在這種情況下，弗林特出現了；一個小男孩，由於父母死於海盜之手而成為孤兒，他不停地追尋海盜；儘管當他被迫面對神秘的存在墨菲斯托時，他將不得不放棄這種痴迷。

Disruptor (USA).name: 破壞者
Disruptor (USA).original_desc:
As a soldier in the world-renowned LightStormer Corps., your main objective is to clean up the universe...but it's getting pretty hairy out there! Mutated humans, space marines and aliens have decimated scientific research parties on Mars, threatened Earth and infiltrated various space stations -- the LightStormer Corps. aren't taking this situation lightly.
 The government has a top-secret plan: Psionic power. Implanted into your brain, these psychic powers significantly enhance your mental abilities; you can mentally heal yourself, drain energy, shock deadly organisms and blast a group of baddies to smithereens! Use these powers in moderation, however -- they consume vital Psionic points.
Disruptor (USA).desc:
作為世界著名的光風暴軍團的一名士兵，你的主要目標是清理宇宙......但那裡的情況變得非常棘手！變異人類、太空海軍陸戰隊員和外星人摧毀了火星上的科研隊伍，威脅地球並滲透到各個空間站——光風暴軍團。我們不會掉以輕心。
政府有一個絕密計劃：靈能。這些心靈力量植入你的大腦後，可以顯著增強你的心理能力；你可以在精神上治愈自己，消耗能量，震驚致命的生物，並將一群壞人炸成碎片！然而，請適度使用這些力量——它們會消耗重要的靈能點。

Chrono Cross (USA).name: 穿越時空
Chrono Cross (USA).original_desc:
Chrono Cross is a sequel to the SNES RPG  Chrono Trigger.

The main character is Serge, a young boy from a fishing village. One day, while strolling on the sea shore with his sweetheart, Serge suddenly disappears. He comes back to senses several moments later. Everything seems just the same as it was before, but when Serge visits his home village, nobody recognizes him. He hears from people that he has been dead for ten years. Serge begins to realize that he is now in a parallel world. His first and only wish is to find a way to return home, but, in order to do that, he must understand what has caused the existence of parallel words, allowing inter-dimensional travel. His quest will also reveal to him the truth about his own existence, and connect the seemingly unrelated plot of Chrono Cross to that of Chrono Trigger.

Chrono Cross is a Japanese RPG with turn-based battles. There are no random battles; enemies are always visible on screen. There are also no character levels in the game; instead, characters get better stats directly after each battle. During battles, Serge and his party members can perform three kinds of attacks: weak, medium, and strong. Strong attacks tend to miss more frequently. Magical spells are equipped by each character like items, and can be cast only as many times as they are equipped. Actions in battle deplete a certain amount of stamina, which recovers as other characters act. 

Chrono Cross features many recruitable characters (up to 40, but not all of them can be recruited in one play-through), several different endings, and the ability to play the game again with the same stats and items from the previous play.
Chrono Cross (USA).desc:
《Chrono Cross》是 SNES RPG《Chrono Trigger》的續作。

主角是來自漁村的小男孩謝爾蓋。有一天，當塞爾吉與心上人在海邊散步時，他突然失踪了。過了一會兒他才回過神來。一切看起來都和以前一樣，但是當塞爾日回到他的家鄉時，沒有人認出他。他聽人說他已經死了十年了。塞爾吉開始意識到他現在處於一個平行世界。他的第一個也是唯一的願望是找到回家的方法，但是，為了做到這一點，他必須了解是什麼導致了平行詞的存在，從而允許跨維度旅行。他的探索還將向他揭示有關他自己存在的真相，並將《穿越時空》看似無關的情節與《時空之輪》的情節聯繫起來。

Chrono Cross 是一款帶有回合製戰鬥的日本角色扮演遊戲。沒有隨機的戰鬥；敵人始終在屏幕上可見。遊戲中也沒有角色等級；相反，角色在每次戰鬥後立即獲得更好的統計數據。在戰鬥中，塞爾吉和他的隊友可以進行弱、中、強三種攻擊。強烈的攻擊往往會更頻繁地失敗。魔法咒語像物品一樣由每個角色裝備，並且只能施展與裝備相同的次數。戰鬥中的行動會消耗一定量的體力，體力會隨著其他角色的行動而恢復。

《Chrono Cross》具有許多可招募角色（最多 40 個，但並非所有角色都可以在一次遊戲中招募）、幾種不同的結局，以及能夠使用與上一遊戲相同的統計數據和物品再次玩遊戲。

Dino Crisis 2 (USA).name: 恐龍危機2
Dino Crisis 2 (USA).original_desc:
Dino Crisis 2 is a third-person shooter video game for the Sony PlayStation, published by Capcom in North America, released on September 13, 2000 and publish by Virgin Interactive in Europe, release on November 4, 2000. It was developed by Capcom Production Studio 4. The game is the sequel to Dino Crisis and was followed by Dino Crisis 3 in 2003 and was ported to Microsoft Windows that same year.
 The story follows the events of the last game, where Regina is now on another mission involving a facility located close to the fictional Edward City, where a major anomaly has caused the whole island to be transported back in time to the era of the dinosaurs, along with all the human inhabitants. Regina is sent on a rescue mission with her new ally Dylan Morton, who has a strange connection to the events on the island. The player's control switches between Regina and Dylan at specific points in the game.
Dino Crisis 2 (USA).desc:
《恐龍危機2》是索尼PlayStation的第三人稱射擊遊戲，北美由Capcom發行，於2000年9月13日發行，歐洲由Virgin Interactive發行，2000年11月4日發行。它由Capcom Production Studio 4開發。該遊戲是《恐龍危機》的續作，隨後於2003年推出《恐龍危機3》，同年移植到Microsoft Windows。
故事講述了上一款遊戲的事件，雷吉娜現在正在執行另一項任務，涉及位於虛構的愛德華城附近的一個設施，那裡發生了重大異常，導致整個島嶼和所有人類居民一起回到了恐龍時代。雷吉娜和她的新盟友迪倫·莫頓一起執行救援任務，迪倫·莫頓與島上發生的事件有著奇怪的聯繫。玩家的控制權會在遊戲中的特定時刻在雷吉娜和迪倫之間切換。

Suikoden II (USA).name: 水滸傳不錯
Suikoden II (USA).original_desc: Sequel to the early PlayStation RPG. As a member of the Alliance, a military force only really hinted at in the original, you play the unwitting hero of the game: an orphan who has been raised by a quiet, unassuming battle hero in a seemingly ancient war. Alongside you in the ranks is your best friend Jowy, a boy born of nobility but who has never been able to receive approval in his stubborn father's eyes. As the game begins, you are immediately tossed into a tale of political strife, betrayal and war on a grand scale beyond your scope in the early stages. As the game wears on, the plot will twist, turn and develop in numerous ways that expose the personalities of each of the characters involved. The battle system is turn-based, with the option to equip Runes for special abilities, combine party member attacks to create chain combos or devastating spells, and the option to run the battle in Auto mode.
Suikoden II (USA).desc: 早期 PlayStation RPG 的續作。作為聯盟的成員，原作中只暗示了一支軍事力量，你扮演遊戲中不知情的英雄：一個孤兒，在一場看似古老的戰爭中，由一位安靜、謙遜的戰鬥英雄撫養長大。與你並肩作戰的還有你最好的朋友喬伊，一個出身貴族的男孩，卻始終無法在固執的父親眼中得到認可。當遊戲開始時，你會立即陷入一個充滿政治衝突、背叛和戰爭的故事，其規模超出了你在早期階段的能力範圍。隨著遊戲的進行，情節將以多種方式扭曲、轉變和發展，暴露每個角色的個性。戰鬥系統是回合製的，可以選擇裝備符文以獲得特殊能力，結合黨員攻擊來創造連鎖組合或毀滅性法術，還可以選擇在自動模式下進行戰鬥。

Panzer Bandit (Japan).name: 坦克強盜
Panzer Bandit (Japan).original_desc:
The game is a side-scrolling beat 'em up that uses the same engine used in Mad Stalker: Full Metal Force, also for the PlayStation. There is a total of 12 characters, including the four story characters and the eight unlockable bosses.

The game is controlled with two attack buttons (strong and weak) and the directional pad for moving left, right, crouching, and jumping. Shoulder buttons can also be used to change between foreground and background and can be used to activate the character's special attack.

An unusual aspect of the game is that if the player stands still during an attack, it is considered a guard. Other features include a combo counter and a guided elemental attack which launches an enemy.
Panzer Bandit (Japan).desc:
該遊戲是一款橫向捲軸清版遊戲，採用與 PlayStation 版《Mad Stalker: Full Metal Force》相同的引擎。共有 12 個角色，包括四個故事角色和八個可解鎖的 Boss。

遊戲由兩個攻擊按鈕（強和弱）和用於左、右移動、蹲伏和跳躍的方向鍵控制。肩部按鈕也可用於在前景和背景之間切換，並可用於激活角色的特殊攻擊。

遊戲的一個不尋常的方面是，如果玩家在攻擊過程中保持靜止，則被視為守衛。其他功能包括連擊計數器和發射敵人的引導元素攻擊。

Tactics Ogre (USA).name: 戰術食人魔
Tactics Ogre (USA).original_desc:
After generations of war between the various ethnic groups, King Dogare brought peace to the land of Valeria. When the king dies Valeria is split into three different groups, each claiming the throne. You take the role of a young boy as he embarks on a quest to save the land from turmoil and assume the throne. You will have to journey throughout the land and recruit members for an army. Once recruited, the members will gain experience through the turn-based battles. 

Up to 10 party members can participate in any battle. Eventually, the characters can change classes and learn skills that are specific to each class. However, you will have to make sure your party is balanced or you will face certain doom. Will you be able to save the world from chaos in Tactics Ogre?
Tactics Ogre (USA).desc:
經過各族之間的世代戰爭，多加雷國王為瓦萊里婭的土地帶來了和平。國王去世後，瓦萊里婭分成三個不同的群體，每個群體都聲稱擁有王位。你扮演一個小男孩，踏上拯救國家免於動亂並登上王位的旅程。你必須走遍這片土地並招募軍隊成員。一旦被招募，成員將通過回合製戰鬥獲得經驗。

任何一場戰鬥最多可有 10 名黨員參加。最終，角色可以改變職業並學習每個職業特有的技能。然而，你必須確保你的政黨是平衡的，否則你將面臨一定的厄運。您能在 Tactics Ogre 中將世界從混亂中拯救出來嗎？

Ace Combat 2 (USA).name: 皇牌空戰2
Ace Combat 2 (USA).original_desc:
Ace Combat 2 is the sequel to Namco's PSX combat flight simulator Air Combat. Ace Combat 2 puts you back in the cockpit as a mercenary pilot out to foil a world-threatening terrorist plot. You'll proceed through 30 missions in which your success will allow you to buy weapon upgrades, parts and other gimmicks just like in the original. 

The game offers sharper graphics and sounds, more planes and options, dual shock support as well as adding analog joystick support.
Ace Combat 2 (USA).desc:
《皇牌空戰 2》是 Namco 的 PSX 戰鬥飛行模擬器《空戰》的續作。《皇牌空戰 2》讓您回到駕駛艙，扮演一名僱傭軍飛行員，挫敗威脅世界的恐怖陰謀。你將完成 30 個任務，在這些任務中，你的成功將讓你可以像原版一樣購買武器升級、零件和其他噱頭。

該遊戲提供更清晰的圖形和聲音、更多的飛機和選項、雙重震動支持以及添加模擬操縱桿支持。

Rival Schools - United by Fate (USA) (Di.key: Rival Schools - United by Fate (USA) (Disc 1) (Arcade Disc)
Rival Schools - United by Fate (USA) (Di.name: 競爭對手學校：命運聯合
Rival Schools - United by Fate (USA) (Di.original_desc:
What do you get when you cross Street Fighter with a bunch of school kids? You get another classic Capcom beat 'em up. 

Featuring plenty of new faces, and heaps of new moves to work with, this is a full conversion of the arcade game, with the added bonus of a second disk. In this second disk, you get new modes including Lesson (teach yourself new moves), Group (select two to four characters for a group battle), League (choose two to six characters and then fight in a league battle), Tournament (tournament battle with up to eight characters), Cooperate (four-player simultaneous player), one-player game, and a specialized versus mode.
Rival Schools - United by Fate (USA) (Di.desc:
當你和一群小學生一起玩《街頭霸王》時，你會得到什麼？你會得到另一款經典的 Capcom 清版遊戲。

這是一款對街機遊戲的全面改造，擁有大量新面孔和大量新動作，還提供第二張光盤。在第二張光盤中，您將獲得新的模式，包括課程（自學新動作）、團體（選擇兩到四個角色進行團體戰鬥）、聯盟（選擇兩到六個角色，然後在聯盟戰鬥中戰鬥）、錦標賽（最多八個角色的錦標賽戰鬥）、合作（四人同時玩家）、單人遊戲和專門的對戰模式。

Misadventures of Tron Bonne, The (USA).name: 特隆博納的不幸遭遇
Misadventures of Tron Bonne, The (USA).original_desc: Rather than focusing on the heroic protagonists of Mega Man Legends series, the game follows series anti-hero Tron Bonne, sister of the criminal Bonne family of air pirates. The Japanese counterpart included PocketStation support whereas the North American and European version did not. With a limited production run, the game is one of the rarest PlayStation games
Misadventures of Tron Bonne, The (USA).desc: 該遊戲並沒有聚焦於《洛克人傳奇》系列的英雄主角，而是講述了系列反英雄特隆·博納 (Tron Bonne)，她是空中海盜犯罪分子博納 (Bonne) 家族的妹妹。日本版本包括 PocketStation 支持，而北美和歐洲版本則不支持。由於產量有限，該遊戲是最稀有的 PlayStation 遊戲之一

Mega Man X6 (USA) (Rev 1).name: 洛克人X6
Mega Man X6 (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: Three weeks after the Eurasia space colony incident, the Earth's surface was severely damaged and humans were forced to flee underground to escape from the planet's severe pollution, and Zero is still missing, presumed to be dead. Reploids were sent in to terraform the land in an attempt to make the planet habitable for humans once more, however, a Reploid and former colleague of Alia named Gate discovered something unusual amidst the ruins of Earth — a piece of Zero's DNA. After examining Zero's DNA, Gate became mad with power and an outbreak of bizarre Mavericks occurred. Weeks passed, Isoc, a Reploid scientist and an associate of Gate, announced to the people that a new phenomenon known as "Nightmare" has quickly spread throughout the world, causing Reploids to hallucinate and eventually destroy themselves. Isoc suspects the cause of the outbreak is none other than Zero who been spreading the phenomenon as he goes, much to X's anger and confusion. Isoc rallies Reploids throughout the world to aid the Nightmare Investigators, led by the powerful High-Max, at key locations to track down the source of this new phenomenon as well as Zero. X, along with the Maverick Hunters, must confront the Nightmare Investigators as they try to solve the mystery behind the Nightmare Phenomenon and clear Zero's name.
Mega Man X6 (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 歐亞太空殖民地事件發生三週後，地球表面遭到嚴重破壞，人類被迫逃往地下以躲避星球的嚴重污染，而零號至今仍下落不明，推測已經死亡。機器人被派去地球化，試圖讓地球再次適合人類居住，然而，機器人和阿莉亞的前同事蓋特在地球廢墟中發現了一些不尋常的東西——零的 DNA 片段。在檢查了零的DNA後，蓋特對權力感到瘋狂，奇異的小牛爆發了。幾週過去了，Reploid 科學家、Gate 的同事 Isoc 向人們宣布，一種被稱為“夢魘”的新現像已迅速在全世界蔓延，導致 Reploid 產生幻覺並最終毀滅自己。Isoc 懷疑爆發的原因正是零，他一邊走一邊傳播這種現象，這讓 X 感到憤怒和困惑。Isoc 集結了世界各地的 Reploids，在關鍵地點協助由強大的 High-Max 領導的夢魘調查員，追查這一新現像以及零的根源。X 和特立獨行的獵人必鬚麵對噩夢調查員，因為他們試圖解開噩夢現象背後的謎團並為零洗清罪名。

Bishi Bashi Special (Europe).name: 欠他一筆特殊的債
Bishi Bashi Special (Europe).original_desc:
Bishi Bashi Special is a compilation (and conversion) of the Konami arcade titles Bishi Bashi Champ, Super Bishi Bashi Champ and Handle Champ.

Gameplay is made up of tons of mini games, all of which use a simple 3-button interface that mimics the arcade originals. The mini games encompass a wide variety of button-mashing, timing and button combination games. The games themselves can be anything from making hamburgers, throwing a pie down a church aisle to balancing a car on a floating narrow gravel road and much more.

The game can be played alone, vs a computer player or play up to eight people using a multi-tap and three controllers.
Bishi Bashi Special (Europe).desc:
Bishi Bashi Special 是 Konami 街機遊戲 Bishi Bashi Champ、Super Bishi Bashi Champ 和 Handle Champ 的編譯（和轉換）。

遊戲玩法由大量迷你游戲組成，所有遊戲都使用模仿街機原版的簡單 3 按鈕界面。迷你游戲包括各種按鍵遊戲、計時遊戲和按鍵組合遊戲。遊戲本身可以是任何內容，從製作漢堡、在教堂過道上扔餡餅到在浮動的狹窄碎石路上平衡汽車等等。

該遊戲可以單獨玩，也可以與電腦玩家對抗，也可以使用多次點擊和三個控制器與最多八人一起玩。

Digimon World (USA).name: 數碼寶貝世界
Digimon World (USA).original_desc: It is your goal to roam the dangerous countryside with your trained Digimon battling other lost Digimon. A victorious battle permits them to return home to the abandoned File Island. The main one-player mode on Digimon World is where the mysterious story unfolds as you raise your immature Digimon. Digimon are dependant on you for happiness, food, and parental guidance to guide their behavior (similar to the popular Tamagotchi toy).
Digimon World (USA).desc: 你的目標是與你訓練有素的數碼寶貝一起漫遊危險的鄉村，與其他迷失的數碼寶貝戰鬥。一場胜利的戰鬥讓他們得以返回廢棄的法爾島。《數碼寶貝世界》的主要單人遊戲模式是在您撫養未成熟的數碼寶貝時展開神秘故事的地方。數碼寶貝依賴於你的快樂、食物和父母的指導來指導他們的行為（類似於流行的電子寵物玩具）。

Tekken 3 (USA).name: 铁拳3
Tekken 3 (USA).original_desc: An ancient evil force has reawakened, attacking in secret and feeding on the souls of mighty warriors. To lure it out of hiding will take the greatest fighting contest the world has ever seen... Tekken 3. Some are fighting for revenge, some for honor, ultimately, all are fighting for their lives and the fate of all mankind.
Tekken 3 (USA).desc: 一股古老的邪惡力量重新甦醒，秘密發起攻擊，並以強大戰士的靈魂為食。要將它從隱藏中引誘出來，將需要世界上最偉大的格鬥比賽……《鐵拳3》。有些人是為了復仇，有些人是為了榮譽，最終，所有人都在為自己的生命和全人類的命運而戰。

Twisted Metal 2 (USA).name: 扭曲金屬2
Twisted Metal 2 (USA).original_desc:
Twisted Metal features destructive car combat, playable either as a complete tournament or a single match The action takes place in 8 different locations around the world, on differing surfaces, many featuring destructible buildings and landmarks.

Combat takes place between a wide array of vehicles ranging from a man strapped between two wheels to an ice cream truck. They have their own strengths and weaknesses,  using an eclectic arrangement of weaponry include bombs and missiles, and resulting in its own end sequence, complete with an ironic line in humour.
Twisted Metal 2 (USA).desc:
《Twisted Metal》以破壞性汽車戰鬥為特色，可以作為一場完整的錦標賽或一場單場比賽進行。該動作發生在世界各地 8 個不同地點的不同表面上，其中許多具有可破壞的建築物和地標。

戰鬥發生在各種各樣的車輛之間，從綁在兩個輪子之間的人到冰淇淋車。他們有自己的優點和缺點，使用包括炸彈和導彈在內的不拘一格的武器佈置，並產生了自己的結局序列，並帶有諷刺的幽默台詞。

In Cold Blood (USA).name: 冷血
In Cold Blood (USA).original_desc: In Cold Blood is adventure and infiltration on Playstation. Seven of the nine missions offered are in fact flashbacks. As John Cord, an MI6 agent with amnesia, you must avoid guards and cameras, defeat security systems and discover the identity of the person who betrayed you.
In Cold Blood (USA).desc: 《冷血》是 Playstation 上的冒險和滲透遊戲。提供的九個任務中有七個實際上是閃回。扮演患有失憶症的軍情六處特工約翰·科德，你必須避開警衛和攝像機，擊敗安全系統並找出背叛你的人的身份。

Pop'n Tanks! (Japan).name: 流行坦克！
Pop'n Tanks! (Japan).original_desc:
Pop 'n Tanks is a tank combat game that strives for the diminutive and the comic rather than the realistic. The players pilot a mini-tank across a 3D terrain, crushing barricades and shelling other tanks. Tanks may be customized by using a variety of parts, and once configured to the player's preferences, the data may be saved to a Memory Card.
This is a tank battle game. The player who wins 2 rounds win the match. In order to win a match the player must empty the enemy's energy bar.
You'll get to battle in all sort of arena with different terrain ranging from lush forests, a downtown area, to spooky caves.
Pop'n Tanks allows you to take control one of many SD tanks into 1 on 1 battle against an opponent. One can play in story mode to face all enemies in progressive order or have a quick battle or use your saved tanks in custom battle against a friend.
Pop'n Tanks! (Japan).desc:
Pop 'n Tanks 是一款坦克戰鬥遊戲，追求的是小型化和喜劇性，而不是現實性。玩家駕駛迷你坦克穿越 3D 地形，粉碎路障並砲擊其他坦克。坦克可以通過使用各種部件進行定制，並且一旦根據玩家的喜好進行配置，數據就可以保存到存儲卡中。
這是一款坦克大戰遊戲。贏得 2 輪比賽的玩家贏得比賽。為了贏得比賽，玩家必須清空敵人的能量條。
你將在各種不同地形的競技場中戰鬥，從茂密的森林、市中心到陰森的洞穴。
Pop'n Tanks 允許您控制眾多 SD 坦克中的一輛，與對手進行一對一的戰鬥。您可以在故事模式下玩，以漸進的順序面對所有敵人，或者進行快速戰鬥，或者使用您保存的坦克與朋友進行自定義戰鬥。

Jet Moto 2 - Championship Edition (USA).name: 噴氣摩托2
Jet Moto 2 - Championship Edition (USA).original_desc: Jet Moto 2 (known as Jet Moto '98 in Japan) was released exclusively for the PlayStation video game console in 1997. The game became downloadable from the Playstation Network in January, 2008. The selectable amount of characters for this game was halved in comparison to the first game, with ten characters available at the beginning of the game and one unlockable character. Track amounts were greatly increased, however, with ten new tracks, and unlockable tracks from the original game. Tracks are more varied this time with each level containing a unique theme rather than the shared themes of the original game.
Jet Moto 2 - Championship Edition (USA).desc: Jet Moto 2（在日本稱為 Jet Moto '98）於 1997 年專門針對 PlayStation 視頻遊戲機發布。該遊戲於 2008 年 1 月開始可從 Playstation Network 下載。與第一款遊戲相比，該遊戲的可選角色數量減少了一半，遊戲開始時有 10 個可用角色，還有一個可解鎖角色。然而，曲目數量大幅增加，新增了 10 首曲目，以及原遊戲中的可解鎖曲目。這次的曲目更加多樣化，每個級別都包含一個獨特的主題，而不是原始遊戲的共享主題。

NanoTek Warrior (USA).name: 納米科技戰士
NanoTek Warrior (USA).original_desc:
Nanotek Warrior is probably based (or at least inspired) in the classic Spectrum (and other 8 bits platforms) game Eliminator released and development by Hewson Consultants Ltd.
 In the 23rd century, nanotechnology does man?s bidding. Anything from curing disease to feeding the worlds population has been taken care of by these tiny wondrous nanobots. But what happens when they become self-aware and decided to destroy their oppressors? To save the human race from extinction by its own creation, you are put in control of a new breed of nano war machine designed to fight (and win) this war. Enter NanoTek Warrior.
 A ground-based shoot-em-up by design, the game employs the use of jumping, banking, and strafing as you move forward through 3D tube-like levels. The game is seem from a third-person perspective behind the ship. Some areas place you outside and some inside, but the majority of the game takes place rotating around tubes. This gameplay only differs slightly in boss levels, that allow you to rotate around a central point with no forward motion.
 You can obtain different power-ups including special weapons, health bonuses and extra lives as you play through the game?s 9 levels. Each level is divided into 2 stages, one on tubes and a boss fight afterwards.
NanoTek Warrior (USA).desc:
Nanotek Warrior 可能基於（或至少受到啟發）由 Hewson Consultants Ltd 發布和開發的經典 Spectrum（和其他 8 位平台）遊戲 Eliminator。
在 23 世紀，納米技術聽從人類的指揮。從治療疾病到養活世界人口，任何事情都由這些微小而奇妙的納米機器人負責。但當他們有了自我意識並決定消滅壓迫者時會發生什麼呢？為了拯救人類免於因自己的創造而滅絕，你將控制一種新型納米戰爭機器，旨在對抗（並贏得）這場戰爭。納米泰克戰士登場。
該遊戲設計為地面射擊遊戲，當您在 3D 管狀關卡中前進時，會使用跳躍、傾斜和掃射。遊戲是從船後的第三人稱視角來看的。有些區域讓你在外面，有些則在裡面，但遊戲的大部分內容都是圍繞管道旋轉的。此遊戲玩法僅在 Boss 關卡上略有不同，允許您圍繞中心點旋轉而無需向前移動。
當你玩遊戲的 9 個關卡時，你可以獲得不同的能力提升，包括特殊武器、生命值獎勵和額外生命。每個關卡分為 2 個階段，第一個階段是在管道上，然後是 Boss 戰。

Lunar 2 - Eternal Blue Complete (USA) (D.name: 月球 2 : 永恆之藍 已完成
Lunar 2 - Eternal Blue Complete (USA) (D.original_desc: Set one thousand years after the events of The Silver Star, the game follows the adventure of Hiro, a young explorer and adventurer who meets Lucia, visitor from the far-away Blue Star, becoming entangled in her mission to stop Zophar, an evil, all-powerful being, from destroying the world.
Lunar 2 - Eternal Blue Complete (USA) (D.desc: 遊戲以《銀星》事件發生一千年後為背景，講述了年輕的探險家和冒險家宏的冒險故事，他遇到了來自遙遠藍星的訪客露西亞，並陷入了阻止邪惡全能生物佐法毀滅世界的使命中。

Final Fantasy VIII (USA) (Disc 4).name: 最終幻想VIII
Final Fantasy VIII (USA) (Disc 4).original_desc:
A member of an elite military team, Squall is forced into a conflict beyond imagination.  To survive, he must contend with a desperate rival, a powerful sorceress, and his own mysterious dreams.

* Realistic, detailed characters and background graphics enhanced by a breathtaking musical score
* An epic story based on the theme of love, set in a massive new world
* New Junction System allows characters to be customized with powerful magic spells drawn from enemies
* Nearly an hour of stunning motion-captured CG cinemas seamlessly integrated into gameplay
Final Fantasy VIII (USA) (Disc 4).desc:
作為精英軍事團隊的一員，斯考爾被迫捲入一場超乎想像的衝突。為了生存，他必須與絕望的對手、強大的女巫以及他自己神秘的夢想作鬥爭。

* 令人驚嘆的樂譜增強了逼真、細緻的角色和背景圖形
* 以愛情為主題的史詩故事，背景設定在一個巨大的新世界
* 新的連接系統允許使用從敵人身上汲取的強大魔法來定制角色
* 近一小時的令人驚嘆的動作捕捉 CG 影院無縫集成到遊戲中

Parasite Eve II (USA) (Disc 1).name: 寄生前夜 II
Parasite Eve II (USA) (Disc 1).original_desc:
Aya Brea is back in a new game. This time there are fewer RPG elements than the first game, and the game plays more like Resident Evil. Battles are now in real-time, and a new range of weapons are available. Defeating enemies rewards money as well as points used to revive and power-up Aya's suppressed Parasite powers, like healing and igniting foes. Weapons and armor now have fixed stats, but attachments can be swapped in and out of them to modify their properties.

After surviving the events of Parasite Eve Aya left her job as a cop and became a member of MIST (Mitochondrion Investigation and Suppression Agency) in order to hunt down the remnant mutants spawned by Eve's awakening. In the year 2000 a new breed of Neo Mitochondrion takes over the Akropolis Tower in downtown LA. Aya is called in and uncovers a secret organization that threatens all humanity.
Parasite Eve II (USA) (Disc 1).desc:
阿雅·布雷亞在新遊戲中回歸。這次的RPG元素比第一款遊戲少了一些，而且遊戲玩法更像是《生化危機》。戰鬥現在是實時的，並且有一系列新的武器可供使用。擊敗敵人會獎勵金錢以及積分，用於復活和增強艾雅被抑制的寄生力量，例如治療和點燃敵人。武器和盔甲現在具有固定的統計數據，但可以交換附件以修改其屬性。

在寄生蟲夏娃事件中倖存下來後，艾雅辭去了警察的工作，成為 MIST（線粒體調查和抑制機構）的成員，以追捕因夏娃覺醒而產生的殘餘變種人。2000 年，一種新型新線粒體佔據了洛杉磯市中心的 Akropolis 塔。艾雅被召喚過來，揭露了一個威脅全人類的秘密組織。

Koudelka (USA) (Disc 4).name: 考德爾卡
Koudelka (USA) (Disc 4).original_desc:
The premise behind Koudelka takes place in Aberyswyth, Wales at a monastery known as Nementon Abbey. Found in a remote location, the abbey was built as a place of worship, learning and teaching; it was a place where scholars found peace.
 As time went by, Nementon Abbey was turned into a prison and it's inhabitants were confined to suffer and die. This practice continued for many years until the facility was purchased by Patrick Heyworth, a wealthy criminal who turned the once peaceful monastery into a refuge for vagrants and law-breakers. After Heyworth took control over the building, rumors of horror and great riches echoed throughout the world; the rumors lured many thieves, none of which returned to their homes.
 Forward to Halloween 1898 -- present day.
Koudelka (USA) (Disc 4).desc:
《Koudelka》的故事背景發生在威爾士阿伯里斯威斯的一座名為 Nementon Abbey 的修道院。修道院位於偏遠地區，最初是作為禮拜、學習和教學的場所而建造的。這是學者們找到平靜的地方。
隨著時間的推移，內門頓修道院變成了一座監獄，裡面的居民被囚禁在痛苦和死亡之中。這種做法持續了很多年，直到該設施被富有的罪犯帕特里克·海沃斯（Patrick Heyworth）購買，他將曾經寧靜的修道院變成了流浪者和違法者的避難所。海沃斯接管這座建築後，恐怖和巨額財富的謠言在全世界迴響。謠言引來了許多小偷，但他們都沒有回家。
時間回到 1898 年的萬聖節——今天。

Lunar 2 - Eternal Blue Complete (USA) (D.name: 月球 2 : 永恆之藍 已完成
Lunar 2 - Eternal Blue Complete (USA) (D.original_desc: Set one thousand years after the events of The Silver Star, the game follows the adventure of Hiro, a young explorer and adventurer who meets Lucia, visitor from the far-away Blue Star, becoming entangled in her mission to stop Zophar, an evil, all-powerful being, from destroying the world.
Lunar 2 - Eternal Blue Complete (USA) (D.desc: 遊戲以《銀星》事件發生一千年後為背景，講述了年輕的探險家和冒險家宏的冒險故事，他遇到了來自遙遠藍星的訪客露西亞，並陷入了阻止邪惡全能生物佐法毀滅世界的使命中。

Final Fantasy VIII (USA) (Disc 1).name: 最終幻想VIII
Final Fantasy VIII (USA) (Disc 1).original_desc:
A member of an elite military team, Squall is forced into a conflict beyond imagination.  To survive, he must contend with a desperate rival, a powerful sorceress, and his own mysterious dreams.

* Realistic, detailed characters and background graphics enhanced by a breathtaking musical score
* An epic story based on the theme of love, set in a massive new world
* New Junction System allows characters to be customized with powerful magic spells drawn from enemies
* Nearly an hour of stunning motion-captured CG cinemas seamlessly integrated into gameplay
Final Fantasy VIII (USA) (Disc 1).desc:
作為精英軍事團隊的一員，斯考爾被迫捲入一場超乎想像的衝突。為了生存，他必須與絕望的對手、強大的女巫以及他自己神秘的夢想作鬥爭。

* 令人驚嘆的樂譜增強了逼真、細緻的角色和背景圖形
* 以愛情為主題的史詩故事，背景設定在一個巨大的新世界
* 新的連接系統允許使用從敵人身上汲取的強大魔法來定制角色
* 近一小時的令人驚嘆的動作捕捉 CG 影院無縫集成到遊戲中

Wild Arms 2 (USA) (Disc 2).name: 狂野武裝2
